Aamon.name: Aamon
Aamon.description: Aamon is the head of House Paxley and the current Duke of Castle Aberleen. Despite his cool and distant facade, he puts his kin above everything and will do anything for them.The aloof Duke of Castle Aberleen.

skills.name: Invisible Armor
skills.description: Aamon enters the Camouflage state each time he hits an enemy with a skill, during which he cannot be targeted, restores 25 (+15% Total Magic Power) plus 3% of his Lost HP every 0.6s, and gains 60% extra Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s.Upon leaving the Camouflage state, Aamon immediately resets his Basic Attack's cooldown and enhances his Basic Attacks within the next 2.5s.Each enhanced Basic Attack deals 70 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+115% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and reduces Aamon's skill cooldowns by 0.5s.The first enhanced Basic Attack's damage is increased to 120% if Aamon leaves the Camouflage state actively.

skills.name: Soul Shards
skills.description: PASSIVE: Aamon charges his armor each time he casts a skill or hits an enemy with a skill or Enhanced Basic Attack. At 5 charges, Aamon throws 5 shards at the target on his next attack, each shard dealing 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The shards will then scatter around the target.ACTIVE: Aamon throws a shard at a nearby enemy, dealing 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 / 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Slayer Shards
skills.description: Aamon throws a shard forward, dealing 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 / 220  (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way. The shard will then return to Aamon after a short delay and allow him to enter the Camouflage state.If the shard hits a non-minion enemy, it'll slow them by 50% for 2s and return to Aamon immediately.

skills.name: Endless Shards
skills.description:
Aamon throws all shards at a designated enemy and slows them by 30% for 1.5s.After a short delay, the shards will fly to the enemy's location again, each dealing 90 / 100 / 110 (+24% Total Magic Power)–150 / 165 / 180 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
The number of shards increases with Aamon's armor charges and the shards on the ground (8-25).The damage dealt increases with the target's lost HP, to the maximum when the target's HP  is below 30%.The same target takes less damage from subsequent attacks.

builds.author: Pro Player ONIC.Kairi
builds.description:
Jungle: Instant ultima kills with Genius Wand + Glowing Wand buffs. 
#AamonBuild

builds.author: No.1 zero five
builds.description: #AamonBuild

Akai.name: Akai
Akai.description: Once there was a panda in Stream Valley named Akai. With the dream of becoming a hero, he was always eager to offer help, but often ended up causing more trouble instead. He worked hard to pursue his dream, and although he'd once wandered off right the path. In the end, he recalled his original intention and become a true hero.The almighty panda hero of Stream Valley.

skills.name: Tai Chi
skills.description: Akai gains a 25 (+5% Total HP) shield for 4s on each skill cast and can mark enemy heroes and Creeps hit by his skills.Akai's Basic Attack deals 25 (+5% Total HP) extra Physical Damage to marked enemies.

skills.name: Headbutt
skills.description: Akai charges in the target direction, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the away.If Akai hits an enemy hero during this process, he'll knocked them airborne for 0.5s and be able to roll in the joystick's direction once.Akai can cast Headbutt during Heavy Spin to quickly adjust his position.

skills.name: Body Slam
skills.description: Akai smashes the ground with his body, dealing 270 / 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 (+6% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 45% for 2s.

skills.name: Heavy Spin
skills.description: Akai removes all debuff on him and spins for 4s, gaining Slow Immunity while continuously dealing 200 / 325 / 450 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back.Enemies heroes knocked back will knock back other heroes they collide with during the process.Akai also gradually increases his Movement Speed to 70% over the duration. This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression  and Morph effects.

builds.author: Pro Player TDK.Rival
builds.description:
Jungle: Pure tank with great CC.
#AkaiBuild

builds.author: Streamer: Game Ming
builds.description:
Roams: Disabler with Slow enemy attack. Armor focus on physical, interchange based on enemy lineup.
#AkaiBuild

Aldous.name: Aldous
Aldous.description: A guard of the Minos Labyrinth, who kept his pledge even after the kingdoms fall. He has blocked off intruders who covered the kingdoms heritage for a century with an unusually huge arm.Guardian of the Minoan Maze

skills.name: Contract : Transform
skills.description: After every 2 Basic Attacks, Aldous gain a 500 (+3*Soul Steal stacks) shield for 3s on his next Basic Attack.The effect can only be triggered once every 5s.

skills.name: Contract : Soul Steal
skills.description: Aldous unleashes his inner energy to enhanced his next Basic Attack to deal Physical Damage equal to 200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 (+100%Total Physical Attack) plus 5 times the number of Soul Steal stacks.If this attack kills an enemy hero/Siege Minion or other non-hero unit, Aldous will gain 10 / 10 / 4 stacks of Soul Steal (up to 650 stacks).The enhanced Basic Attack deals 300% extra Base Damage to Minions or Creeps. Aldous gets an extra 5 / 2 stack(s) of Soul Steal when a nearby enemy Siege Minion/other non-hero unit dies.

skills.name: Contract : Explosion
skills.description: Aldous assumes a defensive stance, gaining 30% Damage Reduction and 20% extra Movement Speed for 2s or until manual cancellation.He then deals 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+20% Total Physical Attack)–200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.5-1s (scales with defensive stance duration).

skills.name: Contract : Chase Fate
skills.description: Aldous gains vision of all enemies for 5s. During this time, if Aldous uses this skill again, he can dash toward an enemy hero.When Aldous hits that enemy hero, he will deal Physical Damage equal to 250 / 320 / 400 plus 8% of the target's Max HP and knock the enemy back for 1s. (Aldous can interrupt target's Recall during the dash).

builds.author: Streamer XK.Penjahat
builds.description: EXP: Go for kills early game, able to tank and DPS in late game#AldousBuild

builds.author: No.1 Good
builds.description: #AldousBuild

Alice.name: Alice
Alice.description: Alice was born in the era of strife long ago. As an illegitimate daughter, she suffered humiliation since she was a child, bewitched by the demons. Alice provoked disputes within the family, eventually taking control of the entire family and leading all of its members to betray the Lord of Light. But their betrayal triggered a divine punishment and turned him into blood demons. As a result, Alice led them to join the Abyss and they had fought for the darkness ever since.Cunning and sinister Blood Demon Queen

skills.name: Blood Ancestry
skills.description: Alice restore 1.5% Max Mana per second, which increases to 3% when in combat againts enemy heroes.Each time Alice levels up, her Movement Speed increases by 3 and Healing Received increaces by 1%

skills.name: Flowing Blood
skills.description: Alice casts a sphere of blood energy in the target direction, dealing 400 / 440 / 480 / 520 / 560 / 600 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.Use Again: Alice immediately teleports to the blood sphere's location.

skills.name: Blood Awe
skills.description: Alice deals 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+75% Total Magic Power) plus 3.5 (+0.3% Total Mana)% of the target Max HP as Magic Damage to nearby enemies, immobilizes them for 0.5s.After this immobilize effect ends, the targets will be slowed by 70% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Blood Ode
skills.description: Alice enters the blood-draining state, consuming 60 / 110 / 160 Mana and dealing 30 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s.She also recovers 40 / 70 / 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) HP each time she damages an enemy (only 50% of the HP for other enemy units).For each non-Minion enemy hits, the cooldown of Flowing Blood is reduced by 0.2s and the cooldown of Blood Awe is reduced by 0.5s.

builds.author: Pro Player: ONIC.SANZ
builds.description: Mid Lane: Balanced damage and sustain. use Winter Truncheon to stay alive.#AliceBuild

builds.author: Pro Analyst: Lyrick
builds.description: Great Mana Regen & Sustained damage in Late Game.#AliceBuild

Alpha.name: Alpha
Alpha.description: A pure cyborg made by Laboratory 1718. Tasked with hunting down and slaying Saber by its creator, Alpha's burning hatred for Saber makes him a candidate for the role.A pure cyborg made by Laboratory 1718.

skills.name: Beta, Advance!
skills.description: When Alpha uses a skill, Beta will be summoned to attack. Enemies that are hit by Beta 2 time(s) will be Locked On.Locked On: After Alpha deals damage to the target, Beta will fire a laser at them, dealing 80 (+80%Extra Physical Attack) (+8*Hero Level) True Damage and briefly applying a powerful slow effect.

skills.name: Rotary Impact
skills.description: Alpha unleashes an energy wave in the target direction, dealing 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path and slowing them by 40% for 1s.Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 60 / 72 / 84 / 96 / 108 / 120 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) True Damage.

skills.name: Force Swing
skills.description: After a short delay, Alpha swings his blade in the target direction, dealing 180 / 244 / 318 / 372 / 436 / 500 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and recovering 40 / 72 / 104 / 136 / 178 / 200 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) HP for each enemy hit.Beta then strafes enemies in the same area, dealing 60 / 72 / 84 / 96 / 108 / 120 (+30 Total Physical Attack) True Damage.

skills.name: Spear of Alpha
skills.description: Beta dives into target location, dealing 100 / 150 / 200 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s. Alpha then leaps towards the same location, knocking enemies in his path airborne and carrying them to the landing location.Alpha then slams down, dealing 250 / 375 / 500 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing the enemies by 40% for 1.5s.Beta then strafes enemies in the same area 5 times, dealing 15 / 22 / 30 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) True Damage each time.

builds.author: Pro Player: EVOS.Saykots
builds.description: EXP: Grows in power as fights go on. Can take and dish out damage.#AlphaBuild

builds.author: Pro Player: AE Celiboy
builds.description: Jungle: Balanced Damage & Survivebility.#AlphaBuild

Alucard.name: Alucard
Alucard.description: Alucard's father was a comrade-in-arms of Tigreal who disappeared in a battle with the Demons. Which fueled his hatred towards darkness and led him to join the Monastery of Light, and swore to destory all Demons. But later he learned the hidden secrets of the monastery thus left the Monastery of Light in anger to fought the darkness in his own way.Demon hunter who detests the darkness

skills.name: Pursuit
skills.description: After each skill cast, Alucard's next Basic Attack allows him to dash to the target's location and deals (140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Groundsplitter
skills.description: Alucard rolls to the target location and slams his blade on the ground, dealing 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 / 370 (+110% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Whirling Smash
skills.description: Alucard launches a whirling slash, dealing 345 / 390 / 435 / 480 / 525 / 570 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Fission Wave
skills.description: PASSIVE: Alucard permanently gains 10% / 20% / 30% Hybrid LifestealACTIVE: Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target area, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% & Hybrid Defense by 10. Alucard gains 10 / 15 / 20 Hybrid Defense for each enemy hero hit, and reduces the cooldown of other skills to 50% for 6s.Use Again: Alucard releases a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 400 / 550 / 700 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.

builds.author: Stremer: Yifan
builds.description: Jungle: New CD Reduction & Critical Build that enhance Basic Attack Damage.#AlucardBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Celiboy
builds.description: Jungle : Standard damage-focused build.#AlucardBuild

Angela.name: Angela
Angela.description: An android created by the founder of Laboratory 1718, Dr. Baker. It was the first life form created without using human body or soul. In order to gain the knowledge of her, other scientists in the lab went after Dr. Baker. Before taken away, Dr. Baker stuffed her into a flight capsule to escape.Artificial human made in Laboratory 1718

skills.name: Smart Heart
skills.description: Angela gains 7.5% extra Movement Speed for 4s each time she casts a skill (up to 30%). When she's attached to an allied hero, the Movement Speed boost is transferred to the allied hero.

skills.name: Love Waves
skills.description: Angela sends Love Waves in the target direction, dealing 170 / 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit, revealing their positions briefly, and applying a stack of Lover's Mark (up to 5 stacks). Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the damage by 20% and slows enemies hit by 8% for 3s.Love Waves also restore 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 / 190 / 200 (+75% Total Magic Power) HP to allied heroes hit. Angela can store up to 5 charges of this skill and the recharge time is affected by Cooldown Reduction.

skills.name: Puppet-On-A-String
skills.description: Angela launches a Puppet String at the target enemy, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and gradually slowing them up to 80%.If the enemy is still connected to the string after 3s, they'll be immobilized for 1.5s and dealt 450 / 495 / 540 / 585 / 630 / 675 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.Each stack of Lover's Mark increases the final damage by 20%.

skills.name: Heartguard
skills.description: Angela begins channeling, applying a 1000 / 1300 / 1600 (+200% / 300% Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 6s to the target allied hero regardless of distance.After the channeling is complete, she attaches herself to the allied hero for 12s, during which she can cast skills at zero Mana cost.Angela can cast this skill again to cancel the channeling or detach herself from the allied hero. The attaching state will end early if the allied hero is killed.

builds.author: Pro Player: AE REKT
builds.description: Roaming: Good Sustainability. #AngelaBuild

builds.author: No.1 Seraphine
builds.description: #AngelaBuild

Argus.name: Argus
Argus.description: Argus and Rafaela are a pair of twin angels. Yet the angels of legend are all female, making Argus something of an outcast. While the Monastery of Light utilizes his powers to eradicate all heresy, it's never even acknowledged his existence. While Argus despises humankind, holding it in the utmost disdain, he once came into possession of a demonic blade in the midst of a battle and at that moment realized that he too was a son of man. That he was orphaned when his parents were slain by other humans. Under the demonic blade's curse he was overcome by resentment, falling into a demonic state himself as he became the Dark Angel.The angel who fell from light into darkness.

skills.name: Warmonger
skills.description: When Argus' Demonic Blade reaches 100 Malice Energy, he will launch a Demonic Slash with his next Basic Attack, dealing 200 (+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 200 (+10%Total Physical Attack) HP. This attack ignores 40% of the target's Physical Defense.Argus' Demonic Blade gains 5 Malice Energy per second, and each of his Basic Attacks grants 10 Malice Energy (critically strikes grant an additional 5 energy).

skills.name: Demonic Grip
skills.description: Argus stretches out demonic hand in the target direction, dealing 125 / 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hero or Creep hit, stunning them for 0.7s and pulling him and the target toward each other.If no enemy hit, Argus pull himself toward the hand's destination instead.Use Again: Argus dashes and strikes in the target direction, dealing 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 / 300 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path.

skills.name: Meteoric Sword
skills.description: After a short delay, Argus thrusts his Demonic Blade in the target direction, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 400 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (200% damage against Minions) and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 0.8s. The delay time will decrease as Argus' Attack Speed increases.Enemy heroes hit will be  Cursed for 4s, during which they will leave a Cursed Trail behind. Argus gains 40% Movement Speed while on a Cursed Trail. Argus' Basic Attack on Cursed targets will grant double Malice Energy.Meteoric Sword damage counts as Basic Attack Damage and can trigger Attack Effects.

skills.name: Eternal Evil
skills.description: Argus removes all debuffs on himself (except for Suppression) and enters the Eternal Evil state, gaining Death Immunity for 4s. While in this state, 100% of his damage dealt to enemy heroes will converted into HP for him once the state ends.Leaving Eternal Evil state also resets enemy Turrets' damage increase against Argus.PASSIVE: Permanently increase the recharge of Malice Energy by 4 per second.

builds.author: Pro Player: EVOS.Saykots
builds.description: EXP: Full on offense build with high burst damage against back line enemies.

Arlott.name: Arlott
Arlott.description:
Ostracized for this half-demon and half-human lineage, the young Arlott joined the Demons in the Barren Lands but was betrayed by his demonic brethren during battle. However, after he was gravely wounded, he was saved by a human girl named Mila. During their time together, Mila's innocence and sincerity gradually changed his view on humans. This was not to last, however, as the Church of Light executed Mira for heresy. Arlott slaughtered every living soul in the Church before he laid Mila's body to rest in the lakeside forest.A
demon human hybrid wielding two lances with a thirst for vengeance
against both the Church and demons.

skills.name: Demon Gaze
skills.description: Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 8s.The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero every 8s.

skills.name: Dauntless Strike
skills.description: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning targets in the area.Targets hit by the further part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

skills.name: Vengeance
skills.description: Arlott charges at an enemy and deals 135 / 175 / 215 / 255 / 295 / 335 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).If Arlott's target is Marked, this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown , and restore (+5%/6%/7%/8%/9%/10% Total HP) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).

skills.name: Final Slash
skills.description: Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400 / 600 / 800 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area and pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location.

builds.author: Pro Player: HB.Sepat
builds.description: EXP: Balanced CD Reduction, damage and survivability. #ArlottBuild

builds.author: Streamer: XK Penjahat
builds.description: Exp: Cast Skill 2 after Each CC. #ArlottBuild

Atlas.name: Atlas
Atlas.description: Atlas is one of the ancient Abysmal Sea creature, sealed in the deep sea by the Ancient Ones. Atlas found the Mecha built by Iceland Golems in the Abysmal Sea in the past. By integrating with the Mecha, Atlas escaped the Abysmal Sea and came to the seas around the world to absorb knowledge. It looks forward to the day when it is able to break the prohibition, so that is own kind can be free.Abysmal Sea creature who broke free from the seal

skills.name: Frigid Breath
skills.description: Atlas generates Frigid Breath around him for 5s each time he casts a skill. Enemies affected by Frigid Breath will have their Movement Speed gradually reduced over 3s, after which they'll be frozen for 0.5s.Atlas gain 11-25 extra Physical & Magic Defense when Frigid Breath is present.

skills.name: Annihilate
skills.description: Atlas smashes the ground and causes 3 explosions. Each explosion deals 215 / 250 / 285 / 320 / 355/ 390 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.Ejected State: If Atlas has ejected from his Mecha Sentry, both himself and his Mecha will cast Annihilate.

skills.name: Perfect Match
skills.description: Atlas enters Ejected State, gaining 40% Movement SPD and immunity to Slowing Effects. In this state, the Mecha Sentry will follow the pilot at an increasing speed (can only be controlled by Suppression). Once they meet, Atlas will return to the Mecha dealing 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 / 420 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby and stunning them for 1s.Ejected State: Atlas and his mecha share the same HP bar and reduce 50% of the damage taken in this state.

skills.name: Fatal Links
skills.description: Atlas hurls chains around and starts to channel (can only be interrupted by suppressing) dealing 225 / 350 / 475 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy heroes hit and slowing them by 40% for 3s.Use the skill again while channeling: Atlas will drag the targets towards him and plunk them down on the designated location, dealing 360 / 560 / 760 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.Using this skill in Ejected State: The Mecha Sentry will return to Atlas immediately, but the stun effect will be replaced by 40% Slowing Effect.

builds.author: Pro Player: HB Xorn
builds.description: Roaming: Balanced speed and survivability. Quick initiator with great CC. #AtlasBuild

builds.author: Stremer: Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Roaming: Tank, charge into any situation with Ultimate. #AtlasBuild

Aulus.name: Aulus
Aulus.description: Aulus longed to become a warrior, and for that, the other Leonins had taunted him and his battleaxe. To prove his powers, Aulus held back his rage, left his clan, and went on a journey to achieve great feats. But as a Leonin, all he ever faced was prejudice and injustice from the world. No longer able to bear it, Aulus headed toward the Lantis Mountains alone to hunt demons. Here, his strong rage awoke the slumbering battleaxe and henceforth they fought side by side to prove themselves, and the power of Leonins.A Leonin warrior that fights to prove himself.

skills.name: Fighting Spirit
skills.description: Aulus's Basic Attack adds a stack of Fighting Spirit to his axe per second for 3s after dealing damage to any enemy (up to 4 stacks). Each stack grants 3-12 extra Physical Attack and 1–4 Physical Penetration (scales with Undying Fury level).Aulus also gains 10% extra Movement Speed and 27–125 Basic Attack Damage at max Fighting Spirit stacks (scale with level).

skills.name: Aulus, Charge!
skills.description: Aulus removes all slow effects and gains 30% / 34% / 38% / 42% / 46% / 50% extra Movement Speed and 20% Damage Reduction against attacks from the front for 5s.Aulus gain 1% Damage Reduction for every 10 extra Physical Attack, up to 60%.

skills.name: The Power of Axe
skills.description: Aulus brandishes his axe, dealing 150 / 230 / 310 / 390 / 470 / 550 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area, and enhancing up to 6 of his next Basic Attacks for 3s according to the enemies hit (3 per Hero or Creep, 1 for Minion). Enhanced Basic Attacks gain 100% extra Attack Speed and restores 50 HP to Aulus.

skills.name: Undying Fury
skills.description: PASSIVE: Every time Undying Fury is upgraded, Aulus crafts a part for his axe in order.Blade Craft: Permanently increases his Basic Attacks' Physical Damage by 35.Hammer Craft: Permanently increases his Crit Chance by 10%.Handle Craft: Permanently increases his Attack Range by 65% and the range of The Power of Axe.ACTIVE: Aulus raises his axe and smashes it to the ground, dealing 210 / 250 / 290 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a line and slowing them by 90% for 0.5s.A burning trail that lasts for 5s is left on the ground, dealing 90 / 110 / 130 (+40% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies who walk on it every 0.5s and slowing them by 70%.

builds.author: Pro Player: AE Celiboy
builds.description: Jungle: Standard damage and mobility build. #AulusBuild

builds.author: Stremer: Yifan
builds.description: Jungle: New CD Reduction & Crit build. Farm Early to carry late game. #AulusBuild

Aurora.name: Aurora
Aurora.description: Aurora is a powerful ice magician. During her battle with Zhask, she fell in love with General Tobias who she fought together with. But Tobias died in the battle. In order to take revenge and find a way to resurrect her lover, Aurora guarded Queens Peak by herself from then on.A powerful ice magician waiting to take revenge on Zhask

skills.name: Pride Of Ice
skills.description: Aurora gains a stack of Frost Energy on each skill cast. At 3 stacks, her next skill will freeze enemies hit for 1.5s.Aurora's skills deal 20% extra damage to frozen enemies.

skills.name: Frost Shock
skills.description: Aurora fires an icicle in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 (+200%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 25% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Bitter Frost
skills.description: Deals 450 / 510 / 570 / 630 / 690 / 750 (+160% Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target enemy and slows them by 80% for 1.5s

skills.name: Cold Destruction
skills.description: Summons a giant icy meteorite to strike at the target location dealing 800 / 1000 / 1200 (+240% Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 90% for 1.5s.Enemies near the area will also take 400 / 500 / 600 (+120%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 60% for 1.5s.

builds.author: Pro Player: ONIC.SANZ
builds.description: Mid: Gank lanes whenever Ultimate is Ready. #AuroraBuild

builds.author: No.1 Yolaa
builds.description: #AuroraBuild

Badang.name: Badang
Badang.description: Born in the Vonetis Islands off the southern part of the mainland. Originally just an ordinary villager, after defeating the water monster that was harassing the village, he gained huge power from the water monster. After that, Badang set out to the mountains of the southern Moniyan Empire where the Abyss was entrenched, hoping to completely solve the problem of the water source being contaminated by the Abyss.Island hero who gained supernatural power after defeating the water monster

skills.name: Chivalry Fist
skills.description: After every 4 Basic Attacks, Badang's next Basic Attack deals 50 (+30%Total Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocks them back. Enemies that are knocked into obstacles will be stunned for 0.6s (minions and creeps are stunned directly).Fist Wind generated by Badang's skills can also trigger this effect.

skills.name: Fist Wind
skills.description:
Badang unleashes a gust of Fist Wind in the target direction, dealing 125 / 145 / 165 / 185 / 205 / 225 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit, slowing them by 30% for 1.5s, and knocking them back.The Fist Wind will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 100 / 115 / 130 / 145 / 160 /175 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.Fist Wind can trigger attack effects and grants Badang 1 Chivalry Fist stack upon cast.
Badang stores up to 2 Fist Wind charges and restores 1 charge every 10.4s.

skills.name: Fist Break
skills.description: Badang dashes in the target direction, dealing 230 / 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 (+50%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path while gaining a 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 (+150%Total Physical Attack) shield that lasts 5s.He stops immediately upon hitting an enemy hero, slightly knocking them back while creating an obstacle that lasts 4s behind them.Enemies hit by the obstacle are dealt 130 / 140 / 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.Use Again: Badang removes the obstacle he created.

skills.name: Fist Crack
skills.description: Badang throws a flurry of punches in the target direction, dealing 60 / 90 / 120 (+54% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit multiple times (can trigger attack effects). The Fist Wind generated by the punches will explode upon hitting an obstacle, dealing 30 / 45 / 60 (+27% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.Badang is immune to control effects for the duration.

builds.author: Streamer : XK Penjahat
builds.description: Exp Lane : Deadly in 1v1. Stay close to walls for more damage and CC. #BadangBuild

builds.author: No.1 ####jjom
builds.description: #BadangBuild

Balmond.name: Balmond
Balmond.description: Balmond is the leader of the Orcs, leading the Orc army against the invasion of the Demons. During a battle, he consumed the blood of a Blood Demon and went into a rage. This aroused Alice's interest, so she signed a contract with Balmond on the condition of returning the Stormeye Wasteland. Balmond and his Orc army have since fought for the Demons.Leader of the Orc Legion

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.description: Balmond recovers 5% Max HP on Minion or Creep, and 20% Max HP after killing a hero.

skills.name: Soul Lock
skills.description: Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be slightly knocked back and slowed by 60% for 2s.

skills.name: Cyclone Sweep
skills.description: Balmond gains 15% Movement Speed that decay over time whilst spins with his axe for 3s, continuously dealing 25 / 40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies up to 14 times. Each subsequent hit on the same enemy will deal 12.5% increased damage (up to 100%). The Physical Attack bonus portion of the damage can critically strike.

skills.name: Lethal Counter
skills.description: Balmond unleashed a huge strike in the target direction (cannot be Interrupted), dealing True Damage equal to 150 (+70%Total Physical Attack) plus {30% / 37.5% / 45%} of the target's lost HP.This skill deals up to 1000 / 1500 / 2000 damage to non-hero enemies.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS Sutsujin
builds.description: Jungle: Focus on defense. Good at stealing map objectives. #BalmondBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kairi
builds.description: Jungle: Balanced damage and defense. #BalmondBuild

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description: Bane is a pirate stationed in the Frozen Ocean. He once ruthlessly ruled the vast seas of the Northern Vale. He was a sworn enemy of Franco, later suffering a defeat at Franco's hands. By chance, he became the half-man, half-octopus he is today.Cruel pirate leader, Franco's sworn enemy

skills.name: Shark Bite
skills.description: Bane infuses his weapon with a stack of Tidal Energy each time he uses a skill (up to 2 stacks). Each of his subsequent Basic Attacks consumes a stack to deal Physical Damage equal to (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus 3.5 (+0.3 × Hero Level)% of the targets Max HP to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Crab Claw Cannon
skills.description: Bane fires his Crab Claw Cannon in the target direction, dealing 150 / 190 / 230 / 270 / 310 / 350 (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and then 150% damage to a random enemy behind them (prioritizes enemy heroes).Enemies hit are slowed by 10 (+10% Total Magic Power)% for 1s.Every 100 Physical Attack that Bane possesses reduces this skill's cooldown by an additional 8%.

skills.name: Ale
skills.description: Bane chugs his ale, recovering 200 (+150% Total Magic Power) plus 5~10 (+1.5% Total Magic Power)% of his lost HP and gaining 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.Use Again: Bane spits venom in the target direction, dealing 250 / 290 / 330 / 370 / 410 / 450 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage (scales up to 150% with charging time) to enemies in a fan-shaped area.Every 100 Magic Power Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 7%.

skills.name: Deadly Catch
skills.description: Bane summons a school of sharks to charge in a target direction, dealing 600 / 800 / 1000 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+170% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, knocking them airborne for 0.8s, and slowing them by 65% (decays over 3s).This skill deals 40% of damage to turrets.

builds.author: Pro Player : BTR Saken
builds.description: Gold Lane: Good sustainability and poke. #BaneBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kairi
builds.description: Jungle: Extremely high burst damage. #BaneBuild

Barats.name: Barats
Barats.description: They are obsessed with money and riches. Barats was born in such a Politan village, and he was born a naughty boy. Everyone in the village is annoyed by this trouble maker. And such a childish personality didn't change after Barats grew up. He had the same lust for money as his kind, but Barats hated learning and working. He would spend his entire day dreaming that he could miraculously get rich overnight.Mischievious Politans but true to his friend Datona

skills.name: Big Guy
skills.description: Detona gains a stack of Big Guy for 12s each time it or Barats damages an enemy with their skills (up to 10 stacks).Each stack of Big Guy grants Detona increased body size, with 4-10 extra Hybrid Defense (Scales with Detona's Welcome), and 5% extra Resilience.At Max stacks, Detona's Basic Attacks will be replaced with Trample, each attack dealing (+140%Total Physical Attack)(+3.5%Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in a circular area and slowing them by 40% for 0.2s & refreshes the Duration of Big Guy with each hit.

skills.name: So-Called Teamwork
skills.description: Detona spits contaminated oil in the target direction, dealing 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+7%Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.In 0.5s Following up Barats then ignites the oil with a firecracker, dealing 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 (+200%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area.The area of effect of So-Called Teamwork increases with Big Guy stacks.

skills.name: Missile Expert
skills.description: Barats fires two missiles in the target direction Dealing 100 / 115 / 130 / 145 / 160 / 175  (+75%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 40% for 1s.The missiles expel fumes from their exhaust upon landing, dealing 100 / 115 / 130 / 145 / 160 / 175 (+75%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and pushing them toward Barats.

skills.name: Detona's Welcome
skills.description: After a short delay, Detona charge up the skill (Immune to CC) and stampede when release, sprinting to the target direction dealing 120 / 160 / 200  (+70%Total Physical Attack)(+1.2% total HP) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, devouring and suppressing them for 1.2s before spitting them out.Target Spitted out, Upon hitting another enemy hero or wall will cause an explosion, dealing 180 / 240 / 300 (+105%Total Physical Attack)(+1.8% total HP) Physical Damage and Stunned for 1s locks onto the target enemy hero and devours them after a 1.2s delay, suppressing them for 1s while gaining 3 stacks of Big Guy.For the duration, Barats recovers up to 30% HP, becomes immune to control effects, but cannot move. Detona then spits the enemy out 3.5 units in the target direction, dealing them 120 / 160 / 200 (+70%Total Physical Attack)(+1.2%Total HP) Physical Damage.If the enemy hits an enemy hero or a wall, they and nearby enemies will take an extra 150 / 200 / 250 (+80% Total Physical Attack)(+1.5%Total HP) Physical Damage and be stunned for 1s.Pressing the Ultimate button charges up the skill, during which Barats is immune to Control. Canceling the cast refunds 60% Cooldown.)PASSIVE: Detona gains 4 / 7 / 10 stacks of Big Guy upon respawn.

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Celiboy
builds.description: Jungle : Standard defense-focused build. #BaratsBuild

builds.author: No.1 ciio no more
builds.description: #BaratsBuild

Beatrix.name: Beatrix
Beatrix.description: A young inventor girl born with a silver spoon in her mouth. But she's a genius in more than just science: she excels in battle too, and joined forced with the Eruditio Rangers to shut down the 1718 Lab's plot.Confident Inventor Girl

skills.name: Mechanical Genius : Renner
skills.description: Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.Renner Basic Attack - Longshot: Fire a powerful shot in the enemy's current direction, dealing (365% Total Physical Attack)-(400%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first target hit (this shot can be dodged, or blocked by others). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 1 Physical Attack.

skills.name: Masterful Gunner
skills.description: PASSIVE: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her Physical Attack by 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30ACTIVE: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate

skills.name: Tactical Reposition
skills.description: Beatrix rolls forward while fully reloading her current weapon.

skills.name: Ultimate : Renner's Apathy
skills.description: Beatrix calmly setup Renner on the battlefield and takes aim. When releasing the skill, she deals 700 / 950 / 1200 (+280%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit.Beatrix can aim for up to 8s and she can cancel it early to reduce the cooldown for 50%.This shot penetrate Minions and only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

skills.name: Need Backup
skills.description: Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

skills.name: Mechanical Genius : Bennet
skills.description: Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.Bennett Basic Attack - Area Bombing: Bombard an area, dealing (232% Total Physical Attack)-(330% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in that area and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s (deals 75% damage to Creeps).Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 1 Physical Attack

skills.name: Mechanical Genius : Wesker
skills.description: Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.Wesker Basic Attack - Proximity Advantage: Fire 5 shots at the target, each dealing (178% Total Physical Attack)-(220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (inherit a portion of Attack Effects). Damage dealt to targets hit multiple times decays to 25%. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 1 Physical Attack

skills.name: Mechanical Genius : Nibiru
skills.description: Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.Nibiru Basic Attack - Rapid Fire: Let loose a volley of 4 shots, each shot dealing (51% Total Physical Attack)-(65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (Inherit a portion of Attack Effects) Deals 75% damage to Creeps.Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 1 Physical Attack.

skills.name: Ultimate : Bennett's Rage
skills.description: Beatrix focuses her rage, and has Bennett rain down a bombardment in a set area 5 time(s). Each bombardment slows enemies by 40% and deals 580 / 780 / 980 (+225% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this damage decaying to 20% when hitting the same target multiple times), lasting 1s.This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

skills.name: Ultimate : Wesker's Elation
skills.description: Beatrix raises Wesker and fires off ultra-bullets that deal 350 / 450 / 550 (+155% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each time they hit an enemy (the damage of subsequent hits on the same enemy decays by 25%)This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

skills.name: Ultimate : Nibiru's Passion
skills.description: Beatrix unleashed 10 volleys of bullets using Nibiru, each dealing 130 / 170 / 210 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

builds.author: Pro Player : Sasa
builds.description: Gold Lane: Get Blade of Despair & Malefic Roar and focus on finishing off enemies. #BeatrixBuild

builds.author: Streamer : Uncle Chikanook Gamer
builds.description: Gold lane: Attack-focused with some Attack Speed. Any weapon can be useful. #BeatrixBuild

Belerick.name: Belerick
Belerick.description: The descendants of the ancient tribe were once guided by the voice of the ancient tribe to the western desert, where they overdrew on their life force and turned into an oasis, bringing hope to the desperate Minoan survivors, and later using their lives to save the tree of life of the elves, achieving rebirth.Kind and fraternal elemental creatures

skills.name: Deadly Thorns
skills.description: For every 50 damage inflicted upon Belerick, he has a 25% chance to shoot the nearest enemy unit, dealing Magic Damage equal to 55 (+5 × Hero Level) plus 1.8% of his Max HP (scales with level).This attack can be triggered once every 0.4s.His HP obtained from Equipment and Emblems is increased by 30%.

skills.name: Ancient Seed
skills.description: Belerick releases vines in a designated direction, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on the path and slow them down by 25%.Ancient Seeds left by the vines will erupt into thorns after 1s, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on the path and taunt them for 1.2s.Deals 80% extra damage against Minions.

skills.name: Nature's Strike
skills.description: Belerick increases his Movement Speed by 80% and enhances his next Basic Attack. (The Movement Speed gain will decay in 2s.)This enhanced Basic Attack deals 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1.4s.Belerick also recovers HP equal to 240 plus 10% of his lost HP.Each time Deadly Thorns is triggered, it will reduce the cooldown of this skill by 1s.

skills.name: Wrath Of Dryad
skills.description: Belerick conjures spreading vines around him, dealing 100 / 150 / 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area 4 times and taunting them for 1.5s.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kiboy
builds.description: Roaming: Tank-Focused to survive and deal counter damage & CC. #BelerickBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.CW
builds.description: Gold Lane : Standard defense-focused build. #BelerickBuild

Benedetta.name: Benedetta
Benedetta.description: Ever since Benedetta and her team started their campaign in the Rantha region. Whenever she draws “Alecto”, the rampaging monsters will scatter in fear of this long sharpened sword infused with unstoppable power. People call her the Ranger Leader who walks in the shadow, Protector of the Despair Place. She has earned everyone’s admiration of respect in this desolate wasteland.Shadow Ranger

skills.name: Elapsed Daytime
skills.description: When holding down the Basic Attack button, Benedetta enters the Swordout state and keeps gathering the Sword Intent.If releasing the Basic Attack button after the Sword Intent is fully charged, Benedetta will use Swordout Slash in the direction she's facing and dash forward, dealing (+215% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on the path (counts as Skill Damage and is reduced to 50% on Minion and Creeps).Only when Benedetta is in Swordout state and her Sword Intent is fully charged and she is in Swordout Slash state by holding down the Basic Attack button.Benedetta can also gain Sword Intent when dealing damage via Basic Attack and Skills.

skills.name: Phantom Slash
skills.description: Benedetta withdraws swiftly and leaves a shadow in front. After a short delay, her shadow slashes forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing the enemies by 60% for 0.5s.Meanwhile, Benedetta dashes forward to slash, dealing 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. (If the target is hit by her shadow, damage caused by Benedetta herself will increase to 200%.)

skills.name: An Eye for An Eye
skills.description: Benedetta raises her weapon to defend, gaining Control Immunity and blocking damage from any source for 0.8s. After this, she stabs in the designated direction, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.If Benedetta successfully fends off any damage while defending, she will gain full Sword Intent. If she fends off any control effects, her subsequent stab stuns the target for 1.5s.

skills.name: Alecto: Final Blow
skills.description: Benedetta clenches Alecto and dashes forward (Benedetta is untargetable during the dash) and perform a slash after a short delay, detonating the Sword Intent along the path.For 2.5s, the Sword Intent deals up to a total of 1560 / 1820 / 2080 (+1105% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and slow them by 50%.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Smooth
builds.description: Exp Lane: Powerful burst & Lifesteal. Great for finishing enemies. #BenedettaBuild

builds.author: No.1 Cuz.
builds.description: #BenedettaBuild

Brody.name: Brody
Brody.description:
Brody lost his memory and wandered aimlessly between the villages of the Barren Lands, but there was always a voice in his heart asking him to hunt the Demons. In countless battles, Brody gradually recalled his past. Once, because of his mistakes, his village was massacred by the Demons and his right hand was also corroded. Now he understands his mission, in order to protect the people around him, Brody will always be fighting in a foreign land.Mysterious
man whose right hand was corroded and who lost his memory

skills.name: Abyss Corrosion
skills.description: With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus.Each Basic Attack deals (140% Total Physical Attack)(+45 × Hero Level) Physical Damage (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and inflicts 1 stack of Abyss Mark on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.Each stack of Abyss Mark increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.

skills.name: Abyss Impact
skills.description: Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150 / 230 / 310 / 390 / 470 / 550 (+170% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of Abyss Mark.As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% slow effect, and applies an additional stack of Abyss Mark, capped at 130% damage, 45% slow effect, and 4 stacks.This skill deals only 80% damage to Minions.

skills.name: Corrosive Strike
skills.description: Brody dashes to an enemy, dealing 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 / 350 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target, stunning the target for 0.8s, and inflicting 1 stack of Abyss Mark on the target.Upon hitting the target, he is able to move one more time in the movement direction, gaining 45% Movement Speed that will decay rapidly in 1.2s.

skills.name: Torn-Apart Memory
skills.description: Brody locks on all the targets within 8 units, dealing 340 / 460 / 580 (+180% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them.If the target has an Abyss Mark, all Abyss Marks will be reset, dealing 136 / 184 / 232 (+72% Extra Physical Attack) plus 4% of the target's lost HP for each stack the target has.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Sasa
builds.description: Gold Lane: Extremely high damage to burst down enemies. #BrodyBuild

builds.author: Streamer : Nananakstream
builds.description: Gold Lane: Get the equipment you need faster.  #BrodyBuild

Bruno.name: Bruno
Bruno.description: Born into poverty, Bruno lost his legs in an accident, after which Eruditio created a pair of artificial legs for him. In gratitude to the City of Scholars, Bruno vowed to guard the city for the rest of his life.The boy who guards Euroditio with football

skills.name: Mecha Legs
skills.description:
Bruno gains 2% extra Crit Chance each time he deals damage with his skills (up to 10 stacks).

Bruno has higher Physical Attack but only gains 80% extra Attack Speed from all sources.

skills.name: Volley Shot
skills.description: Bruno kicks a Powerball on his next Basic Attack, dealing 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and slowing them by 30%,  and speeding up to 30% for 0.5s.The Powerball then bounces back toward Bruno and lands on the ground. He or allied heroes can retrieve the Powerball for another attack and reduce the cooldown of Flying Tackle by 1s.

skills.name: Flying Tackle
skills.description: Bruno makes a slide tackle in the target direction dealing 140 / 165 / 190 / 215 / 240 / 265 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and stunning them for 0.5s.If the Powerball is bouncing back, Bruno also draws the Powerball toward him.

skills.name: Worldie
skills.description: Bruno kicks his Energy Ball at the target enemy hero, 250 / 350 / 450 (+83% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking them back.The Energy Ball then bounces between nearby enemies up to 10 times, each time dealing 150 / 210 / 270 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.Each hit also reduces the enemy's Physical Defense by 4%–8% for 8s (up to 3 stacks).

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.CW
builds.description: Gold Lane: Extremly high burst damage. #BrunoBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : RRQ SKYLAR
builds.description: Gold Lane : Extremely high damage for nonstop eliminations. #BrunoBuild

Carmilla.name: Carmilla
Carmilla.description: As a human, Carmilla fell in love with Cecilion, who was a Blood Demon, but cruel reality separated them, Carmilla had already guessed the identity of Cecilion. Even so, she wanted to be with Cecilion, so she chose to commit suicide. When she woke up, she found that she had become a Blood Demon, lying in the arms of her lover. From then on, the two of them stayed from the world together forever.Girl who became a Blood Demon for love

skills.name: Vampire Pact
skills.description: Each time Carmilla deals damage to an enemy, she steals 7-11 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) from them. The stolen Physical & Magic defense can stack up to 5 times and lasts 5s. However, Carmilla can only steal defense from the same enemy hero once every 5s.

skills.name: Crimson Flower
skills.description: Carmilla summons 2 Crimson Flowers that circle around her for 5s, dealing 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+50%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each time they hit an enemy and slowing them for 10% for 0.8s (the slow effect stacks up to 50%). The circling speed of the Crimson Flowers also increases with each hit. Carmilla recovers 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+35% Total Magic Power) HP each time a Crimson Flower deals damage (only recovers 30% of that amount when hitting Minions).

skills.name: Bloodbath
skills.description: Carmilla accumulates Bloodbath Energy, gaining 70% Movement Speed that decays over 4.5s.Use Again: Carmilla unleashes the accumulated Bloodbath Energy on the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.6s. The damage and stun duration scale with the accumulation time (up to 100%).

skills.name: Curse Of Blood
skills.description: Carmilla cast Curse of Blood on the target location, slowing enemies hit by 50%.After 0.8s enemies still within the area will take 450 / 600 / 750 (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, and will be immobilized for 1s, slowed by 15% and linked for 5s.When a linked enemy takes damage or becomes controlled, all the other linked targets takes 50% of the damage and become controlled for 100% of the duration.Enemies can move away from one another to break the link.

skills.name: Vermeil Shadow
skills.description: Cecilion summons Carmilla to become a Vermil Shadow to possess him, providing a 200 (+20 × Hero Level) shield.Use Again: Carmilla charges toward a designated location, gaining an equal shield, dealing 200 (+20 × Hero Level) Magic Damage to enemies within the area of effect. and slowing them by 30% for 1s. Meanwhile, she resets the cooldowns of her Crimson Flower Crimson Flower and Bloodbath Bloodbath.

builds.author: Pro Player : BTR Kyy
builds.description: Roaming : Standard defense-focused build. #CarmillaBuild

builds.author: No.1 Van
builds.description: Sustainability & Lifesteal #CarmillaBuild

Cecilion.name: Cecilion
Cecilion.description: As a blood demon, Cecilion in love with human girl Carmilla, but cruel reality made Cecilion give up on their love. After Cecilion left, Carmilla choose to commit suicide which made Cecilion desperately sad. He used his abilities to turn Carmilla into Blood Demon. From then on, the two of them stayed away in the world together forever.Carmilla's Blood Demon Lover

skills.name: Overflowing
skills.description: Cecilion gains 10 extra Max Mana and recovers 10 Mana each time his skill hits an enemy.Cooldown: 1s.Cecilion has higher Max Mana and Mana Regen, and his skill damage scales with his Max Mana.

skills.name: Bat Impact
skills.description: Cecilion command a giant bat to dive at the target location, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 1s while dealing 85 / 115 / 145 / 175 / 205 / 235 (+80% Total Magic Power)(+7% Total Mana) Magic Damage to enemies on its path and 170 / 230 / 290 / 350 / 410 / 470 (+160% Total Magic Power) (+14% Total Mana) extra Magic Damage to those near the landing point.Each subsequent cast within 6s increases this skill's Mana cost by 1.8 times (up to 4 stacks).

skills.name: Sanguine Claws
skills.description: Cecilion summons a pair of opposing claws at the target location that will clasp together after a short delay, pulling enemies in their paths to the center while dealing them 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+45% Total Magic Power)(+1.2% Total Mana) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1s.

skills.name: Bats Feast
skills.description: Cecilion unleashes his Blood Demon power, gaining 60% extra Movement Speed (decay over the duration) and Slow Immunity for 1.5s.Meanwhile, he fires 36 bolts of blood energy at nearby enemies, each dealing 35 / 36 / 45 (+8% Total Magic Power)(+0.3% Total Mana) Magic Damage to the enemy hit and slowing them by 3% (up to 30%) for 1s.Each bolt also restores 10 plus 1% of Cecilion's lost HP for him on hit.

skills.name: Moonlit Waltz
skills.description: When Carmilla is nearby, Cecilion can summon her to become a Vermil Shadow around him, granting him a 520-800 shield (scales with Carmilla's level).Carmilla can choose to leave Cecilion and charge at the target location, gaining an equal shield while dealing 520-800 Magic Damage (scales with level) to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Izanami
builds.description: Mid lane : Late-game carry with burst damage. #CecilionBuild

builds.author: Streamer : LiteMS
builds.description: Mid lane : Burst damage-focused, with extreme CC and DPS in teamfights. #CecilionBuild

Chang-e.name: Chang-e
Chang-e.description: The Great Dragon's youngest disciple. Because she was mischievous, the Great Dragon handed her over to Zilong for discipline. After Zilong took on the huge responsibility of protecting the Cadia Riverlands and left the Dragon Altar, Chang'e regained her willful nature. the Great Dragon was unable to bear it and drove her out of the Dragon Altar and ask her to help Zilong to make up for her mistake.Naughty and cute disciple of the Great Dragon

skills.name: Trouble Maker
skills.description: Each time Chang'e deals damage to an enemy, she leaves a mark on them. Each mark reduces the target Movement Speed by 1%, staking up to 20%.

skills.name: Starmoon Shockwave
skills.description: Chang'e sends an energy sphere in the target direction, dealing 350 / 380 / 410 / 440 / 470 / 500 (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies and slows them by 10% for 1.5s.Crescent Moon: The Crescent Moon will send 4 extra energy sphere along with Chang'e, each dealing 20% damage and slowing enemies hit. The slow effect can stack (up to 20%).

skills.name: Crescent Moon
skills.description: Chang'e summons the Crescent Moon, gaining a permanent 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield and 10% extra Movement Speed (that last until the shield is destroyed).Each time Chang'e casts a skill, she also gains 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.Crescent Moon also allows Chang'e's Basic Attacks to deals 20 (+35% Total Physical Attack) (+35% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage 2 times.Each time Change'e deals Magic damage with her Basic attack and skills, the cooldown of this skill is reduced by 0.2s.

skills.name: Meteor Shower
skills.description: Chang'e fires 30 meteors in the target direction over 4s, each dealing 60 / 75 / 90 (+33% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit. This skill deals 100% extra damage to Minions and Creeps.Chang'e also gains 10% Movement Speed for the durationCrescent Moon: The Crescent Moon also fires meteors along with Chang'e, each dealing 33% damage.

builds.author: Streamer : Raja Belit
builds.description: Mid lane : Sustained poke and slow with good burst damage.

Chou.name: Chou
Chou.description: Chou is a gifted martial artist born in the slums. He learned the ancient oriental martial arts under the tutelage of a mysterious monk. He is agile and skilled in the use of the nunchaku.A talented fighter with a heart of chivalry

skills.name: Only Fast
skills.description: After traveling 8 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot critically strike) and briefly slows the target by 80%.

skills.name: Jeet Kune Do
skills.description: Chou strikes in the target direction, dealing 180 / 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. This skill can be cast 3 times before it goes on cooldown. On the 3rd cast, Chou also knocks enemies hit airborne.Hitting an enemy hero with the 3rd cast resets the cooldown of Shunpo.

skills.name: Shunpo
skills.description: Chou dashes in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity during the dash.At the end of the dash, he gains 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 Physical Penetration and 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 / 350 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield for 2s.

skills.name: The Way Of Dragon
skills.description: Chou strikes the target enemy hero with a roundhouse kick, dealing 400 / 450 / 500 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking them back.Use Again:  Chou jumps to the target and launches a flurry of blows in mid-air, dealing at least 400 / 450 / 500 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK. Yums
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced burst damage and CC. Good at single-target eliminations.

builds.author: Pro Player : ECHO
builds.description: Roaming : Defense-focused build that protects allies and defends against enemy burst attacks.

Cici.name: Cici
Cici.description: Cici, the lead act of the Whimsical Wonders theater troupe, accompanied by her magical companion Yoyo, embarked on their annual tour. She resolved to bring fun and wonderment back to the city of Castle Aberleen.A cheerful performer who spreads fun and wonderment wherever she goes.

skills.name: Performer's Delight
skills.description: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement by 1% and Spell Vamp for 1% per stack up to 10 times. doubling the effects at full stacks.

skills.name: Yo-Yo Blitz
skills.description: Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times and dealing Physical Damage equal to 55 / 60 / 65 / 70 / 75 / 80 plus 3 (+1.3%Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP per hit.Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.

skills.name: Buoyant Bounce
skills.description: Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on an unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick direction.If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+40%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them.

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.description:
Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100 (+10%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 30%, and pulling together for 3s.
During this time, Cici can use Yo-Yo Blitz to attack both linked targets at the same time.If only one is within the range of Yo-Yo Blitz, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 20%

builds.author: Streamer : Yifan
builds.description: Exp Lane : High damage and mobility in teamfights. #CiciBuild

builds.author: No.1 Benji
builds.description: #CiciBuild

Claude.name: Claude
Claude.description: Claude grew up living in Los Pecados. The circumstances in his life forced him into becoming an incredible thief, but he was used by Kane and went to prison in chains. In prison, he met Merlin, the god of thieves, and inherited his mantle, successfully escaping from prison. After completing an agreement with Merlin, Claude returned to Los Pecados with his new partner Dexter, ready to take revenge on Kane.Excellent thief who comes and goes without a trace

skills.name: Battle Side-By-Side
skills.description: Dexter assists Claude on each of his Basic Attacks, dealing 20 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the same target (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).

skills.name: Art Of Thievery
skills.description: Claude emits a disruption wave in the target direction, dealing 160 / 185 / 210 / 235 / 260 / 285 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and reducing their Movement Speed by 20% / 20% / 25% / 25% / 30% / 30% and Attack Speed by 10% / 12% / 14% / 16% / 18% / 20%.For each target hit, Claude gains 4% extra Movement and Attack Speed (doubled for enemy hero) for 6s (up to 5 stacks).

skills.name: Battle Mirror Image
skills.description: Claude conjures a mirror image of Dexter at the target location that automatically attacks nearby enemies for 5.5s.The mirror image's Basic Attack deals 20 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and can trigger Claude's attack effects.Use Again: Claude switches places with the mirror image.

skills.name: Blazing Duet
skills.description: Claude and Dexter rapidly fire at nearby enemies for 3s, dealing 130 / 155 / 180 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to up to two enemies each shot (these attacks count as Basic Attacks).Claude also gains a 20 (+3% Total Physical Attack) shield each time the Ultimate deals damage to an enemy.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Cikugais
builds.description: Gold Lane : Focus on farming until you have both Demon Hunter Sword and Golden Staff. #ClaudeBuild

builds.author: Streamer : Feekz
builds.description: Gold Lane : Join teamfights at the right time to finish enemies off with Ultimate. #ClaudeBuild

Clint.name: Clint
Clint.description: Clint is a sheriff in a small western town. He ordered the execution of Kane's nephew Blandy. The residents were afraid of Kane, so they handed Blandy over to a gang and expelled Clint. But Blandy still didn't let the town go. Clint came out to guard the town in this time of crisis. After the matter was over, he went to Los Pecados to completely eradicate Kane's evil forces.A sharpshooter full of righteousness and justice.

skills.name: Double Shot
skills.description: After each skill cast, Clint's next Basic Attack with 4s penetrates a line of enemies, dealing 50 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.This damage can trigger attack effects, and the part affected by Physical Attack can critically strike.

skills.name: Quick Draw
skills.description: Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit.The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullet will take [11%-21%] less damage after the first bullet.

skills.name: Trapping Recoil
skills.description: Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 / 240 (+30% Total Physical Attack) (+150% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s.Successfully hitting and enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%.

skills.name: Grenade Bombardment
skills.description: Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes in the first enemy hit, dealing 280 / 340 / 400 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them by 25% for 1.2s.Clint gains a grenade charge every 12s (up to 5)

builds.author: Streamer : Raja Belit
builds.description: Gold Lane : Super long range squishy killer with Defense Penetration. #ClintBuild

builds.author: No.1 EnemyKiller
builds.description: #ClintBuild

Cyclops.name: Cyclops
Cyclops.description: A mysterious celestial traveler who came to the Land of Dawn thousands of years ago and came to know many mysteries about the creation of the Land of Dawn and the Endless War. He will always bring revelations to mankind at critical moments.

skills.name: Starlit Hourglass
skills.description: Each time Cyclops hit an enemy with his skills, all his skill cooldown are reduced by 0.5s .

skills.name: Stardust Shock
skills.description: Cyclops casts two Stardust Disks in the target direction, each dealing 275 / 300 / 325 / 350 / 375 / 400 (+60% Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Planets Attack
skills.description: Cyclops conjures Starlit Spheres around himself while gaining 50% Movement Speed that decays over 2s.The sphere will automatically seen and attack nearby enemies (prioritizing enemy heroes), exploding on collision and dealing 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 / 350 (+50% Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy.Enemies hit by multiple spheres will take reduced damage after the first hit.

skills.name: Star Power Lockdown
skills.description: Cyclops creates a Planetary Sphere and send it after the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 550 / 715 / 880 (+220% Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1-2s (increases with travel distance).

builds.author: Streamer : Rut Gaming
builds.description: Mid Lane : High penetration and strong early game poke. #CyclopsBuild

builds.author: Streamer : 3BEPbKO
builds.description: Mid Lane : Suppress the enemy with high damage and frequent skill casts. #CyclopsBuild

Diggie.name: Diggie
Diggie.description: Diggie is a scholar from Eruditio. With his "Time Nest," Diggie can turn back time and even take others to a time travel with him unhindered by any outside forces

skills.name: Young Again
skills.description: Upon death, Diggie reverses time and turns back to egg form, in which he can continue to move around and gains a new set of skills. He cannot be targeted in egg form and will revive after a period of time.

skills.name: Auto Alarm Bomb
skills.description: Diggie flings an owl alarm to the target location that remains stationary for 25s or until it reacts to the first enemy in range, chasing them and exploding upon collision.The explosion deals 500 / 520 / 540 / 560 / 580 / 600 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slows them by 30%.Diggie gains 2 stacks of Dangerous Sparks each time an enemy hero is hit by the explosion (up to 60 stacks), each stack increasing the skill's damage by 1%. He loses half the stacks upon death, but can gain 1 stack of Dangerous Sparks each time his skill hits an enemy hero when in egg form.Up to 5 owl alarms can exist at the same time.

skills.name: Reverse Time
skills.description: Diggie marks an enemy hero for 4s and pulls them back to their previous location afterward, dealing them 150 / 200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 80%.If the enemy moves out of the circle, the pull will be triggered early.

skills.name: Time Journey
skills.description: Diggie removes all debuffs on nearby allied heroes (including himself) and grants them a 650 / 765 / 880 (+300% Total Magic Power) shield and Control Immunity for 3s.He also gains 50% extra Movement Speed for 0.5s.

builds.author: Streamer : Erin KARRA Gaming
builds.description: Roaming : High CD Reduction for nonstop poke and harass. #DiggieBuild

builds.author: No.1 Muusss
builds.description: #DiggieBuild

Dyrroth.name: Dyrroth
Dyrroth.description: Prince of the Moniyan Empire, raised by Alice and Thamuz after being kiddnapped. He won a duel witnessed by Lord Lava Thamuz. After the conflict between Light and Dark, the Son of Darkness was about to represent the Lord of the Abyss and lead the Abyssal Army to the battle front.

skills.name: Wrath Of The Abyss
skills.description: When Dyrroth's Rage reaches 50%, he will enhance "Burst Strike" and "Spectre Step".After each 2 Basic Attacks, Dyrroth will release Circle Strike, dealing (+140%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the circle and regenerating HP according to the damage he deals (Circle Strike doesn't have ATK Effect).Each time he hits an enemy hero, the CD of "Burst Strike" and "Spectre Step" will be decreased by 1s.

skills.name: Burst Strike
skills.description: Dyrroth releases a burst strike in a designated direction. Each burst deals 200 / 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slows them by 25% for 1.5s. (The damage decays against the same target and decreases to only 75% on minions.)Abyss Enhanced: Burst Strike has a longer range, deals 140% of the original damage, and its slow effect is doubled.

skills.name: Spectre Step
skills.description: Dyrroth dashes in the designated direction. He will stop when he has  traveled the max distance or hits a target, dealing 230 / 255 / 280 / 305 / 330 / 355 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slightly knocking them back.When he uses this skill again, he will lock onto a target and release a Fatal Strike, dealing 345 / 390 / 435 / 480 / 525 / 570 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 50% for 4s.Abyss Enhanced: Fatal Strike will deal 150% of the original damage, slow the target by an extra 90% and reduce the target's Physical Defense by 75% for 4s.

skills.name: Abysm Strike
skills.description: After a short delay, Dyrroth launches a destructive strike in the target direction (cannot be interrupted), dealing 650 / 950 / 1250 (+250% Extra Physical Attack) plus 20% of target's lost HP as Physical Damage to enemies in its path, and slowing them by 55% for 0.8s.This skill deals up to 1500 / 2000 / 2500 damage to non-hero enemies.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS. TAZZ
builds.description: Jungle : High Physical Penetration to take down all but Tanks. #DyrrothBuild

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Butsss
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced damage and durability. #DyrrothBuild

Edith.name: Edith
Edith.description: Created by the Ancient Ones, Edith was the Primal Warden that watched over the sealed Evil Gods on the Sanctum Island. She lost her memories and was saved by her foster father who continued to raise her for ten years. When she enter the temple to search for scraps, the guardian of the ruins-Elemental Giant Uranus was prepared to destroy the invaders. It was then that Edith remembered everything, but her humanity overpowered her divine nature, and she fought Uranus to protect her foster father. Just then, the Celestial Palace fell and the sealed Evil Gods scattered. Edith parted with her foster father, drove her Mecha "Phylax" and set out on a journey to hunt down fleeing Evil Gods.

skills.name: Overload
skills.description: After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax becomes Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra Magic Damage equal to (30% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 300%.

skills.name: Earth Shatter
skills.description: After a 0.75s delay, Edith controls Phylax to launch an earth-shattering blow in a designated direction, dealing 225 / 270 / 315 / 360 / 405 / 450 (+10% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies hit (deals 120% damage to Minions) and knocking them airborne for 1s.This skill won't be interrupted by regular control effects (excluding Suppression).

skills.name: Onward
skills.description: Edith controls Phylax to charge in a designated direction, dealing 90 / 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 / 140 (+3% Total HP) Physical Damage to enemies along the way.If Phylax hits an enemy hero during this process, it'll stop immediately and throw them over its shoulder, dealing 108 (+5% Total HP) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Edith fires a Lightning Bolt in a designated direction, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hero hit and immobilizing them for 0.8s.

skills.name: Primal Wrath
skills.description: PASSIVE: When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).ACTIVE: Edith ejects herself from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. After that she take flight and can perform ranged Basic Attack, each dealing 35 / 50 / 65 (+75% Total Physical Attack) (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Edith also gains new skills in this state.When in flight Edith gains 350 / 500 / 650 (+5% Total HP)-350 (+20% Total HP) extra Shield, 50%–150% extra Attack Speed and 5%-20% Hybrid Lifesteal based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of Extra Physical Defense and Extra Magic Defense into 3.2 Magic Power.The Flight state lasts up to 8 / 10 / 12s.

skills.name: Divine Retribution
skills.description: Edith exacts Divine Retribution on a target area, dealing 170 / 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%.She then continue to deal 68 / 80 / 92 / 104 / 116 / 128 (+16% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area every 0.5s within the next 1.5s.

builds.author: Streamer : Nananakstream
builds.description: Exp Lane : Super tanky and good damage with Inspire and some offensive equipment. #EdithBuild

builds.author: No.1 SIMON
builds.description: #EdithBuild

Esmeralda.name: Esmeralda
Esmeralda.description: Born into a family of Agelta astrologers, she is the greatest astrologer on the Land of Dawn. Through the treasure star-moon box, she learned the fact that the tyrant Khufra was about to wake up. The re-sealing of Khufra became her new mission as an astrologer.

skills.name: Starmoon Casket
skills.description: Esmeralda manipulates Stardust and Frostmoon: Stardust deals Physical Damage while Frostmoon deals Magic Damage and gives the target a shield equal to 135% of Frostmoon's damage dealt.Each Basic Attack deals (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and 100 (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.The damage dealt by Esmeralda ignores all shield effects and gradually converts her shield into HP.

skills.name: Frostmoon Shield
skills.description: Esmeralda gains 300 / 390 / 480 / 570 / 660 / 750 (+150% Total Magic Power) Shield and 40% Movement Speed which rapidly decays over its duration for 4s.Meanwhile, she gradually transforms the shields of her nearby enemies into her own shield, capped at 50% of her Max HP.

skills.name: Stardust Dance
skills.description: Esmeralda waves Stardust and Frostmoon, dealing 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 / 440 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.Each time she deals damage to a hero, the cooldown of Frostmoon Shield is reduced by 1.5s (damaging non-hero units grants a 0.5s reduction) and the enemy's Movement Speed is reduced by 10% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Falling Starmoon
skills.description: Esmeralda coheres the power of Astrospace into her two weapons - Stardust and Frostmoon. The longer this skill is channeled, the longer the cast range.Use Again : Esmeralda casts the Stardust at the target location, dealing 350 / 500 / 650 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and then blinks to target location and casts Frostmoon, dealing 350 / 500 / 650 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies in the area for 1s.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Rippo
builds.description: Exp Lane : High movement speed, CD reduction, and good burst.

Estes.name: Estes
Estes.description: The Elf King who ruled the Moon Elves fell into a deep sleep after contracting a serious injury in the Second Plane War. When the Moon Elves were once again in imminent danger because of the awakening of the Abyss, he woke up early on a night of lightning and thunder.

skills.name: Scripture Of The Moon Elf
skills.description: Scripture of Moon Elf slowly charges Estes with energy. When the energy reaches 100 stacks, Estes' next Basic Attack will become enhanced, dealing 250 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target and 125 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 60% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Moonlight Immersion
