skills.description: Estes restores 250 / 265 / 280 / 295 / 310 / 325 (+110% Total Magic Power) HP to the target allied hero and links himself with them for 3s, slowly restoring 325 / 340 / 355 / 370 / 385 / 400 (+60% Total Magic Power) HP to the target.Linking with an allied hero will also increase Estes's Hybrid Defense by 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 and Movement Speed by 15%, as well  as the energy charging speed of the Scripture of Moon Elf.Being too far from the target will break the link.

skills.name: Domain of Moon Goddess
skills.description: Estes drops a flood of moonlight on the target area, dealing 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy units within it.Afterwards, it turns to a domain of Moon Goddess and reveals enemies inside it.Enemies will be slowed by 90% for 1.5s if they touch the edge of the domain area.(The slow effect will decay over time)

skills.name: Blessing of Moon Goddess
skills.description: Estes casts an enhanced "Moonlight Immersion" on all nearby allied heroes.Within the next 8s, the "Moonlight Immersion" will be enhanced, and Estes will continuously recover 1230 / 1350 / 1470 (+210% Total Magic Power) HP.

builds.author: Streamer : Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Roaming : Tank-focused to survive and support allies.

Eudora.name: Eudora
Eudora.description: Eudora is a Light Elf who possesses a high level of magical talent, yet always loses control of her emotions because of her being discriminated against due to her Ell status. Later, she was discovered by the mentor of the Magic Academy, Theresa, who took her to the Magic Academy to study. Finally, she overcame the gloom in her heart and succeeded Theresa, becoming the dean of the Ulturia School.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.description: Eudora's skills inflict Superconductor for 3s on hit and can trigger additional effects against enemies affected by Superconductor.

skills.name: Forked Lightning
skills.description: Eudora casts fork lightning in a target direction, dealing 350 / 410 / 470 / 530 / 590 / 650 (+150%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.Enemies affected by Superconductor will take 190 / 230 / 270 / 310 / 350 / 390 (+30%Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage after a short delay.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: Eudora hurls an orb of lightning at the target enemy, dealing them 350 / 370 / 390 / 410 / 430 / 450 (+80%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, stunning them for 1.2s, and reducing their Magic Defense by 10 / 13 / 16 / 19 / 22 / 25 for 1.8s.If the enemy is affected by Superconductor, the lightning orb will bounce to up to 3 nearby enemies (prioritizing enemy heroes), dealing them 175 / 185 / 195 / 205 / 215 / 225 (+40%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.9s.

skills.name: Thunder's Wrath
skills.description: Eudora calls down a blast of lightning on the target enemy, dealing them 480 / 660 / 840 (+180%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.If the enemy is affected by Superconductor, dark clouds will form over their head and send down an extra lightning strike on the area below after a 0.8s, dealing 440 / 605 / 770 (+150%Total Magic Power)  Magic Damage to enemies within and 360 / 495 / 630 (+150%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

builds.author: Influencer : Ihsan Luminaire
builds.description: Mid Lane : Burst damage to take down any non-tank.

Fanny.name: Fanny
Fanny.description: Fanny is the younger sister of Tigreal, who grew up under the protection of her family and her elder brother since she was a child. But Tigreal took the blame for a mistake in battle and left home. Disregarding obstructions from her family, Fanny joined the army, and through her own designed weapons, she successfully completed one task after another, becoming an outstanding fighter who can take care of herself.

skills.name: Air Superiority
skills.description: During flight, Fanny deals 10%-20% extra damage to enemies hit (scales with flying speed) and applies a stack of Prey Mark to them (up to 2 stacks) on each attack.Her subsequent skill hits on marked enemy heroes restore 8 energy per stack for her. The energy restoration is reduced if she hits multiple enemy heroes within a short period of time.

skills.name: Tornado Strike
skills.description: Fanny whirls her blade, dealing 320 / 370 / 420 / 470 / 520 / 570 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Steel Cable
skills.description: Fanny shoots a cable in the target direction that pulls her to the first obstacle hit. She can cast this skill again within 2s until her energy runs out. Each successive cast reduces the skill's energy cost by 2.Fanny automatically casts Tornado Strike upon hitting an enemy mid-flight, as long as her energy is sufficient.

skills.name: Cut Throat
skills.description: Fanny leaps at the target enemy hero or Creep with her blades, dealing 500 / 680 / 860  (+240% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Each stack of Prey Mark of enemies will increase her damage by 20%.

builds.author: Influencer : Dwiwoii
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced damage and Lifesteal to sustain through teamfights.

Faramis.name: Faramis
Faramis.description: A gifted physician who came to Necrokeep to study the mysterious plague, instead of finding the key to controlling life and death, he met Vexana, duchess of the cursed land and the girl who'd brought sunshine to his gloomy life twice. Vowing to find a way to revert the curse and repay the kindness of Vexana, Faramis voluntarily got eroded by the Mist and used himself as the specimen for his research.

skills.name: Vicious Retrieval
skills.description: Every 4s, Faramis' next skill against enemy heroes and summoned objects generates a soul fragment on the spot. Faramis can absorb the soul fragment to restore 100 (+50%Total Magic Power) HP and gain 2 extra Magic Power (up to 40 stacks).Upon death, he consumes the absorbed soul fragments to reduce the respawn timer, each reducing the timer by 3% (up to 90%). Enemies that die around Faramis also have a chance to drop soul fragments.

skills.name: Shadow Stampede
skills.description: Faramis enters the Shadow state for 3s, gaining 70% extra Movement Speed, 25 extra Physical & Magic Defense, 20% cooldown reduction for this skill, and the ability to move through terrain.Enemy heroes that come into contact with Faramis in this state are dealt 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+60%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applied with a Nether Mark.Upon leaving the Shadow state, Faramis drags all the marked enemy heroes toward him, dealing them 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+60%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.Use Again: Faramis leaves the Shadow state early and drags marked enemies toward him. The range of the soul fragment absorbtion is increased while this skill is active.

skills.name: Ghost Bursters
skills.description: Faramis gathers Nether energy in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 / 480 (+144% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within.The energy will then split and bounce to nearby enemies, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+86% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage (splits up to 2 time(s) on enemy hero hits and 1 time(s) on non-enemy hero hits).

skills.name: Nether Realm
skills.description: Faramis turns his surroundings into the Nether Realm for 6s, making affected allied heroes (including himself) enter the Specter state and granting them 400 / 600 / 800 plus 10 (+5% Total Magic Power)% extra HP and 50% extra Movement Speed for 1s.When the Specter state breaks, the hero will clear all debuffs and enter a brief Resurrection state for 1.3s. An allied hero's Specter state ends when they leave the Nether Realm.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Izanami
builds.description: Mid Lane : Balanced support & damage.

Floryn.name: Floryn
Floryn.description: Floryn was unintentionally brought into the Land of Dawn by Belerick in the process of creating the Oasis. Since then, she'd been living in the place she was born with a magical seed, blissfully unaware of the sufferings outside, until the day she left the Oasis to recover the stolen seed. After seeing the harsh environment of the desert and the people's plight, the kind-hearted girl was determined to change everything in front of her. The seed containing Belerick's power resonated with her resolve and tumed into a magical creature, Dew, with the ability to summon rain. Since then, Floryn and Dew have traveled along the desert, dedicated to spreading greenery to the entire west.

skills.name: Dew
skills.description: Dew's Lantern will permanently increase Floryn's attribute by a small amount.After leaving combat for 5s, Floryn can share the Flower of Hope with an allied hero (30s cooldown), which will grant them a 150 (+80%Total Magic Power) shield each time they are healed by Floryn.Floryn will never sell the Lantern.

skills.name: Sow
skills.description: Floryn tosses an Energy Seed at the target enemy, dealing them 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 (+100%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Healing Fruits will then spawn and bounce to nearby allied heroes, restoring their HP by 175 / 190 / 205 / 220 / 235 / 250 (+65%Total Magic Power).

skills.name: Sprout
skills.description: Floryn casts a blob of energy ahead that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 175 / 210 / 245 / 280 / 315 / 350 (+90%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.7s (and revealing their positions briefly).

skills.name: Bloom
skills.description: Floryn resonates with Dew's power, restoring 250 / 350 / 450 (+100%Total Magic Power) HP for all allied heroes 2 times no matter where they are on the battlefield.This effect also removes any Healing Reduction or Shield Reduction effects on allied heroes, and make them immune to those effect for 2s.

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Rasy
builds.description: Roaming : Sustained healing in teamfights.

Franco.name: Franco
Franco.description: Franco is the only warrior on the Frozen Ocean who can lead people in the fight against Bane. In one battle, Franco saw through Bane's tricks and finally defeated him. Life was brought back to the Northern Vale under his leadership.

skills.name: Wasteland Force
skills.description: If no damage is taken within 5s, Franco gains 10% extra Movement Speed, recovers 1% Max HP per second, and begins accumulating Wasteland Force (up to 10 stacks).Franco will consume all the Wasteland Force stacks on his next skill cast, increasing the skill's damage by up to 150%.

skills.name: Iron Hook
skills.description: Franco launches an iron hook in the target direction, dealing 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 / 650 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and dragging them toward him.

skills.name: Fury Shock
skills.description: Franco lashes out, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 plus 4% of his Max HP to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Bloody Hunt
skills.description: Franco suppresses the target enemy hero for 1.8s and strikes them 6 times over the duration, each time dealing 50 / 60 / 70 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Valenz
builds.description: Roaming : Full movement speed to roam and gank across the map.

builds.author: Streamer : Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Roaming : Use hook to catch enemy off guard.

Fredrinn.name: Fredrinn
Fredrinn.description: Born the son of Duke Vance, Fredrinn grew up into a gifted adventurer, but also the notorious 'money-grubber' in Los Pecados. The crystal in his chest had long merged with his heart. The terrifying scar would never fade, and Fredrinn never bothered to conceal it. All he had in mind was his search for his lost friend...

skills.name: Crystalline Armor
skills.description: Fredrinn gains 1 Combo Point that lasts 5s each time his skill hits a non-minion enemy, up to 4 Combo Points. His Ultimate costs different numbers of Combo Points at different skill levels.Fredrinn stores 100% of the damage he receives as Crystal Energy, which decays after 5s at a rate of 10% Max HP per second.Fredrinn can convert the stored Crystal Energy into HP by 20% of his damage dealt (10% for damage dealt to minions). Gaining a Combo Point resets the decaying timer.

skills.name: Piercing Strike
skills.description: Fredrinn thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing 125 / 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 (+7% Total HP) (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.His next Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals 85 / 95 / 105 / 115 / 125 / 135 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.This skill deals 150% damage to non-hero enemies.

skills.name: Brave Assault
skills.description: Fredrinn dashes in the target direction, dealing 140 / 155 / 170 / 185 / 200 / 215 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first non-minion enemy hit.His next Basic Attack knocks the target airborne for 0.3s.

skills.name: Energy Eruption
skills.description: Fredrinn deals 210 / 270 / 330 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and taunts them for 1s.Hitting a non-minion enemy grants Fredrinn 15 / 25 / 35 Physical and Magic Defense for 3s and reduces the cooldowns of Piercing Strike and Brave Assault by 75%.This skill costs 1 Combo Point.

skills.name: Appraiser's Wrath
skills.description:
Fredrinn slams his sword in the target direction, dealing 600 / 800 / 1000 plus 35% of his Crystal Energy as Physical Damage to enemies in fan-shaped area after a short delay.

Enemies in the center of the area take 175% damage. This skill doubles the conversion ratio from Crystal Energy to damage dealt.

This skill costs 3 Combo Points.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK Rival
builds.description: Jungle : Super tanky & good teamfight tank.

builds.author: Streamer : Game Ming
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced damage and mobility. Great for pursuing enemies.

Freya.name: Freya
Freya.description: Freya's sister Skuld was an excellent Valkyrie, but because of an accident triggered by Freya, she plunged into the Twilight Orb and disappeared together with it. Therefore, Freya took over as the Valkyrie and assumed the responsibility of protecting the Northern Vale.

skills.name: Power of Einherjar
skills.description: After casting a skill, Freya gains 200% Attack Speed for the next 2 Basic Attacks. (This effect can stack up to 6 times).Freya gains 1 stack of Sacred Orb on each Basic Attack and can spend Sacred Orb stacks to cast Spirit Combo consecutively.

skills.name: Leap Of Faith
skills.description: Freya jumps to the target location, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and pulling them toward her.

skills.name: Spirit Combo
skills.description: Freya strikes in the target direction, gaining a 60 / 100 / 140 / 180 / 220 / 260 (+70%Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 20 / 62 / 104 / 146 / 188 / 230 (+90%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s.Freya can cast this skill again within 3.5s at the cost of 2 stacks of Sacred Orb.On the 3rd cast. Freya leaps into the air and smashes the area below, dealing 26 / 76 / 126 / 176 / 226 / 276 (+108%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within range and knocking them airborne for 0.4s.

skills.name: Valkyrie Descent
skills.description: Freya gains 6 stacks of Sacred Orb and enters Valkyrie State, gaining a 600 / 750 / 900 (+180%Total Physical Attack) shield and 30 / 50 / 70 Physical Attack. Meanwhile, her Basic Attack also becomes ranged and can deal Splash Damage. Valkyrie State lasts for 10 seconds.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS.Saykots
builds.description: Exp lane : Good burst and sustained damage.

Gatotkaca.name: Gatotkaca
Gatotkaca.description: The son of Bima and Arimbi from the Arcadhem Universe. When he was a child, he became a champion of the gods, fighting against enemies in his hometown.

skills.name: Steel Bones
skills.description:
Gatotkaca gains Physical Defense equal to 2% of his lost HP (up to 200).

For each 300 damage he takes (calculated before damage reduction) he gains 5 Rage (up to 100).Upon reaching over 25 Rage, Gatotkaca's next Basic Attack will be enhanced, consuming all Rage, to deal extra Magic Damage and restoring HP.

The extra damage scales with his Rage, Level, and Magic Power.

skills.name: Blast Iron Fist
skills.description: Gatotkaca slams the ground, creating a shattered zone dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within.Enemies in the shattered zone will take 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 / 140 / 150 (+20% Total Magic Power) per second and be slowed by 30%.

skills.name: Unbreakable
skills.description: Gatotkaca begins channeling, then sprints in the target direction with a battle cry, forcing enemies on the path to attack him and deal 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage for 1.5s.The sprint distance scales with the channel time. Cancelling this skill reduces 50% of the remaining Cooldown.

skills.name: Avatar Of Guardian
skills.description:
Gatotkaca jumps to the target location, dealing 500 / 750 / 1000 (+300% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them airborne for 1s.

Enemies near the center of the area will be knocked airborne for a longer duration, while enemies on the fringes will be pulled to the center.The camera will follow the skill indicator but will not provide extra sight.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kiboy
builds.description: Roaming : Full-defense focused.

Gloo.name: Gloo
Gloo.description: A faction that lives deep among the trees of the Shadow Swamp. Gloo can amalgamate together to grow in size, and can also wreak havoc by latching on to other organisms, too.

skills.name: Stick, Stick
skills.description: Enemies gain a stack of Sticky each time they're hit by Gloo's skills, decreasing Movement Speed by 6% for 6s. Stacks up to 5.Each stack of Sticky on an enemy reduces their damage dealt to Gloo by 6%.

skills.name: Slam, Slam
skills.description: Gloo reaches out and slams the ground, dealing 80 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy.On the final location, a Goo is left behind, and after 3 seconds it explodes to deal 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1 second. If Gloo touches the Goo, it will explode immediately, reset the skill's CD and heal Gloo for 3% of Max HP.

skills.name: Pass, Pass
skills.description: Gloo stretches' forth to deal 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path, immobilizing them 0.5s.If this skill hits a Goo, Gloo will charge over to it, dragging enemies in its path in the same direction for a distance.

skills.name: Split, Split
skills.description: Gloo splits into Goos for 10s, during which it gains 35% extra Movement Speed, recovers 1.5% / 2% / 2.5% Max HP per second, and deals 120 (+25%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.25s to enemies it comes into contact with.Grab, Grab : Gloo attaches itself to a target enemy hero with max Sticky stacks up to 9s, recovering 25% / 27.5% / 30% Max HP. For the duration Gloo transfer 80% of the damage it receives (before damage reduction; excluding damage from the turrents) to its host, and its Basic Attack deals 120 (+50%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.Go, Go: Gloo leave its host early.Cooldown in lowered to 5s if the host dies while Gloo is still attached to it.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Rippo
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced attack and defense. Use sprint to chase or escape.

Gord.name: Gord
Gord.description: One of the best students of the Magic Academy, but he mixed ancient sorcery into the process of practicing arcane arts, which led to him being possessed by the Demons. It was lucky that Elward acted in a timely manner, helping Gord control the energy running away in his body. After that, Gord had no hope of reaching the peak of arcane magic in his life, eventually becoming a mentor of the Magic Academy.

skills.name: Mystic Favor
skills.description: Enemies hit by Gord 4 times with Basic Attack or skills within a short period of time, the next attack on the target will deal an additional 140 (+60% Total Magic Power) True Damage and be slowed by 20% for 1s. The slowing effect can stack up to 2 times.

skills.name: Mystic Projectile
skills.description: Gord conjures a Mystic Orb that bounces in the target direction and explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 270 / 315 / 360 / 405 / 450 / 495 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area, while stunning them and reveal their locations for 1s.

skills.name: Mystic Injunction
skills.description: Gord create an energy field in the target area, dealing, dealing 55 / 65 / 75 / 85 / 95 / 105 (+16% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.3s to enemies within (up to 13 times).

skills.name: Mystic Gush
skills.description: Gord unleashes an energy beam in the target direction, dealing 110 / 160 / 210 (+32% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit every 0.2s (up to 16 times).The direction of the beam can be changed using the left Joystick

builds.author: Streamer : ganba.x
builds.description: Mid Lane : Massive spell vamp and impressive in sustained combat.

Granger.name: Granger
Granger.description: He is a bard who wanders all over the world and a demon hunter at the same time. He became an orphan in the war between the Empire and the Abyss, so he developed a massive hatred for the Abyss and the Demons. There are often legends about him among the Demons━as soon as you hear the miserable and sad music in the open country, run away quickly, because it may be a death song written just for you.

skills.name: Caprice
skills.description:
Granger can fill his gun with up to 6 bullets at a time. Each 6th bullet is guaranteed to critically strike.
Granger's Basic Attack will deal 50 (+110% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, but he only gains 40% of his total extra Attack Speed.

skills.name: Rhapsody
skills.description: Granger immediately reloads his gun and fires continuously in the target direction, dealing 35 / 65 / 95 / 125 / 155 / 185 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage with each shot (deals 120 extra damage against Creeps).

skills.name: Rondo
skills.description: Granger blinks in the designated direction, and his next 2 Basic Attacks deal extra 25% / 28% / 31% / 34% / 37% / 40% damage in 5s.Each time Rhapsody hits an enemy unit, the cooldown of this skill will be reduced by 0.5s.

skills.name: Death Sonata
skills.description: Granger immediately reloads and fires a cannon shot in the target direction with the super canon hidden in his violin case. The cannon shot will pass through Minions and explode upon hitting an enemy hero, dealing Physical Damage equal to 80 / 120 / 160 (+70% Total Physical Attack) plus 12% of the  target's lost HP to enemies in the area and slowing them by 80%.Granger  can fire the super cannon 3 times at the cost of 2 bullets per shot, and can move once in the target direction after each shot. When Death Sonata ends, its cooldown will be reduced by 15% for every two bullets remaining.

builds.author: Streamer : RID
builds.description: Jungle : Get movement speed from equipment to keep your distance.

Grock.name: Grock
Grock.description: The stone man who signed a contract with the Ancient Ones has a kind-hearted nature and infinite power. He sleeps most of his life. After Grock woke up, he found that the Ancient Ones he was guarding had disappeared, so he carried the Castle of the Ancient Ones on his shoulders and walked out of the mountains to find the whereabouts of the Ancient Ones.

skills.name: Earthen Force
skills.description: When near a wall or turret, Grock gains 10% extra Movement Speed, 15 (+8 × Hero Level) Physical Defense, and 18 (+4.8 × Hero Level) HP Regen.Each point of Grock's extra Physical Attack increases his Physical Defense by 0.5.

skills.name: Power of Nature
skills.description: Grock charges his weapon with the Power of Nature and then lunches a powerful sweep, dealing 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+160% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.Damage dealt will increase the longer the skill is channeled, up to 250%Using Power of Nature near a wall will grant Control Immunity.

skills.name: Guardian's Barrier
skills.description: Grock conjures a stone wall at the target location, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.The stone wall lasts 5s and can block enemies who try to pass through.

skills.name: Wild Charge
skills.description: Grock charges in the target direction, dealing 360 / 480 / 600 (+75% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and and knocking them airborne.If he hits a wall or turret in the process, he deals additional 360 / 480 / 600 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and stun them 1.8s.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Smooth
builds.description: Exp Lane : Extreme burst with high Physical Defense.

builds.author: Streamer : Solidus Gaming
builds.description: Exp Lane : Full-on offense build with high burst damage against back line enemies.

Guinevere.name: Guinevere
Guinevere.description: As the youngest daughter of one of the few noble households in the Land of Dawn, House Baroque, she studied at the Magic Academy since she was a child, and is extremely talented in magic. The household wanted her to marry into another household with a higher status. Unwilling to be used as a political bargaining chip. Guinevere decided to seek help from her elder brother Lancelot.

skills.name: Super Magic
skills.description: Guinevere deals 25% extra damage to airborne enemies.Guinevere deals (+80% Total Physical Attack) (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage with her Basic Attacks and accumulates Super Magic each time she deals damage.When she's fully charged, her next Basic Attack becomes guided, dealing 80 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage on hit and restoring 80 plus 8% of her lost HP.Enemies hit by Guinevere's enhanced Basic Attack, Energy Wave , or Spatial Migration  are marked for 5s. Those with 3 marks will be knocked airborne when hit by her Violet Requiem.

skills.name: Energy Wave
skills.description: Guinevere releases an energy orb in the target direction, dealing 400 / 445 / 490 / 535 / 580 / 625 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 50% for 1.2s.Successfully hitting an enemy reduces all her skill cooldowns by 1s.

skills.name: Spatial Migration
skills.description: Guinevere thumps at the target location for 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Enemy heroes and creeps hit will be knocked airborne for 1s and take 125 / 140 / 155 / 170 / 185 / 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) additional Magic Damage.After casting the skill, Guinevere can reactivate the skill in 5s to blink toward the target direction and leave an illusion behind. If the illusion takes damage, it restores Super Magic for Guinevere and will explode in 1.5s, dealing 100 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Violet Requiem
skills.description: Guinevere creates a force field around her, attacking nearby enemies 11 times within 2s, dealing 880 / 1100 / 1320 (+385% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage in total.If the enemy hit is already airborne, they will be knocked airborne again, up to 6 additional times. Guinevere is immune to crowd control while casting this skill.

builds.author: Streamer : XK Penjahat
builds.description: Exp Lane : Semi-tank Regen build, ready for sustained combat and burst damage.

Gusion.name: Gusion
Gusion.description: Although he was born into the most powerful magic family on the continent, Gusion is not interested in magic. He is keen to draw inspiration from the holy light to develop new fighting skills. In the end, Gusion left the family.

skills.name: Dagger Specialist
skills.description: Each skill cast adds a rune to Gusion's dagger (stacks up to 4 times). Each stack enchances his next Basic Attack to deal additional damage equal to 3% of the target's lost HP, and restore 50 (+25%Total Magic Power) HP to himself.

skills.name: Sword Spike
skills.description: Gusion throws a dagger in the target direction, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and marking.Use Again : Gusion moves behind the marked enemy, dealing them 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. This movement to the marked enemy cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Shadowblade Slaughter
skills.description: Gusion throws a volley of daggers in the target direction, each dealing 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 6% / 12% / 18% / 24% / 30% for 2s (multiple daggers' slow effects can stack, up to 30%).Use Again : Gusion recalls the daggers, each dealing 65 / 75 / 85 / 95 / 105 / 115 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Incandescence
skills.description: Gusion dashes to the target location, resetting the cooldown of Sword Spike and Shadowblade Slaughter. If Shadowblade Slaughter was cast once before the reset, Gusion can throw another five daggers on his next Shadowblade Slaughter, and recall a total of ten daggers afterward.Use Again : Gusion dashes a short distance in the target location.

builds.author: Influencer : Johnathan Liandi
builds.description: Jungle : Extreme burst, remember to Basic attack after recalling daggers.

Hanabi.name: Hanabi
Hanabi.description: As the oldest daughter of the Scarlet Supreme Grandmaster, Hanabi had been used to being the best amongst her peers. It was after the arrival of Hayabusa, a young ninja of the Shadow Sect, that Hanabi realized she was met with a strong rival... Through the rivalry that lasted their entire adolescence, Hanabi slowly fell in love with her rival—Hayabusa. But when she finally worked up the courage to reveal her feelings. Hayabusa had left without saying goodbye...

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Petal Barrage
skills.description: Hanabi's Basic Attacks and Skills will launch Petal Blades after hitting a target, bouncing up to 4 times to nearby enemies (the first bounce deals 40% of the damage, and subsequent bounces deal 85% of the previous).Bounces from her Basic Attacks inherit a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Equinox
skills.description:
PASSIVE : The secret ninjutsu of the Scarlet Shadow makes Hanabi immune to control effect when she has a shield from any source.ACTIVE : Hanabi gains a 300 / 360 / 420 / 480 / 540 / 600 (+40% Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s.While the shield is active, Hanabi gains 20% Movement Speed and 25% Attack Speed and 20% of damage dealt will also be added to the shield value when it's active.
Damage dealt to non-hero units will only add 10% of damage dealt.The shield cannot exceed 50% of Hanabi's Max HP.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Soul Scroll
skills.description: Hanabi fires the energy Kunai in the targeted direction, dealing 450 / 480 / 510 / 540 / 570 / 600 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 1s.Enemy units hit will also be marked, allowing Hanabi's next Bounce Damage from Basic Attacks to deal 30 / 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage on them with no damage decay.

skills.name: Forbidden Jutsu: Higanbana
skills.description: Hanabi throws Higanbana in the targeted direction, dealing 300 / 400 / 500 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hero hit and immobilizing them for 0.8s.After 1s, Higanbana will bloom at the location of the first hit, dealing 300 / 400 / 500 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Subsequent hits on the same target decays 20% damage.

builds.author: Streamer : Archi Gaming
builds.description: Gold Lane : Pop a shield and starting dishing out damage, the more targets the better.

Hanzo.name: Hanzo
Hanzo.description: A genius ninja of the Shadow Sect in the Scarlet Shadow. In order to pursue great power, he absorbed the "Hanekage" into his body, and used the enemy's flesh and blood to provide nourishment for the "Hanekage". After gaining power, he took away the most powerful supreme ninjutsu and Ame no Habakiri in the Scarlet Shadow, and went further and further on the road of killing.

skills.name: Ame No Habakiri
skills.description: When units are eliminated nearby, the Blood Demon absorbs their souls into its body into Demon Blood.Hanzo gains 2 Demon Blood for each non-hero on death and 20 Demon Blood if it's a hero that dies in his vincinity.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Demon Feast
skills.description: Every 5 basic attacks by Hanzo temporarily unlocks this ability for 6.5s.Hanzo uses Ame no Habakiri to devour a target and digest them over a period of time.By doing so Hanzo gets 10 / 12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20 Demon Blood. (Can only be used against Minions and Creeps.Targeting Lord or Turtle deals 500 / 700 / 900 / 1100 / 1300 / 1500 True Damage.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Soul Reap
skills.description: Hanzo summons demonic spikes at the target location, dealing 160 / 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 (+60% Total Physical Attack) immediate Physical Damage.If an enemy is hit, the skill will strike again after 0.5s, dealing 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 (+15% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area and slowing them by 40% until no target is hit or dealing additional damage for 8 times.Every unit hit grants him 1 Demon Blood.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Devastator
skills.description: Hanzo flies to the target location as the demon Hanekage, dealing 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage within this area. (Can trigger basic attack effects).If an enemy is hit, the skill will repeat itself after 0.3s, and continue until no target is hit or when it has been cast 8 times.Hitting an enemy unit unlocks one seal of Ninjutsu: Demon Thorn.Moving, attacking or recasting this skill will terminate the process immediately.

skills.name: Kinjutsu: Pinnacle Ninja
skills.description: Hanzo gains 25 / 35 / 45 Demon Blood and charges into battle as demon Hanekage, gaining a new set of basic skills.Hanekage consumes 10 Demon Blood every second while he is out. Hanzo's bosy will be slowly pulled to Hanekage's location as Demon Blood depletes. Hanekage can move through terrains and has additional 35% Movement Speed and 30% / 40% / 50% Attack Speed, but its Physical and Magic Defense are reduced by 50.0% / 42.5% / 35.0%.If Hanekage is killed, he will be drawn back to Hanzo's body, stunning him for 3s and weakening him for 8s (slowed by 55%, Physical and Magic Defense reduced by 100% and location revealed); they are both killed if the body is destroyed.Use Again : Hanekage returns to Hanzo's body (the additional skill button will summon Hanzo's body to Hanekage instead.)

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Demon Thorn
skills.description: Every 5 Basic Attacks by Hanzo temporarily unlocks this skill for 6.5s.Hanzo burrows underground and lunges forward to attack enemies in a line, dealing 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 (+60% Total Physical Attack) (+target's 15% / 17% / 19% / 21% / 23% / 25% Total HP) Physical Damage, knocking them airborne and gaining 10 Demon Blood. (Damage reduced against non-hero units).

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kairi
builds.description: Jungle : Wear down the enemy with attack effect and finish with Skill 1.

Harith.name: Harith
Harith.description: A Leonin born in the Azrya Woodlands who is good at magic. In order to pursue a breakthrough in magic, he left Azrya and went to Moniyan to make a living away from home. Because of his outstanding ability, he was quickly appointed as a "Master of Magic" by the Empire and became an important force for the Empire in resisting evil.

skills.name: Key Insight
skills.description: Harith gains insight from his Key. He gains 7% Hybrid Lifesteal for each nearby Enemy Hero. Staking up to 35%.

skills.name: Synchro Fission
skills.description: Harith creates a phantom of himself in a distant location. Harith and his clone will then releases Synchro Fission toward each other, each dealing 236 / 264 / 292 / 320 / 348 / 376 (+84% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemy units on the path.When the 2 energy wave collides, an explosion occurs, dealing 590 / 660 / 730 / 800 / 870 / 940 (+210% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the explosion area.

skills.name: Chrono Dash
skills.description: Harith dashes towards the target direction, when he arrives, he steals Magic Power of nearby enemy heroes, generate a shield that absorbs at least 185 / 210 / 235 / 260 / 285 / 310 (+140% Total Magic Power) damage and enhances his next Basic Attack.Harith's enhanced Basic Attack deals 225 / 250 / 275 / 300 / 325 / 350 (+100% Total Physical Attack)(+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slows the enemies by 40%.Hitting an enemy with Harith's enhanced Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Chrono Dash by 3s.

skills.name: Zaman Force
skills.description: Harith uses his Key to summon the Zaman Force. When the multidimensional rift appears, the cooldown of Chrono Dash is reduced by 4s.The rift initially slows enemy heroes in the area by 70% and will continuously slow enemy heroes by 35% afterward.If Harith comes into contact with the rift when using Chrono Dash, he will absorb the energy within and reduce the cooldown of Synchro Fission by 1s and Chrono Dash by 3s.Harith gains 15% Resilience while on the rift.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Jungle : Sufficient CD Reduction to spam skills.

Harley.name: Harley
Harley.description: Heir to Castle Grandrock, Harley was of average talent and not considered with any importance by the Duke of Vance, his father. Yet he always very close with his (adopted) sister Lesley. To get his father's attention he practiced conjuring to make it seem like he had magical abilities, yet this had the unexpected result of getting him kidnapped. Lesley rushed to his rescue, and in the midst of yhis crisis his mighty magical powers were awakened, the two of them then proceeding to fight their way out. Ultimately, Lesley sent Harley to live and study at the Academy of Magic.

skills.name: Magic Master
skills.description: Harley's mastery of magic allows his Basic Attack and skills to reduce the enemy's Magic Defense by 2 and increase his Attack Speed by 5%-10% (scale with level) for 3s on hit. This effect stacks up to 10 times.Harley's Basic Attack deal 60 (+50%Total Physical Attack)(+60%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Poker Trick
skills.description: Harley throws {3 / 3 / 4 / 4 / 5 / 5} waves of cards with each card dealing 130 / 150 / 160 / 180 / 190 / 210 (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies.After the same target is hit 3 times, the damage will decay to 50% on subsequent hits.

skills.name: Space Escape
skills.description: Harley blinks in the designated direction, leaving a magic hat at his starting location and increasing his Movement Speed by 60% for 2s.Use Again: Use again within 4s to return to the hat location and cancel the Movement Speed effect.

skills.name: Deadly Magic
skills.description: Harley casts a magic ring of fire at the target enemy hero, dealing 200 / 300 / 400 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s.The magic ring will stays around the target , during which Harley can hit the magic ring to damage the target.The ring will explode after 4s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 200 / 300 / 400 (+50% Total Magic Power) plus 30% of the damage taken by the target while the ring is active.The ring of fire can be blocked by other enemy heroes before it reach its target.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kairi
builds.description: Jungle : High burst damage with attack speed bonus.

Hayabusa.name: Hayabusa
Hayabusa.description: Hayabusa is the head of the Shadow Sect's second son. Since childhood, he grew up under his father's iron-handed rule, and while his ninjutsu could never rival that of his brother, he was a kind friend and family member to him. When Hayabusa learned that his brother had been harmed by Hanzo, he resolved to spend the rest of his days mastering ninjutsu, in order to hunt down and exact revenge upon him...

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Trace of Shadow
skills.description: Hayabusa's attack apply a stack of Shadow Mark on hit (up to 4 stacks). Each stack lasts 6s and increases Hayabusa's damage to the enemy by 5%.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken
skills.description: Hayabusa throws three returning shurikens in the target direction, each dealing 150 / 170 / 190 / 210 / 230 / 250 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 35% for 2s.Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take only 30% of the damage after the first hit. Hayabusa restores 10 energy for each non-Minion enemy hit.PASSIVE: Hayabusa gains 3% / 6% / 9% / 12% / 15% / 18% Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Quad Shadow
skills.description: Hayabusa dashes in the target direction and releases four phantoms that travel in separate directions. The phantom will remain at the end of their path or attach themselves to the first enemy hero hit, dealing 130 / 140 / 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them by 40% for 2s.Hayabusa will immediately stop if he hits an enemy hero during the dash.Use Again: Hayabusa teleports to a phantom's location and reduces the cooldown of Ninjitsu: Phantom Shuriken by 1s. If the phantom is attached to an enemy he, he also deals 130 / 140 / 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy.

skills.name: Ougi: Shadow Kill
skills.description: Hayabusa blends into shadows and launches 6 single-target attacks on enemies in the area, each dealing 140 (+75% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.The attack prioritize enemies with Shadow Mark and each will consume a mark to deal 45 / 65 / 85 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage. Does not apply Shadow Mark.

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Chibii
builds.description: Jungle : Great at soloing and lane pushing, can also play as finisher.

Helcurt.name: Helcurt
Helcurt.description: Belonging to a mysterious race that dedicates itself to the Abyss to gain huge power, Helcurt often appears in the shadows to ambush his opponents, using the poisonous staggers on his body to deal his opponents a fatal blow.

skills.name: Race Advantage
skills.description: If enemy heroes inflict CC effect on Helcurt  will be silenced for 1.5s. Cooldown of 4s.

skills.name: Shadow Transition
skills.description: Helcurt blinks to the target location, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 90% (decays over 1.5s). Hitting an enemies and creeps with this skill grants Helcurt 1 Deadly Stinger.Dark Night Falls: Enemies hit will also be silenced for 1.5s.

skills.name: Deadly Stinger
skills.description: PASSIVE: Each Basic Attack grants 1 Deadly Stinger. Up to 5 stingers can be stored for 8s., after which the number of stingers will decrease overtime.ACTIVE: Helcurt fires all Deadly Stingers in the target direction, each dealing 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 8% (can stack) for 3s. Minions and creeps only take 70% damage from the stingers.Deadly Stinger counts as a Basic Attack, but cannot critically strike.

skills.name: Dark Night Falls
skills.description: Helcurt summons the Dark Night, greatly reducing the vision range of all enemy heroes sight range for 3.5s.He also gains 10% / 15% / 20% extra Attack Speed and 65% / 70% / 75% Movement Speed for 8s and 1 Deadly Stinger. The number of Stingers won't drop during the night. Dark Night Falls has no effect on enemy Helcurt.PASSIVE: Helcurt's Attack Speed is increased by 10%.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK Rival
builds.description: Jungle : Use ultimate to cut off enemy vision and burst down enemy heroes.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Jungle : Use Ultimate on squishies and eliminate with full combo.

Hilda.name: Hilda
Hilda.description: Megalith Wasteland is Hilda's hometown. Hilda, who grew up as the heir of the Power of Megalith, learned that she was not her mother's biological child, and therefore could not obtain the Power of the Megalith. But she remembered that her mother had once told her: Each generation's Power of the Megalith has their own unique significance. In order to find her own significance, she embarked on the road to a foreign land.

skills.name: Blessing Of Wilderness
skills.description: Hilda regenerates 2% of her Max HP every second while staying in a bush. When entering a bush, Hilda gains a shield equal to 15% of her Max HP. After leaving the bush, the shield lasts for 5s. This effect has a 10s cooldown.Hilda's Basic Attack and Skills apply a Wilderness Mark on hit, which last up to 4s and stacks up to 6. Each stack reduces the target's Physical Defense and Magic Defense by 4%.

skills.name: Combat Ritual
skills.description: Hilda activates the runic power of the great sword, increasing her Movement Speed by 60% for 3s and enhancing her next Basic Attack to deals 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 3s.The attack also deals 120 / 132 / 144 / 156 / 168 /180 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies behind the target.

skills.name: Art Of Hunting
skills.description: Hilda locks onto an enemy target, each time dealing 220 / 260 / 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Skill can be released 3 times at mostThe 2nd attack will deal damage to target's surroundings and the 3rd attack will knock back the target and surrounding enemies temporarily.

skills.name: Power Of Wildness
skills.description: Hilda launches a  powerful slash on the target enemy, dealing 600 / 800 / 1000 (+250% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and stunning them for 0.2s. Nearby enemies also take 60% damage.Each stack of Wilderness Mark makes Power of Wildness deals 2.5% of the target's Max HP as extra damage. At max stacks, Power of Wildness deals 20% / 28% / 36% of the target's Max HP as extra damage.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Yums
builds.description: Roaming : Provide strong harassment against enemy Jungler and Gold Lane hero.

Hylos.name: Hylos
Hylos.description: He lives in the Misty Mountains and belongs to the Centaur race. He has the ability to convert natural magic into life force, and at the same time he can continuously punish any enemy who invades the Misty Mountains by consuming his own life force.

skills.name: Thickened Blood
skills.description: Hylos gains 1.5 extra Max HP for every 1 extra Max Mana he possesses.When out of Mana, Hylos can use his HP for skill casts.

skills.name: Law And Order
skills.description: Hylos gains 50% Movement Speed and causes his next Basic Attack within 3s to deal 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 (+80%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target, and knock back and stun them for 1s.This damage counts as Skill Damage.The extra Movement Speed rapidly decays over the duration and ends after the next Basic Attack.

skills.name: Ring Of Punishment
skills.description: Hylos releases the Ring of Punishment, dealing 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 / 220 / 250 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second while slowing them by 4% and reducing their Attack Speed by 7.5% for 2.5 seconds (up to 8 stacks).Each stack also increases the enemy's damage taken from the Ring of Punishment by 5–20%. The Ring of Punishment consumes 30 Mana per second when it's active.Use Again: Hylos cancels the Ring of Punishment.

skills.name: Glorious Pathway
skills.description: Hylos creates a huge pathway in the target direction, reducing enemies' Movement Speed by 75% for 1s. The pathway last 6s.When on the pathway, Hylos gains Slow immunity and recovers 3% / 4% / 5% of his Max HP per second. Allied heroes moving along the pathway gain 60% / 65% / 70% extra Movement Speed, while enemy heroes on the pathway will be slowed by 25%.

builds.author: Streamer : Solidus Gaming
builds.description: Roaming : Pure tank that can charge into any situation with Ultimate.

Irithel.name: Irithel
Irithel.description: Irithel was abandoned as a child, in the jungle by her parents. Under the guidance of the God of the Jungle, a female smilodon that had just given birth, adopted her. Under the protection of the mother smilodon, the little smilodon Leo and Irithel learned to hunt, survive and adapt - she grew up like an animal. During a territorial fight against a pack of jaguars, the mother smilodon was badly wounded. When Irithel and her "brother" Leo went into town for help, they were referred to as "smilodon children" and were captured by a slave trader.When the cat elf mage - Nana passed by, she couldn't bear to watch them get beaten by the slave trader, so she used her magical strength to save these 2 poor children from the slave trader. With the help of Nana, who was still younger than Irithel, she learned to speak like a human and also learned to fight, using ranged weapons. Irithel seemed to have a special interest in Crossbows. She regularly trained hard in the jungle and managed to master her crossbow, even after several failed attempts, while Leo grew up to be a strong adult smilodon. However, to this day Irithel still hates humankind and trusts only her brotherly friend - Leo.

skills.name: Jungle Heart
skills.description: Irithel and Leo's immaculate teamwork allow her to shoot while moving. Each Basic Attack will shoot 2 crossbow bolt(s) (but takes longer time to refill) that deal (55%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per bolt (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).Moving will build up Jungle Heart, up to a maximum of 10 units, and cause the next Basic Attack to unleash 1 additional bolt(s).

skills.name: Strafe
skills.description: Irithel launches a volley of arrows on the target area, dealing 330 / 370 / 410 / 450 / 490 / 530 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 for 3s.

skills.name: Force Of The Queen
skills.description: Leo lets out a piercing roar, dealing 200 / 230 / 260 / 260 / 320 / 350 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Heavy Crossbow
skills.description: Irithel order Leo to leap in the target direction and empowers her crossbow for 10s. For the duration, she gains 30 Movement Speed and shoots an enhanced crossbow bolt, dealing 120 (+ {60% / 70% / 80%} Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and nearby units. Jungle Heart also accumulates faster for the duration.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Cikugais
builds.description: Gold Lane : Use Ultimate for high damage in teamfights and never stop moving.

builds.author: No.1 M A S
builds.description: Focus on Speed & Physical survivebility. Interchange armor towards enemy lineup. burst - Athena/Twilight, Magic - Radiant, strong Damager - Antique Cuirass.

Ixia.name: Ixia
Ixia.description: Born into a tribe of Sand Hunters, Ixia was honed by the harsh desert environment into a cunning leader at a very young age. While most Sand Hunters are only concerned about plunder, Ixia was always had a fondness for inventing gadgets and believed science should not be a tool reserved only for the academics of Eruditio. Ixia has always lived by her own rules, like the ever shifting sands of the Agelta Drylands.

skills.name: Siphon Starlium
skills.description: Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Starlium Charge to enemies on hit. When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of Starlium Charge, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with Siphon Starlium, dealing (150% Total Physical Attack) (+200 × Lifesteal) plus (+10 × Hero Level) Physical Damage to the target.Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by Siphon Starlium (only 20 (+100 × Lifesteal)% against non-hero units).Siphon Starlium can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot critically strike.Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.

skills.name: Dual Beam
skills.description: Ixia fires 2 Starlium-charged energy beams along the ground in the target direction, dealing 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 / 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and slowing enemy heroes by 40% for 2s.Upon hitting an enemy hero, Ixia also gains 40% Movement Speed for 2s.Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.

skills.name: Star Helix
skills.description: Ixia launches a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Full Barrage
skills.description: Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the Barrage state for 4s. Ixia cannot move in this state, but her Basic Attacks and skills can hit enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of her.In this state, Ixia's Attack Speed is increased by 50%, her Basic Attack can hit up to 6 enemy units (prioritizes heroes) in the same area, and the damage of Siphon Starlium is fire simultaneously with her basic attacks.

builds.author: Streamer : 疑犯_ Yifan
builds.description: Gold Lane : High attack speed, cast as many Siphon Starlium as possible!

Jawhead.name: Jawhead
Jawhead.description: This intelligent robot developed by Henry and his wife is armed with weapons and strong defensive capabilities, and can also act as a housekeeper. It is responsible for protecting the couple's daughter little Ailee after their disappearance.

skills.name: Mecha Suppression
skills.description: Jawhead's attack apply a stack of Mecha Suppression on hit (up to 10 stacks). Each stack last 3s and increases the damage of Jawhead's Basic Attacks to the enemy by 8%.

skills.name: Smart Missiles
skills.description: Jawhead launches up to 12 missiles at random nearby enemies over 5s, each missile dealing 135 / 160 / 185 / 210 / 235 / 260 (+30%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit.

skills.name: Ejector
skills.description: Jawhead gains 30% Movement Speed and a 250 (+180%Total Physical Attack) shield for 5s.Use Again: Jawhead flings the nearest unit (prioritizes heroes) to the target location, dealing 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+80%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 0.5s.Can be used on allied heroes and they will not take damage.

skills.name: Unstoppable Force
skills.description: Jawhead charges into the target enemy hero, dealing 350 / 475 / 600 (+150%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning them. Enemies around the target are knocked back and dealt the same amount of damage.Jawhead is immune to control effects during the charge.

builds.author: Pro Player : DEWA LeoMurphy
builds.description: Roaming : Balanced mobility, sustainability and initiation ability.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Kiboy
builds.description: Roaming : Good at roaming for kills.

Johnson.name: Johnson
Johnson.description: Johnson was once an athlete. He survived a serious car accident and found himself merged with the "super vehicle." Now, he is a man with the body of a "super vehicle."

skills.name: Electro Airbag
skills.description: When Johnson's HP drops below 30%, he gains a 300 (+700% Total Physical Defense) shield for 10s.This effect has a cooldown of 100s.

skills.name: Deadly Pincers
skills.description: Johnson throws his spanner toward the target location, dealing 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 (+250% Total Physical Defense) Magic Damage to enemies in its path.Enemies around the landing point are stunned for 0.8s.

skills.name: Electromag Rays
skills.description: Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area in the target direction and slowing them by 20%. Each instance of damage also increases the enemy's subsequent damage taken from the skill by 15% (up to 45%).This damage is increased by 60% against creeps.Johnson can cast Basic Attack and skills for the duration.

skills.name: Rapid Touchdown
skills.description: Johnson transforms into a car, accelerating over time. An allied hero can board the car during the acceleration phase.The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or obstacle, dealing 300 / 350 / 400 (+160% Total Magic Power) - 450 / 525 / 600 (+280% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5-1s (scales with the cars's speed), and creating an electrified zone at the location.Enemies in the zone are continuously dealt 60 / 70 / 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowed. Johnson can cast Throttle to skip the acceleration phase, Brake to stop immediately, and hold Nitrous to continuously increase his speed for up to 5s. Johnson's location is revealed for 3s upon casting this skill.PASSIVE: Johnson's Physical Defense is increased by 10% / 20% / 30%.

builds.author: Streamer : Game Ming
builds.description: Roaming : Extremely tanky and able to roll into enemy team.

Joy.name: Joy
Joy.description: Agile and cunning, known as the most infamous "petty thief" in Lumina City, Joy had longed to have her stomach filled and her heart warmed. In a fortunate turn of events, Joy returned to the Leonins' land, her wandering heart healed by the simple and unconditional love of her kin. She no longer feared losing love again and vowed to protect those around her, to turn into a golden flash resonating with home...

skills.name: Humph, Joy's Angry!
skills.description: Joy becomes Angry! each time her skill deals damage to a non-minion enemy, dealing 100 (+100%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and increasing her Movement Speed by 60% that decays over 4s (hitting the Leonin Crystal will also grant the Movement Speed effect). This effect has a cooldown of 4s for each target.Joy's Basic Attack will deal 65 (+25%Total Physical Attack) (+65%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Look, Leonin Crystal!
skills.description: Joy summons a Leonin Crystal at the target location, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The Leonin Crystal lasts up to 2s.

skills.name: Meow, Rhythm of Joy!
skills.description: Joy dashes in the target direction, dealing 120 / 138 / 156 / 174 / 192 / 210 (+55% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in her path. Hitting an enemy or the Leonin Crystal  allows Joy to enter Beat Time! for 1s, and able to cast this skill again (up to 4 times).Casting this skill on the beat increases the skill damage by 100% and grants a 80 / 90 / 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 (+60%Total Magic Power) shield that lasts 3s.

skills.name: Ha, Electrifying Beats!
skills.description: Joy increases her Physical & Magic Defense by 15 / 20 / 25 (+10%Total Magic Power) and removes all existing debuffs on her, while gaining 30% Movement Speed. Over the next 4s, she deals 150 / 210 / 270 (+55%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage 8 times to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by this skill multiple time will take 15% less damage each times (down to 40%).Each Meow, Rhythm of Joy! cast on the beat increases this skill's damage by 40%. Achieving perfect rhythm on every Meow, Rhythm of Joy! cast increase Joy's Spell Vamp by 40% while this skill is active.This skill unlocks after Joy casts Meow, Rhythm of Joy! & acquire beat energy. casting with 3 Beat Energy will remove all debuff and make Joy Imune to CC (Control Effect)

builds.author: Pro Player : Momo
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced burst and sustainability, Enter teamfights later to finish off all enemies.

Julian.name: Julian
Julian.description: Julian was the son of Terizla, the leader of the Free Smiths' Guild. The guild was exterminated by the Church of Light on charges of heresy when Julian was at an early age. The poor child was then adopted by the Archbishop, trained and molded to be an elite member of the Ravens, a secret force that listened only to the Archbishop's orders. Later, on his mission to "purify" Xavier, he caught a glimpse of the secret buried in time...

skills.name: Smith's Legacy
skills.description: After casting two different skills, Julian enhances his third skill. Casting the enhanced skill makes all his skills go on a 10–6.5s cooldown (decrease with his level) but his Basic Attack within the next 5s will deal 75 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and pull the target toward him.Julian gains 15% / 30% / 45% extra Hybrid Lifesteal for 5s each time he hits an enemy hero with his skills (up to 3 stacks).

skills.name: Scythe
skills.description: Julian hurls a flying scythe in the target direction, dealing 380 / 460 / 540 / 620 / 700 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.The scythe disappears upon hitting a non-minion enemy.

skills.name: Sword
skills.description: Julian summons a flying sword and dashes in the target direction, dealing 400 / 435 / 470 / 505 / 540 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Chain
skills.description: Julian casts chains at the target location, dealing 300 / 335 / 370 / 405 / 440 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit after a short delay and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

skills.name: Forsaken Light
skills.description: Since there are other Forsaken Light members on [Julian's] team, [his] Max HP, Max Mana, Movement Speed and Critical Damage are increased [by 1/1/1%/1%, respectively].

skills.name: Enhanced Scythe
skills.description: Julian hurls enhanced scythes in the target direction, dealing 380 / 460 / 540 / 620 / 700 (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 50% for 1s.Upon hitting a non-minion enemy or reaching the maximum distance, the scythes will continue to fly at a lower speed, dealing 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 / 210 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.3s to nearby enemies (up to 9 times).

skills.name: Enhanced Sword
skills.description: Julian summons a large number of flying swords and dashes in the target direction, dealing 75 / 85 / 95 / 105 / 115 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.1s to enemies along the way (up to 9 times).Julian's untargetable and invisible during the dash.

skills.name: Enhanced Chain
skills.description: Julian casts chains at the target location, dealing 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.2s to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%.Enemies that are still in the area at the end of the skill duration will take 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 (+100% Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage and be knocked airborne for 0.8s.

builds.author: Streamer : akio390
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced CD Reduction and Attack Speed. Can rely on Basic Attacks while on CD.

builds.author: Pro Player : RBL Swaylow
builds.description: Mid Lane : Good burst damage and Lifesteal.

Kadita.name: Kadita
Kadita.description: A princess of a certain island country in the Vonetis Islands. She was victimized by political enemies and lost her beauty and power. When she threw herself into the sea in despair, an Elf in the sea rescued her. After that, she regained her beauty and turned into the form of a mermaid. With the help of the Elves, she became the Queen of the Southern Seas who all sailors fear.

skills.name: Thalassophobia
skills.description: Kadita gains the Blessing of the Ocean every 30s. The Blessing is triggered when she takes damage from enemy heroes and last 4s, allowing her to recover 65% of the lost HP within the duration afterward.

skills.name: Ocean Oddity
skills.description: Kadita summons an ocean wave carry herself in the target direction and back, dealing 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+90%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%.While inside the wave, she gains Control Immunity and 50% Damage Reduction. This skill can pass through obstacles and terrain.Use again: Kadita exits the wave without interrupting the wave's movement.

skills.name: Breath Of The Ocean
skills.description: After a short delay, Kadita summons an ocean wave to erupt at the target location, dealing 350 / 380 / 410 / 440 / 470 / 500 (+140%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 1.5s.Kadita can cast this skill during Ocean Ode to summon an ocean wave beneath her with a shorter eruption delay.

skills.name: Rough Waves
skills.description: Kadita dives into the ground and sends ocean waves in all directions, each dealing 300 / 330 / 360 (+60%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. Enemies hit by multiple wave take increase damage.After a short period, the waves returns to Kadita, each dealing 200 / 220 / 240 (+40%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit by multiple returning waves take less damage after the first hit.When underground, Kadita becomes untargetable and gain 60 % Movement Speed.

builds.author: Streamer : Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Mid Lane : High burst damage to eliminate back line enemies.

Kagura.name: Kagura
Kagura.description: As descendant of Onmyouji Master Seimei, Kagura had been an unruly, quirky child ever since she lost her parents at an early age. But for some mysterious reason, the treasure Seimei Umbrella chose her to be its rightful owner. Having grown up and realized her own feelings for Hayabusa, Kagura brought her Seimei Umbrella and followed him to the outside world without hesitation...

skills.name: Yin Yang Gathering
skills.description: Upon retrieving the Seimei Umbrella, Kagura gains a 280 (+50%Total Magic Power) shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown 4.5s.

skills.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skills.description: Kagura sends Seimei Umbrella to the target location, dealing 315 / 370 / 425 / 480 / 535 / 590 (+105% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.

skills.name: Rashoo Umbrella Flee
skills.description: Kagura removes all control effects on her and leaps in the target direction, while leaving Seimei Umbrella behind.

skills.name: Yin Yang Overturn
skills.description: Kagura invokes the power of the Seimei Umbrella, dealing 330 / 400 / 470 / (+105%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.

builds.author: Streamer : Uncle Chikanook Gamer
builds.description: Mid Lane : Burst damage-focused to eliminate enemies with full combo.

Kaja.name: Kaja
Kaja.description: As their leader of the Celestial Palace's Nazar guardians, Kaja was able to refine the power of lighting into pure energy to control as he so desired, inflicting catastrophic damage to all enemies who faced him, and was charged with directly protecting the ruler of the city. Countless eons ago, after the city's ruler created the Nazar guardians and departed, the city gradually fell into a state of ruin. When Uranus was activated, the ruler of the Celestial Palace handed down new orders to the Nazar—to drive the evil demons from the city and rebuild the Celestial Palace in anticipation of the master's return.

skills.name: Wrath Sanction
skills.description: Kaja achieves Wrath Sanction every 6s. His next  Basic Attack will send lightning at enemies, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100 (+100% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the targets' Max HP and paralyzing them. The lightning will jump to enemies nearby as well (up to 3 times).Increases damage by 200% of target's Max HP on Minions and Creeps.Paralyzing: Slows enemies heroes and summons while reducing their damage by 3% (up to 8 stacks) for 5s.

skills.name: Ring Of Order
skills.description: Kaja releases a Ringed Electric Blade that quickly expands and contracts, dealing 135 / 165 / 195 / 225 / 255 / 285 (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit on its way out and back and paralyzing them. Enemies hit will also have their positions revealed briefly.Each time Electric Blade deals damage, Kaja restores 100 HP (decays to 30% after multiple hits).

skills.name: Lightning Bomb
skills.description: Kaja dashes in the target direction while leaving 3 Lightning Bombs along the way. The Bombs will explode upon enemy contact, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+35% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy and paralyzing them.

skills.name: Divine Judgment
skills.description: Kaja deals 200 / 350 / 500 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to a designated enemy hero, suppresses and paralyzes them for 1.5s.During the suppression, Kaja can drag the enemy hero along with him.

builds.author: Pro Player : RG.Xorn
builds.description: Roaming : High CD reduction to spam Ultimate and disrupt the enemy's carry.

Karina.name: Karina
Karina.description: Karina is the best killer among the Dark Elves who lived codependently with her younger sister Selena. But as the older sister, Karina failed to prevent Selena from dedicating herself to the Abyss. In order to stop her sister's evil deeds, and to find a way to bring her back, Karina embarked on a new journey.

skills.name: Shadow Combo
skills.description: Karina's third consecutive attack on the same enemy deals extra True Damage equal to 50 plus 5 (+2.5% Total Magic Power)% of their lost HP (up to 2000 True Damage against Creeps).If the target is an enemy hero, the cooldowns of Karina's non-Ultimate skills are reduced by 1.5s.

skills.name: Dance of Blades
skills.description: Karina enters the Dance of Blades state for up to 3.5s. during which she gains 45% Movement Speed, blocks all incoming Basic Attack, and reflects 100 (+30%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage back to attacker (the damage reflection effect has a cooldown of 0.4s)Karina's next Basic Attack within the duration deals 150 / 165 / 180 / 195 / 210 / 225 (+55%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage slows the target by 45% for 1s, and is guaranteed to critically strike. Casting the enhanced Basic Attack or Shadow Assault ends the Dance of Blade state early.

skills.name: Dance of Death
skills.description: Karina launches a spinning slash, dealing 375 / 420 / 465 / 510 / 555 / 600 (+125%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Shadow Assault
skills.description: Karina dashes to the enemy hero, dealing 350 / 550 / 750 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, applying a Shadow Mark to them, and leaving a Shadowform behind them, The Shadow Mark and Shadowform both last 5s. If the enemy dies within the duration, the cooldown of this skill is reset.Use Again: Karina dashes back to the Shadowform's location, dealing 150 / 200 / 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) to enemies along the way.

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Chibii
builds.description: Jungle : Extreme burst and finishing potential.

Karrie.name: Karrie
Karrie.description: Karrie was trained by the Empire to become a war machine from when she was a child, because of her incredible talent. After one battle, the seriously wounded Karrie fused with the consciousness of an alien prophet, so she knew the fate of the demise of her hometown, and to find a way to break the prophecy, she left Alaghat.

skills.name: Light Wheel Mark
skills.description: Karrie's Basic Attack and skills apply a stack of Lightwheel Marks on hit. Once a target has 5 stacks of Lightwheel Marks, the marks will turn into lightwheel, dealing True Damage equal to 6% - 8% of target's Max HP to them (only up to 300 damage against Creeps).

skills.name: Spinning Light Wheel
skills.description: Karrie releases a sphere of surging energy in the target direction, dealing 250 /  275 / 300 / 325 / 350 / 375 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage its the path.The sphere will stop upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its max travel distance, continuously dealing 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 / 190 / 200 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 80% for 1s.

skills.name: Phantom Step
skills.description: Karrie dashes in the target direction while throwing a lightwheel at the nearest enemy, dealing 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and applying a stack of Lightwheel Mark on them.When in Dual Wield state, Karrie throws 2 lightwheels instead.

skills.name: Speedy Lightwheel
skills.description: Karrie enters Dual Wield state for 6 / 8 / 10 seconds, during which she gain 20% Movement Speed and throws 2 lightwheels with each Basic Attack, each deals 50% / 60% / 70% Basic Attack damage and inheriting a portion of Attack Effects.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Cikugais
builds.description: Gold Lane : Balanced attack speed, offence & defense, with Ultimate for burst.

builds.author: Streamer : Rut Gaming
builds.description: Gold Lane : Get the equipment you need faster!

Khaleed.name: Khaleed
Khaleed.description: Moskov and Khaleed fought together with the Thornwolf tribe, but Khaleed became more popular than Moskov and became the leader. Subsequently, the disagreement between the two led to the annihilation of Moskov's army. Believing that Moskov was dead, Khaleed continued to lead his army to fight, and repelled Khufra in a decisive battle. At the same time, Moskov's figure slowly appeared in the darkness.

skills.name: Sand Walk
skills.description: Khaleed accumulates Desert Power while moving, After Desert Power is fully charged, he will glide on sand, increasing his Movement Speed by 35%, making his next Basic Attack deal 50 (+140%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target (cannot critically strike), and reducing the target's Movement Speed by 40% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Desert Tornado
skills.description: Khaleed whirls his scimitar, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+140% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and pulling them toward him. This skill can be cast up to 3 time(s) in a row.This skill deals 50% more damage to Minions and Creeps.

skills.name: Quicksand Guard
skills.description: Khaleed protects himself with the power of quicksand, restoring {60 / 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135} plus 5% / 6% / 7% / 8% / 9% / 10% of his Lost HP and 10 Desert Power every 0.5s, reducing damage taken by 35% / 38% / 41% / 44% / 47% / 50% for up to 4s.While channeling, quicksand appears under his feet, slowing enemies near him by 60%.This skill is a Focused Cast. Any other controls will interrupt this skill.

skills.name: Raging Sandstorm
skills.description: Khaleed rides the sandstorm and charges toward a designated location, dealing 100 / 175 / 250 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and knocking them toward his destination. Khaleed is immune to control effect during this process.Upon arriving at the destination, Khaleed will smash the ground, dealing 450 / 600 / 750 (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within the area and stunning them for 1s, and fully charge his Desert Power.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Rippo
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced damage and recovery. Eliminate enemies and heal.

Khufra.name: Khufra
Khufra.description: The ruler of the ancient city of Tivacan was furious, cold-blooded and greedy. In order to obtain the help of the astrologers, the astrologer Esmeralda launched a crazy pursuit. Esmeralda was bewitched by him at first, but she awakened and sealed him up. Now he is about to wake up and continue the battle of destiny with the descendants of the astrologers.

skills.name: Spell Curse
skills.description: Khufra activates the Spell Curse left by Esmeralda every 12s, enhancing his next Basic Attack. The enhanced Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals Magic Damage equal to (120%Total Physical Attack) plus 6% of the target's Max HP.Also slows the target by 30% for 1.5s and heals Khufra by 8% of his Max HP on hit.Each time Khufra applies a control effect to an enemy hero with his skill, the cool down of Spell Curse is reduced by 4s.

skills.name: Tyrant's Revenge
skills.description: Khufra pulls the bandage on his arms to launch himself in the specified direction, dealing Physical Damage equal to 50 plus 7 (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to all enemy units on the path.When blinking to the furthest distance or encountering a first enemy hero, Khufra will immediately stop, dealing Physical Damage equal to 50 plus 7 (+1.5% Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and then knocking them in the air for up to 1.1s.

skills.name: Bouncing Ball
skills.description: Khufra uses bandage to wrap himself into a magical bouncing ball, increasing his own Physical & Magic Defense by 30% / 44% / 58% / 72% / 86% / 100%. Enemies trying to use blink skill to move across Khufra will be knock airborne.Each time the magic bouncing ball hits the ground , it will deal Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 3(+2%Extra Physical Attack)% of his Max HP to enemies nearby and slow them by 80%. Lasts 0.2s

skills.name: Tyrant's Rage
skills.description: Khufra pulls back all enemy targets around him towards the front, dealing 300 / 450 / 600 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing them down for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 seconds.If the enemies are knocked against walls, extra Physical Damage equal to 150% of this skill's damage will be inflicted upon them and they will be stunned instead of slowed.

builds.author: Pro Player : Valenz
builds.description: Roaming : Tank all damage and return it to the enemy.

Kimmy.name: Kimmy
Kimmy.description: Born into a traditional military family in the Moniyan Empire, she received military education from an early age, so she was a little boyish. At the same time, Kimmy is not bound by tradition. She is obsessed with technology and inventions. In order to prove herself to her father, Kimmy picked up her invention and joined the imperial Expeditionary Army.

skills.name: Chemist's Instinct
skills.description: Kimmy can move and aim in different directions when using her Spray Gun, but lock on a specific enemy. Kimmy's Spray Gun attack restores 5 energy on hit and deals (22% Total Physical Attack) (+24% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per bullet. Each bullet can inherit up to 115% of her Attack Effects (scales with level).Kimmy can move while shooting but cannot gain extra Attack Speed, instead every 10% Attack Speed she receives will be converted into 5 Movement Speed. Kimmy restores 15 energy, each time she kills an enemy.

skills.name: Energy Transformation
skills.description: Hold: Kimmy continuously shoots Chemical Bolts in the target location, each bolt consuming 5 energy and dealing 20 (+{22% / 23% / 24% / 25% / 26% / 27%} Total Physical Attack) (+{24% / 25% / 26% / 27% / 28% / 29%} Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy hit.
