Chemical Bolts that fail to hit a target will explode at the end of their paths, dealing the same amount of damage to nearby enemies.The Chemical Bolts can critically strike.

skills.name: Chemical Refinement
skills.description: Kimmy shoots out an enhanced Chemical Spray and recoils in the opposite direction. Enemies that come into contact with the Spray left on the path will take 14 / 16 / 18 / 20 / 22 / 24 (+30% Total Physical Attack) (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.5s and be slowed by 40% for 4s.Kimmy also restores 30 / 32 / 34 / 36 / 38 / 40 energy upon casting this skill.

skills.name: Maximum Charge
skills.description: After a period of charging, Kimmy launches a Luminous Chemical Attack in a designated direction.The projectile will explode upon hitting an enemy or reaching the maximum range, dealing 130 / 195 / 260 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+115% Total Magic Power) – 238 / 356 / 474 (+185% Total Physical Attack) (+211% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the primary target (scales with charging time) and 83% (5/6) damage to nearby enemies.Kimmy restores 30 energy if this skill hits an enemy.

builds.author: Streamer : Uncle Chikanook Gamer
builds.description: Jungle : Each bullet deals massive damage.

Lancelot.name: Lancelot
Lancelot.description: As the eldest son of Duke Baroque, Lancelot was bom rebellious. Dead set on resisting the political marriage arranged for him by his father, he traveled the country and led a licentious life instead. After being wounded at a drunken brawl in a tavern. Lancelot was rescued by Odette and finally came to realize what his heart truly yearned for. The prodigal son made a repentant return and thus began his adventure across the Land of Dawn.

skills.name: Soul Cutter
skills.description: Each time Lancelot charges, his damage is increased by {7.5%, 15%, 22.5%, 30%} for 4s, up to 30%.

skills.name: Puncture
skills.description: Lancelot charges in a designated direction, dealing 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 / 220 / 250 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and applying a Sword Mark to the first unmarked enemy hit. The Sword Mark lasts 5s.If Lancelot successfully applies a Sword Mark to an enemy, the cooldown of this will reset.

skills.name: Thorned Rose
skills.description: Lancelot strikes in the target direction 3 times, each time dealing 165 / 198 / 231 / 264 / 297 / 330 (+130% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (damage reduced when multiple enemies are hit).He's untargetable and invincible during this process. Enemies in the center of the area will take all 3 hits and are slowed by {20%, 40%, 60%} for 0.5s. The slow effect can stack.

skills.name: Phantom Execution
skills.description: After a short delay, Lancelot performs an executioner's strike in the target direction, dealing 400 / 600 / 800 (+150% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He is invincible throughout the process.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Subway
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced CD reduction and penetration.

Lapu-Lapu.name: Lapu-Lapu
Lapu-Lapu.description: Lapu-Lapu lives with other Doricans on the Vonetis Islands, living a life outside of worldly strife. But the arrival of a warlord who had defected from the Moniyan Empire broke this silence and brought about endless killing. Lapu-Lapu gathered all the tribes together to fight back against the warlord's invasion and finally won, turning the Vonetis Islands into a paradise of freedom again.

skills.name: Homeland Defender
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu accumulates 10 Bravery Blessing each time he deals damage (halved for damage dealt to non-hero units).When Bravery Blessing is full, Lapu-Lapu's next Basic Attack will make him dash toward the target, dealing (150% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (cannot critically strike) and granting him a shield that absorb 250 (+65*Hero Level ) damage for 2.5s

skills.name: Justice Blade
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu releases two boomerangs in the target direction, each boomerang dealing 140 / 165 / 190 / 215 / 240 / 265 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit on its way out or back.If the two boomerangs hit the same target, it will only deal 50% damage with the second boomerang.

skills.name: Land Shaker
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu channels for 0.7s, slowing enemies in the target direction by 60%, he then slams his heavy sword to the ground, dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: Jungle Warrior
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu dashes in the target direction, dealing 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Storm Sword
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu whirls his heavy sword, dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies.For each enemy hero hit, he gains a 10% damage reduction for 4s.

skills.name: Bravest Fighter
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu leaps to the target location while combining his twin blades into one dealing 300 / 400 / 500 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies upon landing and slowing them by 60% for 1s. (This skill cannot be interrupted )Lapu-Lapu gains 3 times more Bravery Blessing from this skills and skills in transformed state. For the next 10s, Lapu-Lapu enters Great Sword stance and gain enhanced skill, 30 / 45 / 60 extra Physical & Magic Defense and his Basic Attack damage increased to 120%.

skills.name: Raging Slash
skills.description: Lapu-Lapu swings his heavy sword 3 times. The first two attacks deals 345 / 445 / 545 (+160% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the third deals 440 / 580 / 720 (+210% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a large area.Lapu-Lapu gains Control Immunity during this process and can change his attack direction and move a short distance on each attack.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Momo
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced damage and survivability to tank through teamfights.

Layla.name: Layla
Layla.description: As an adventurous child. Layla set off to explore the world after she received the Malefic Cannon from his father. Unexpectedly, Layla fell into the hands of Laboratory 1718. Her father gave himself to the lab as a hostage in order to save Layla. To make up for her mistake and save her father, Layla picked up the Malefic Gun and set out on a rescue mission.

skills.name: Malefic Gun
skills.description: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (starting at 100% and increasing to 130% at 6 units away). This does not include Turrents.

skills.name: Malefic Bomb
skills.description: Layla fires a Malefic Energy Bomb forward, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit. (can critically strike).Upon hitting an enemy, Layla's Basic Attack and Void Projectile gain extra range 3s and she gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. The duration of the Movement Speed boost is doubled if an enemy hero is hit.

skills.name: Void Projectile
skills.description: Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target enemy that explodes on hit, dealing 170 / 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target in the area and applying a Magic Mark.When Layla hits an enemy with a Magic Mark, she deals 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+35% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slows them for 0.25s.

skills.name: Destruction Rush
skills.description: Layla fires a blast of Malefic Energy in the target direction, dealing 500 / 650 / 800 (+150% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a line.PASSIVE: The range of Layla's Void Projectile and Basic Attack is increased by 0.6 / 1.2 / 1.8 units, Her sight range is also increased each time this skill is upgraded.

builds.author: Influencer : Alshad Ahmad
builds.description: Gold Lane : Focus on farming. Fight back when the Skill 1 passive is active.

Leomord.name: Leomord
Leomord.description: Once a sworn knight of Ridgeburg, Leomord was forced to shatter the oath he made with his own sword in an unfortunate turn of events. Since then, he had borne the curse of the Mist and guarded the land abandoned even by death. The light had faded yet his watch had just begun...

skills.name: The Oath Keeper
skills.description: Leomord's Basic Attacks are guaranteed to critically strike against enemies below 50% Max HP, dealing 200% damage.Leomord converts every 1% Crit Chance gained into 1 Physical Attack.

skills.name: Momentum
skills.description: Leomord gains a 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) shield and begins channeling, slowing enemies in the target direction by 25%.When the channeling is complete or interrupted, he thrusts his sword in the same direction, dealing up to 500 / 560 / 620 / 680 / 740 / 800 (+180% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit (scales with channel time) and slowing them by 40% for 1s.Leomord can cast this skill again to actively interrupt the channeling.

skills.name: Phantom Stomp
skills.description: Barbiel leaps forward, dealing 325 / 380 / 345 / 490 / 545 / 600 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemy units in the area where he lands, slowing them by 40% for 1s.

skills.name: Decimation Assault
skills.description: Leomord charge in a designated direction, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Phantom Charge
skills.description: Barbiel charges forward in a designated direction, and knocks back all enemies on the path, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Phantom Steed
skills.description: Leomord summons Barbiel to rush to him, dealing 350 / 450 / 550 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on the path.If Barbiel comes in contact with Leomord, they will enter a Mounted State, gaining 30% Movement Speed that decays over 2s.Mounted State: Leomord gains a brand-new set of skills, and his Basic Attack can be used while moving and hits in a circular area. Leomord also gains 60 Movement Speed and 30 / 60 / 90 Physical & Magic Defense.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Jungle : Focus on finishing enemies off in teamfights.

Lesley.name: Lesley
Lesley.description: After the death of her father, she was adopted by House Vance and became Harley's sister. Lesley regarded her younger brother as everything to her, and kept protecting Harley secretly.

skills.name: Lethal Shoot
skills.description: If Lesley doesn't take damage for 5s, her next Basic Attack gains extra range and 50% Critical Chance and deals 75 (+100% Total Physical Attack) True Damage (20% extra damage against minions).Each point of fixed Physical Penetration Lesley acquires is converted into 0.5% Critical Damage, but her base Critical Damage is reduced to 140%.Lesley's Basic Attack restores 5 points of energy and her Lethal Shot doubles the amount of energy restored. The Lethal Shot effect will active immediately after Lesley uses a skill.

skills.name: Master Of Camouflage
skills.description: Lesley enters the Camouflage state, gaining double Energy Regen, 40% extra Movement Speed, and 85 / 95 / 105 / 115 / 125 / 135 extra Physical Attack.The state lasts 3s or until Lesley takes or deals damage. Enemies can detect Lesley's position through distortions of their surroundings.

skills.name: Tactical Grenade
skills.description: Lesley throws a tactical grenade in the target direction while slightly jumping back, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and knocking them back.Lesley can cast this skill during the Ultimate Snipe to cancel the state and immediately fire a Fatal Bullet at the target. The attack is only triggered when there are unfired Fatal Bullets left.

skills.name: Ultimate Snipe
skills.description: Lesley locks onto the target enemy hero and fires 4 Lethal Bullets in succession, each dealing Physical Damage equal to 250 / 300 / 350 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) plus 5% of their lost HP and restoring 10 energy on hit. The Bullets can be blocked by other enemy heroes.If this skill is interrupted, each remaining Bullet reduces the skill cooldown by 10%.PASSIVE: Lesley's Crit Chance is increased by 5% / 10% / 15%.

skills.name: Lesley BUFF
skills.description: Increases both HP by 10 when battling with Harley

builds.author: Influencer : LEOKOCE
builds.description: Gold Lane : Strong against Assassins or Magic damage heroes.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.CW
builds.description: Gold Lane : Extremely high damage.

Ling.name: Ling
Ling.description: Swordsman with a slender body whose whereabouts are unpredictable. Once a disciple of the Great Dragon, after Zilong became the Great Dragon's most praised disciple, he left the Great Dragon because of jealousy, created a secret organization called Cyan Finch, and lurked in search of a chance to have a final battle with Zilong.

skills.name: Cloud Walker
skills.description: Ling's superb Lightness Skill helps him leap among walls. He gains 4 extra Lightness Points per second when he's on a wall and 5 extra Lightness Points each time he deals damage.Ling gains 1.5 times Crit Chance from all sources but only has 140% Crit Damage.

skills.name: Finch Poise
skills.description: PASSIVE: Ling’s Critical Chance is permanently increased by {2.5% / 4% / 5.5% / 7% / 8.5% / 10%}.ACTIVE: Ling casts his Lightness Skill, leaping onto the designated wall, entering half-stealth state, restoring Lightness Points more quickly and gaining 30% Movement Speed.If Ling receives damage, he will leave the half-stealth state. If he is controlled, he will fall onto the ground and be slowed by 30% for 2s. When using this skill to jump from a wall to another, it will reset the Cooldown and refresh the half-stealth state.

skills.name: Defiant Sword
skills.description: Ling charges in a designated direction and stabs the nearby enemies at his destination, dealing 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 (+33% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.If Ling casts this skill when he is on the wall, he'll dash to the target location on the ground, dealing 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 (+33% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within a small area and slowing them down by 30% for 1.5s. If this attack critically strikes, the enemies will be slowed by extra 45% for 0.75s. Defiant Sword is regarded as  Basic Attack, can trigger attack effects, and restores 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 HP for Ling each time it hits an enemy.

skills.name: Tempest Of Blades
skills.description: Ling leaps into the air, becoming invincible and gaining 10% extra Movement Speed for 1.5s. He ignores obstacles when in the air. He then lands on the ground, dealing 250 / 350 / 450 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area, knocking those in the center airborne for 1s, and creating a Sword Field for 8s.Four Tempest of Blades will also appear on the edge of the Sword Field. Ling can touch them to reduce the cooldown of  Finch Poise by 4s, reset the cooldown of  Defiant Sword, and gain 25 Lightness points.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Jungle : Max Crits for extreme DPS, and Ultimate to escape CC.

Lolita.name: Lolita
Lolita.description: Born in a remote elven village, Lolita lost both her parents to the war and was adopted by Dr. Rooney. Master Rooney implanted the Noumenon Energy Core into her body, allowing her to burst out great strength even in her small frame. With the energy core, Lolita can even manipulate the giant mechanical hammer with ease.

skills.name: Noumenon Energy Core
skills.description: After not taking damage for 5s, Lolita gains a 300 (+40*Hero Level) shield for 20s. Allied heroes who approach Lolita within the next few seconds will also received a shield.

skills.name: Charge!
skills.description: Lolita dashes in the target direction and enhances her next Basic Attack within 4s.The enhanced Basic Attack deals 200 / 255 / 310 / 365 / 420 / 475 (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus 7.5% / 8.0% / 8.5% / 9.0% / 9.5% / 10.0% of the target's Max HP as Physical Damage, stuns the target for 0.8s, and allow Lolita to jump to the target's location.This damage is increased to 200 / 255 / 310 / 365 / 420 / 475 (+100% Total Physical Attack) plus 50% of the target's Max HP against Minions.

skills.name: Guardian's Bulwark
skills.description: Lolita raises her shield to block all incoming ranged Basic Attack and Projectile from the target direction.Use Again: Lolita launches a blast of energy in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the explosion range.Each blocked attack increases this damage by 35% (up to 210%).

skills.name: Noumenon Blast
skills.description: Lolita gains the shield from from her Passive effect and begins channeling, slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area by 75%. After channeling for 2s, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing 350 / 500 / 650 (+100% Total Physical Attack) - 700 / 1000 / 1300 (+200% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the same area and stunning them for 2s.Use Again: Lolita stops channeling and immedietly slams her hammer on the ground.

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Xorn
builds.description: Roaming : Balanced movement speed and defense, good sustain and CC.

builds.author: No.1 P A O L A

Lunox.name: Lunox
Lunox.description: Lunox was born with magical powers, and her dreamworld reflects and changes the real world. With this power, she uses her dreamworld to temporarily maintain the balance of energy between order and chaos. But as the power of order and the power of chaos rushed into her dreams. Lunox fell into a long sleep and turned into one of the "Twilight Orbs."

skills.name: Dreamland Twist
skills.description: Lunox has lost the sense of real time and cannot benefit from Cooldown Reduction. When Power of Chaos is enhanced, 80% of her Cooldown Reduction will be converted into Magic Penetration. When Power of Order is enhanced, 120% of her Cooldown Reduction will be converted into Physical and Magic Defense.

skills.name: Starlight Pulse
skills.description: Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies, dealing 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 / 350 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and recovering 60 / 66 / 72 / 78 / 84 / 90 (+20% Total Magic Power) HP.The recovering effect doubles when the skill hits enemy heroes.Gains one stack of Power of Order after use.

skills.name: Chaos Assault
skills.description: Lunox unleashes Chaos Energy forward, dealing Magic Damage equal to 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+120% Total Magic Power) plus {2.5% / 3% / 3.5% / 4% / 4.5% / 5%} of their Max HP to targets hit (when the target is a creep, they take an additional 100% Max HP as damage) and reducing their Movement Speed by 10% for 1s.Gains one stack of Power of Chaos after use.

skills.name: Cosmic Fission
skills.description: When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300 / 340 / 420 / 460 / 500 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the targets along the way and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Power of Order: Brilliance
skills.description: Lunox enters the Light Barrier and becomes invincible while dealing 100 / 120 / 140 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per 0.5s to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Power of Chaos: Darkening
skills.description: Lunox blinks in designated direction, dealing 250 / 350 / 450 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, slowing them by 35% for 4s, and enhancing her own Power of Chaos within 4s.For the duration, "Chaos Assault" doesn't have cooldown.

builds.author: Pro Player : RSG.Izanami
builds.description: Mid Lane : Farm early game for massive DPS late-game.

builds.author: Streamer : LiteMS
builds.description: Mid Lane : Pure damage-focused for extreme DPS.

Luo Yi.name: Luo Yi
Luo Yi.description: The Fighter attached to the Black Dragon. She was expelled from the Land of Dawn together with the Black Dragon after the Black Dragon failed. With a sense of mission to get freedom and the desire of her family to return to their homeland that had long lost, Luo Yi was determined to inherit her father's will. She would soon find the reincarnated Black Dragon, and possibly rebuild Fighter's glory.

skills.name: Duality
skills.description:
Luo Yi's skills create Sigils of Yin/Yang on the battlefield. Each Sigil lasts up to 6s.Sigils opposite attributes will trigger Yin-Yang Reaction when they are within a certain distance, dealing 365 (+20 × Hero Level) (+190% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the marked enemies, stunning them for 1s, and pulling them toward each other .
Each time Luo Yi applies a new Sigil to a marked enemy, she gains 300 (+10 × Hero Level) (+150% Total Magic Power) shield (up to 3 stacks) and 30% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2s.

skills.name: Dispersion
skills.description: Luo Yi casts the energy of Yin/Yang in the target direction, dealing 210 / 250 / 290 / 330 / 370 / 410 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and those behind them in a fan-shaped area. Enemy heroes hit are marked with Sigil of Yin/Yang.Luo Yi stores up to 4 Dispersion charges and gains 1 charge every 8s. She also immediately gains 1 charge each time Yin-Yang Reaction is triggered.The state of this skill changes on each cast.

skills.name: Rotation
skills.description: Luo Yi summons Fire of Yang/Aqua of Yin at a target location, dealing 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.Fire of Yang/Aqua of Yin then remains at the location for 6s, dealing 50 / 54 / 58 / 62 / 66 / 70 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.7s to nearby enemies. It can also trigger Yin-Yang Reaction with Sigils of opposite attributes.The state of this skill changes on each cast.

skills.name: Diversion
skills.description: Luo Yi creates a Teleport Circle around herself and marks target location (within 28 / 32 / 36 units) as its destination.After 3s delay, allied heroes (including herself) within the Circle will be teleported to the location.PASSIVE: Luo Yi’s Cooldown Reduction is increased by 6% / 8% / 10%.

builds.author: Influencer : Ihsan Luminaire
builds.description: Mid Lane : Burst damage-focused, with extreme CC and DPS in teamfights.

Lylia.name: Lylia
Lylia.description: A descendant of the great magician of the Magic Academy and known as the "Little Witch". Though at a young age, she has mastered the techniques to control little creature "Gloom".

skills.name: Angry Gloom
skills.description: Lylia gets power from Gloom, increasing her movement speed by 15%. Each Gloom upgrade further increase this bonus  by 5%.Gloom gains an upgrade every time he devour Shadow Energy, up to 5 times. Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage of Shadow Energy.

skills.name: Magic Shockwave
skills.description: Lylia sends out Gloom with a shockwave, dealing 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 (+100%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a line and slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.If Gloom touches  Shadow Energy, he will devour and detonate it.

skills.name: Shadow Energy
skills.description: Lylia condenses Shadow Energy at a location, dealing 90 / 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 / 140 / 150 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 80%.Shadow Energy can be detonated by Gloom's Devour, dealing  220 / 245 / 270 /295 / 320 / 345 / 370 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemies nearby. Each Gloom upgrade increases the detonation damage by 30% up to 120%Lylia starts with the skill Shadow Energy.

skills.name: Black Shoes
skills.description: Lylia returns to the Black Shoes' location 4s ago and restores her HP and Mana to the previous state, and get an extra 10% / 15% / 20% Max HP. She also gains 20% extra Movement Speed by 20% for 2 / 3 / 4 seconds.

builds.author: Streamer : Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Mid Lane : Stack CD reduction to spam skills. Strong with good positioning.

Martis.name: Martis
Martis.description: He has dark energy emitting from his whole body, is eager to win, and not willing to give up on any of his goals. After defeating the Psychic Demons, he became the Ashura King.Persistent and victorious Ashura King

skills.name: Ashura's Wrath
skills.description: Each time Martis uses a skill, his Attack Speed will be increased by 30%, 120% maximum. Lasts 4s.He gains (6*Hero Level) extra Attack at full stacks.

skills.name: Ashura Aura
skills.description: Martis draws enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of him, dealing 350 / 410 / 470 / 530 / 590 / 650 (+130% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Mortal Coil
skills.description: Martis strikes in the target direction three times, each dealing 225 / 240 / 255 / 270 / 285 / 300 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit by the first and third strike are also knocked back. The attack direction can be changed once using the joystick.Use Again: Martis leaps in the target direction, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.Martis gains Control Immunity and 60% Damage Reduction when casting this skill.

skills.name: Decimate
skills.description: Martis lunges at the designated enemy hero, dealing 800 / 900 / 1000 (+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (deals True Damage if the enemy's HP is below 50%).If the enemy is killed by this skill, Martis can cast the skill again within 10s and gains 100% extra Movement Speed that gradually decays over 5s.Each successive cast also increases the skill's damage by 15% (up to 30%).

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Chibii
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced damage and defense. Focus on finishing off enemies.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Jungle : Focus on finishing enemies off in teamfights.

Masha.name: Masha
Masha.description: Leader of the Sami people who lives in the Northern Vale. After the wandering pirates of the Frozen Ocean began to invade the Northern Vale, Masha fought constantly with the pirates, and insisted on finding the Direbears, who had been scattered by the pirate invasion, to protect the land.Guardian of the Direbears

skills.name: Ancient Strength
skills.description: Masha has 3 HP bars and won't die until the last HP bar is depleted. She can also ignore an instance of damage each time she loses an HP bar.When Masha is left with only 2 HP Bar. She increases HP Regen and healing received by 25% and 50% resilience.When Masha is left with only 1 HP Bar. She increases HP Regen by 50% and become imune to CC(Control Effect).Every Point of extra Defence from any source will be converted to 0.25 Physical Attack InsteadMasha recovers 3 Energy each time she deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep, and 1 when she deals damage to Minions.

skills.name: Wild Power
skills.description: Expends 25% Hp for Masha to awakens her Wild Power, during which she gains 35% extra Movement Speed and 50% Attack Speed for 4s and enhancing her basic Attack. Each Enhanced Basic Attack deals extra Physical Damage 0 (+30% total Physical Attack) +2.5% of target Max HP. Masha reduces CD of this skill by 1s and recovers 10 (+15% total Physical Attack) with every Enhanced basic attack hit. Half effect on minions.

skills.name: Howl Shock
skills.description: Expends 10% HP for Masha to unleash an energy shockwave in the target direction, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the enemy hit and slowing them by 50% for 2s.

skills.name: Thunderclap
skills.description: Masha consumes 40% of her current HP bar to charge at the target enemy hero dealing Physical Damage 150 / 250 / 350 (+120% Total Physical Attack) +15% / 20% / 25% of target Current HP, knocking them back slightly with 0.25s Stun. Target will be Disarmed and Slowed for 2s.Masha is immune to control effects during the charge.

skills.name: Life Recovery
skills.description: Masha consumes all her energy to restore 1 HP bar (cannot be cast in battle).Masha is invincible while casting this skill.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Butsss
builds.description: Exp Lane : Attack Speed-focused build

Mathilda.name: Mathilda
Mathilda.description: The tribe where Mathilda lives has guarded the Holy Mountain for generations. Once, members of the tribe rescued a group of sand hunters under Kane, but unexpectedly they bit the hand that fed them by taking the Holy Mountain as their own. Mathilda was unafraid of their power. She left her hometown and met Clint. In the end, with the help of Clint, she was able to get her vengeance and return to the Holy Mountain with her tribe, inheriting the Holy Mountain's mysterious power.A brave girl who stands up and doesn't fear power

skills.name: Ancestral Guidance
skills.description: Mathilda gains Ancestral Guidance while moving. When it is fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target and granting her 80 extra Movement Speed that will decay over 2.5s.

skills.name: Soul Bloom
skills.description: Mathilda resonates with the power of her ancestors for 4s, attracting wisps as her movement distance increase (up to 6 wisps). At the end of the skill's duration, or when Matilda casts this skill again, the wisps will seek and attack nearby enemies, each dealing 275 / 320 / 365 / 410 / 455 / 500 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and revealing the enemies' positions briefly.Subsequent damage dealt by wisps to the same target decays to 40%.

skills.name: Guiding Wind
skills.description: Mathilda leaps in the target direction and creates a field around her, gaining a 500 / 600 / 700 / 800 / 900 / 1000 (+180%Total Magic Power) shield and 25% extra Movement Speed for 3s.Allied heroes who come into contact with the field will receive a 60% shield and Guiding Wind.The first allied hero that trigger Guiding Wind will be guided to Mithilda, and both will gain the same Movement Speed boost.When casting this skill during Circling Eagle, Mathilda won't change her position.Guiding Wind expires 2s after the hero leaves Mathilda's field.

skills.name: Circling Eagle
skills.description: Mathilda applies a Soul Mark to the target enemy hero and circles around them for up to 3.5s, during which wisp will fly toward nearby enemies, each dealing 40 at all level (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Soul Bloom will prioritize targets with Soul Mark.Within the duration, Mathilda can select an area to dash to. At the end of the duration, she'll dash at the target with soul mark, dealing 320 / 360 / 400 (+120%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in her path airborne for 0.6s and transferring the Soul Mark to the first enemy hero that she knock airborne.Mathilda gains Control Immunity and a 400-600 (+160%Total Magic Power) shield for the skill duration.

builds.author: Pro Player : BTR Kyy
builds.description: Roaming : Defense-focused build with enhanced durability.

Melissa.name: Melissa
Melissa.description: As an illegitimate child of a noble, Melissa grew up in the Lumina City, capital of the Moniyan Empire, where she runs a small tailor shop. Endowed with black magic, she uses cursed needles to fight, solving problems for her clients in unique ways.A girl with cursed needles who runs a tailor shop and solves problems for clients.

skills.name: Doll Buster
skills.description: Melissa deals 125% damage to Minions, Creeps and Summoned Units.

skills.name: Falling!
skills.description: Increase attack speed by 50% / 55% / 60% / 65% / 70% / 75% for 3s.The skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.5s each time Melissa damages the enemy by attacking Muddles.

skills.name: Eyes on You!
skills.description: Muddles deals 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage on the first hit and links nearby enemies for up to 6s.Linked enemies will be slowed by 60% that decays over 1.5s and can break the link by moving out of the range.Muddles will return to Melissa early when there are no enemies around and immediately is she's too far away.When Muddles is present, you can tap the Attack Minion button to directly attack Muddles, though it cannot trigger the multi-hit damage.

skills.name: Go Away!
skills.description: When activated, the field knocks back enemies in the area and deals 500 / 700 / 900 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. It'll then continuously knock back enemies who attempt to enter the field, dealing them 50 / 70 / 90 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them.The field will also interrupt the enemy's movement skills unless they're immune to control effects. The field will move with Melissa once, when she's about to move out of boundary.PASSIVE: Melissa's Physical and Magic Defense is increased by 3 / 4 / 5 . This effect is increased to 5 times when the skill is active.

builds.author: Streamer : Raja Belit
builds.description: Gold Lane : Full attack effect equipment, excellent in 1v1.

Minotaur.name: Minotaur
Minotaur.description: In olden times, there was once a state named Minoa in Agelta Drylands. The prince of the state, Minotaur, fatally injured his father in a fit of rage, after which he exiled himself to the Minoan Labyrinth in shame and regret. When he stepped out of the Labyrinth again, he found his state had long perished, his kin long gone. With his teeth set, Minotaur embarked on the path to restoring his homeland to its former glory...Minoan prince determined to restore his homeland.

skills.name: Rage Mode
skills.description: When Minotaur applies control effect to an enemy hero with a skill, he will also reduce their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s.When Minotaur heals an ally hero with a skill, he will also increase their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s.These effects are doubled in Enraged state.

skills.name: Despair Stomp
skills.description: Minotaur jumps to the target location, dealing 280 / 295 / 310 / 325 / 340 / 355 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area, briefly knocking them airborne. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 40% while Minotaur enhancing his Basic Attacks to deal (3% Total HP) extra Physical Damage for 2s.Enraged: Increases the AOE range and the damage dealt by (3% Total HP) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Motivation Roar
skills.description: Minotaur motivates himself and nearby allied heroes, restoring 260 / 280 / 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 HP for them and healing himself based on his lost HP.Enraged: Minotaur gains Enraged Regen for 2s, during which he restores HP each time he's hit by Basic Attack.

skills.name: Minoan Fury
skills.description: Minotaur enters Enraged State and smashes the ground 3 times, the first 2 hits deals 180 / 240 / 300 (+85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slow them by 70%. While the final hit deals 200 / 250 / 300 (+85% Total Physical Attack) True Damage, and knocks targets airborne. Minotaur is immune to control effects during this attack.The Enraged State lasts for 12s and enhances Minotaur's skills for the duration.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Yums
builds.description: Roaming : Full-on defense build with great durability.

builds.author: Streamer : Uncle Chikanook Gamer
builds.description: Roaming : Balanced movement speed and defense, good sustain and CC.

Minsitthar.name: Minsitthar
Minsitthar.description: A prince of the Cadia Riverlands' Mahar Pura, good at fighting and winning. He was expelled by his father because of a heretical love affair he had. When his brother raised the flag of rebellion, Minsitthar, who was in exile, returned to his motherland, put down the rebellion and became the new king.Prince of the City of the Sand, an outstanding warrior

skills.name: Mark of the King
skills.description: Minsitthar's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Mark of the King, up to 5 stacks.Upon reaching max stacks, the next attack detonates all Mark of the King stacks, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 (+6% Total HP) of Minsitthar's Max HP and stunning the target for 0.8s while healing Minsitthar for 300 (+6% Total HP) HP.Can only trigger once every 6s on the same target.

skills.name: Spear Of Glory
skills.description: Minsitthar thrusts forward with the Spear of Glory, dealing 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 / 300 (+180% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slowing enemies hit by 30%.Enemy heroes hit by the tip of the spear will be stunned for 0.6s.After a short delay, Minsitthar pulls back the spear, dealing 175 (+180% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies along the way and dragging enemy heroes hit to him.

skills.name: Shield Assault
skills.description: Minsitthar awakens the power in his shield and releases it, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+160% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in a rectangular area and slowing them by 80% (decaying rapidly over 2s).Meanwhile, he enters Phalanx state for 3s, reducing damage taken from the front by {25% / 30% / 35% / 40% / 45% / 50%} and enhancing his Basic Attack to swiftly strike an area in front of him.

skills.name: King's Calling
skills.description: Minsitthar charges forward and calls 4 Royal Guards to form a field around him. The Royal Guards cannot move but will attack enemies in the field for (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.Enemies in the field are slowed by 20% and cannot use movement skills.

builds.author: Streamer : MamaJess
builds.description: Exp Lane : Can dish out damage and AOE CC.

Miya.name: Miya
Miya.description: Miya lived in Azrya with the other Moon Elves. She stood aloof from worldly strife, and did not expect the Demon army would attack suddenly. In order to protect her homeland, Miya, as the Priestess of the Moon, led the other Moon Elves in a defense against foreign enemies.The Moon Priestess guarding the Azrya Woodlands.

skills.name: Moon Blessing
skills.description: Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack Basic Attack, she gains 5% Attack Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a Moonlight Shadow with each Basic Attack that deals 30 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Moon Arrow
skills.description: Miya shoots two extra arrows with each Basic Attack, dealing 10 (+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target enemy and 30% damage to nearby targets.This effects lasts 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 seconds. Each extra arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

skills.name: Arrow of Eclipse
skills.description: Miya launches an empowered arrow on the targeted area dealing 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.The arrow then splits into 8 scattering minor arrows, each dealing 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 (+15% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

skills.name: Hidden Moonlight
skills.description: Miya removes all her debuffs right away, conceals herself, gaining 35% / 50% / 65 Movement Speed.Miya gains full stacks of Moon Blessing upon leaving the state.

builds.author: Influencer : HEROISGOD
builds.description: Gold Lane : Attack speed-focused, rapid arrow shots for high damage.

builds.author: Influencer : Bang pascol
builds.description: Gold Lane : Attack speed & Crit. High late-game damage with Movement speed bonus.

Baxia.name: Baxia
Baxia.description: Having studied under the Great Dragon in the past with Yu Zhong, the two had true ties of friendship. After Yu Zhong's betrayal, in order to protect the Great Dragon, Baxia drove Yu Zhong out of the realm. Now that Yu Zhong is about to return to the Cadia Riverlands, Baxia is ready to once again expel Yu Zhong, who had completely turned into the Black Dragon.A disciple of the Great Dragon, dedicated to safeguarding peace in the Cadia Riverlands

skills.name: Baxia Mark
skills.description: Baxia activates the "Baxia Mark" permanently, reducing the final damage received by 25.At the same time, Baxia will reduce the Shield and HP Regen of enemies hit by his skills by 50% for 4s.

skills.name: Baxia-Shield Unity
skills.description: Baxia retracts himself into his shield and accelerates forward. When hitting an enemy unit, he will deal 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+60%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to it and nearby enemies, stunning the target for 0.8s and slightly knocking other nearby enemies back.During the process of accelerating forward, use this skill again to launch Baxia upward so that he can cross obstacles and enemy minions.When leaping up, if there is an enemy hero under Baxia, he will strike to this hero, dealing 375 / 400 / 425 / 450 / 475 / 500 (+75%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to this hero and nearby enemies, stunning the hit target for 1.5s, and slightly knocking other nearby enemy targets back.

skills.name: Shield of Spirit
skills.description: Baxia throws out his shield, dealing Magic Damage equal to 180 / 195 / 210 / 225 / 240 / 225 (+120%Total Magic Power) plus 6% of the target's Max HP to the enemies along the way, marking them for 5s, and slowing them by 50% for 1s.The shield disappears upon hitting the first enemy hero or creep.Baxia can cast the skill again in a short while. If an enemy hero or creep is hit by the skill, the skill's cooldown will be reduced to 15%.

skills.name: Tortoise's Puissance
skills.description: Baxia holds his shield to the front and begins sprinting frantically, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 10s while leaving a lava path behind.Enemies on the path will take 40 / 45 / 50 (+30%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 15% for 0.5s every 0.5s.For the duration, the Damage Reduction effect from Baxia Mark is increased to 240%.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS. TAZZ
builds.description: Jungle : Good sustainability. Can tank and dish out damage. #BaxiaBuild

builds.author: No.1 Anry
builds.description: #BaxiaBuild

Moskov.name: Moskov
Moskov.description: Moskov and Khaleed fought together with the Thornwolf Tribe, but Khaleed became more popular than Moskov, which was very hard for Moskov to take. When Khufra was awakened, Moskov rushed to the battlefield to prove himself despite the dissuasions of his companions, but he almost lost his life, and all his family members died. He was so desperate that he gave his soul to the abyss and has lived for revenge ever since.Once a tribal prince, now an abyss warrior

skills.name: Spear of Quiescence
skills.description: Moskov’s Basic Attack can penetrate the target and deal (68% Total Physical Attack) – (110% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies behind them (inherits Attack Effects).Each Basic Attack hits reduce the cooldown of Abyss Walker and Spear of Misery by 0.8s.

skills.name: Abyss Walker
skills.description: Moskov teleport to the target location, increasing his Attack Speed to 1.15 / 1.22 / 1.29 / 1.36 / 1.43 / 1.5 times for 3s.Meanwhile his Basic Attack deals 10% more damage to enemies behind the primary target.

skills.name: Spear of Misery
skills.description: Moskov launches a powerful strikes at the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage knocking them back revealing their position 5s.If the target collides with another enemy hero when knocked back, they'll both take 200 / 215 / 230 / 245 / 260 / 275 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and be stunned for 1.5s.If the enemy is knocked into a wall, they'll be stunned for 1.5s.

skills.name: Spear Of Destruction
skills.description: After a short delay, Moskov throws out the Spear of Destruction in the target direction, dealing 600 / 700 / 800 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path and to the first enemy hero hit.Upon hitting an enemy hero, the Spear explodes and deals 780 / 910 / 1040 (+130% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies behind them. The enemy hero and enemies hit by the explosion are slowed by 50% for 1s.The slow duration scales with the spear's travel time, up to 5s.

builds.author: Pro Player: SMG.Sasa
builds.description: Extreme Attack Speed can Dish out Damage from a good Position.

Nana.name: Nana
Nana.description: In order to have the means of controlling the magic in her body and stop causing trouble, Nana went to the Shadow Swamp in search of a magical fruit with her good friend Molina. But when danger came, Molina died protecting Nana. Although Nana got what she wanted, she also lost her friend. With the strength that Molina left her, Nana embarked on a new journey.Little Leonin with no worries

skills.name: Molina's Gift
skills.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Nana removes all debuffs on her and transforms, becoming untargetable and invincible, and gains 70% Movement Speed for 2s. She also recovers 10% Max HP over the duration.Nana can only transform once every 150s and cannot cast skills in the transformed form.

skills.name: Magic Boomerang
skills.description: Nana hurls her Magical Boomerang in the target direction, dealing damage to the enemies hit on its way out and back. The boomerang deals 320 / 344 / 368 / 392 / 416 / 440 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit.For every additional enemy hit, the damage is reduced by 20% (max reduction of 60%).

skills.name: Molina Smooch
skills.description: Nana summons Molina at the target location. Molina will deal 250 / 275 / 300 / 325 / 350 / 375 (+50%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy heroes within range and transform them for 1.5s, and also slow them by 30% and reduce their Magic Defense by 25% for the duration.Transformed Heroes can't attack or use skills.If there are no enemy heroes in range, Molina will disappear after 12s.

skills.name: Molina Blitz
skills.description:
Nana summons Molina to strike the target area 3 times, each time dealing 440 / 550 / 660 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within and slowing them by 50% for 1s.

Enemies hit consecutively will be stunned for 1s.

builds.author: Streamer : Soloz
builds.description: Mid Lane : Balanced CD reduction and damage to keep spamming skills in teamfights.

Natalia.name: Natalia
Natalia.description: The chief assassin of the Church of Light. She once made a mistake during an assassination mission, making her companion encounter unprecedented disaster. Although she was able to escape with the assistance of Tigreal, she was later exiled to the border of the Empire to perform more dangerous tasks.Assassin exiled by the Empire

skills.name: Assassin Instinct
skills.description: If Natalia stays in bush without taking damage for 1s, she will enter Camouflage state and gain 15% Movement Speed.In this state, Natalia's next Basic Attack will teleport her behind her target and deal 200 (+110%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while silencing the target for 0.25s.Dealing damage, taking damage or using skill will immediately end the Camouflage state, but her next Basic Attack will remain enhanced for another 1s.Natalia's base Crit Damage is reduced to 150%, but her damage to Creeps is increased to 150%

skills.name: Claw Dash
skills.description: Natalia dashes in the target direction, dealing 250 / 270 / 290 / 310/ 330 / 350 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in her path.After hitting an enemy, she can cast this skill again within 5s.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.description: Natalia releases a Smoke Bomb at her location, slowing enemy within by 25% / 35% / 45% / 55% / 65% / 75% while Natalia becomes immune to enemy Basic Attacks for 4s.

skills.name: The Hunt
skills.description: PASSIVE: Natalia gains 15% extra Crit Chance.ACTIVE: Natalia immediately enters Assassin Instinct state, Natalia can store up to 2 charges of her Ultimate and each charge has a recharge time of 30s. Creep kills will reduce the current remaining recharging time by 50% of the full recharge time.

builds.author: Pro Player : GEEK Baloyskie
builds.description: Roaming : Can one-shot squishy enemies.

builds.author: Streamer : 疑犯_ Yifan
builds.description: Jungle : New CDD reduction & Crit build. Eliminate squishies with two enhanced Basic Attacks in late game.

builds.author: Pro Player : DEWA LeoMurphy
builds.description: Roaming : Can one-shot enemy heroes with extremely high burst damage.

Natan.name: Natan
Natan.description:
A thousand years after falling into a deep slumber, the Lord of the Abyss and the Lord of Light awoke, and so the Endless War raged once more. Natan stood as Eruditio's leader, guiding the people in their search for hope in this world. Yet having faced numerous defeats he decided instead to cast his gaze not to the future, but to the pastâ€”by inventing a time machine. As the world teetered on the brink of destruction, his time machine finally reached completion as it absorbed the combined power of the Twilight Orbs: Natan stepped within, and started searching the past for a chance to save the world.A
time-traveler with a masterful grasp on all things scientific and
magical.

skills.name: Theory of Everything
skills.description: Natan gains a stack of Entanglement each time he or his Reverse-Clone hits an enemy with a skill (up to 6 stacks).Each stack lasts 5 seconds and grants 7.5%–15% extra Attack Speed and 7.5% Movement Speed.Natan's Basic Attacks projectiles will return to Natan after reaching the maximum range, dealing an extra 45 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way (inherits 70% of Natan's attack effects).

skills.name: Superposition
skills.description: Natan shoots a dense mass of energy, dealing 225 / 285 / 345 / 405 / 465 / 525 (+100% Total Physical Attack) (+140% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along its path.

skills.name: Interference!
skills.description: Natan launches a Gravitational Attractor in the target direction, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and knocking them back.The Attractor detonate upon reaching the maximum range, dealing 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 (+10% Total Physical Attack) (+14% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back.

skills.name: Entropy?
skills.description: Natan summons a Reverse-Clone at a target location 6 units away that lasts 10s, inherits 35% / 37.5% / 40% of his attack attributes (and a portion of Attack Effects), and will copy moves and attacks in reverse.Use Again: Natan switches places with the Reverse-Clone.Each cast reduces other skills' remaining cooldowns by 50%. The Reverse-Clone will disappear if Natan is too far away, while the cooldown of this skill will be reduced by the remaining duration.

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Nino
builds.description: Gold Lane : Balanced build with good mobility, durability and damage.

Nolan.name: Nolan
Nolan.description: A scholar who traversed the multiverse and can cut through dimensions.

skills.name: Dimension Rift
skills.description: Nolan’s skills can cut through space itself, leaving a rift on the ground that last 5s and slows enemies that come into contact with it by 30%.When a rift comes into contact with another Rift, it will explode after a short delay, dealing 150 (+120% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage and pulling enemies in.Nolan gains extra 15 energy for each enemy hero or creeps hit by a rift explosion. When multiple hit explosion hits the same enemy at the same time, the subsequent damage would be reduced to 75% of the previous hit.After every 6s, Nolan will enhance his next Basic Attack to dash and pierce the target for (+120% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage while creating a Rift.

skills.name: Expansion
skills.description: Nolan cuts a Rectangular area in front of him dealing 230 / 280 / 330 / 380 / 430 / 480 (+40% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage and slowing targets hit by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Gauge
skills.description: Nolan charges in the target direction, dealing 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 / 220 (+30% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage to enemies in his path.

skills.name: Fracture
skills.description: Nolan removes all debuffs on himself & slashes enemies in the target location 3 times, dealing 120 / 150 / 180 (+50% Extra Physical ATK) Physical Damage with each slash leaving 3 rifts as he dashes backward.

skills.name: Star Trail
skills.description: Astral Spheres summoned by Novaria will continuously slow nearby enemies by 20% and grant vision of them.

skills.name: Astral Meteor
skills.description: Novaria summons an Astral Spheres at the target location. continuously dealing 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+25% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.After 2s, the sphere will explode, dealing Magic Damage equal to 260 / 285 / 310 / 335 / 360 / 385 (+50% Total Magic Power) plus 4% of the enemy's Max HP to nearby enemies, and increasing Astral Sphere's slow effect to 2.5 times the original slow effect.

skills.name: Astral Recall
skills.description: Novaria summons an Astral Sphere at a distance and draws it towards her. At the same time, Novaria gains 20% Movement Speed and can pass through terrain. Passing through a wall will increase the Movement bonus to 60%.When the Astral Sphere reaches Novaria, she can cast Star Shatter to launch it in a target direction within 5s. The sphere will explode when hitting an enemy hero, dealing Magic Damage equal to 230 / 252 / 274 / 296 / 318 / 340 (+45% Total Magic Power) plus 4% / 4.4% / 4.8% / 5.2% / 5.6% / 6% of the target's Max HP.The damage will increase based on the Astral Sphere's travel distance (starting from when the sphere is summoned) up to 2.5 times the original.

skills.name: Astral Echo
skills.description: Novaria scatters Astral Echo in the target direction, briefly slowing enemy heroes hit by 50%  while applying Astral Ring on them, increasing their hitbox by 2.5 times and revealing their surrounding area.This effect lasts 8s.

builds.author: Influencer : Ihsan Luminaire
builds.description: Mid Lane : Extreme single-target burst. One shot, one kill.

Odette.name: Odette
Odette.description: As the daughter of Prince Alvin, Princess Odette was a romantic that seemed a well-behaved, obedient lady but actually yearned for adventures instead. After she became acquanted with Lancelot and rescued him in a duel ruckus, Odette slowly became aware of her own feelings towards Lancelot. Finally, she made the decision to leave the Swan Castle and set out on an adventure in search of her loved one.Innocent princess that grew up in the Swan Castle and genius mage that excels in sword and scepter.

skills.name: Lakeshore Ambience
skills.description: Each skill cast grants extra range on Odette's next Basic Attack and causes it to bounce between enemies and herself (prioritizing enemies), dealing 144-200 (+50%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage per hit.Odette's skills will also trigger this effect.

skills.name: Avian Authority
skills.description: Odette release a magic swan in the target direction, dealing 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

skills.name: Blue Nova
skills.description: Odette releases a set of magic energy balls in the target direction, dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.5s.After hitting an enemy, another energy ball will split off and attack a nearby enemy (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1.5s.

skills.name: Swan Song
skills.description: Odette begins to dance, gaining a 1400 / 1600 / 1800 (+150%Total Magic Power) shield while dealing up to 2400 / 2800 / 3200 (+900%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a large area around her for 5s. The bounce speed and frequency of Lakeshore Ambience's sound wave in the area are also enhanced when the skill is active.Use again while the skill is active to dash in the target direction.The skill is a channeling cast and will be interrupted if Odette is hit by high level control effects (knocked airborne, transformed, etc.) or if she performs another action.

builds.author: Streamer : Pakcik Gaming
builds.description: Mid Lane : Enough survivability to allow Ultimate to deal its damage.

skills.name: Champ Stance
skills.description: After every 3 skill casts, Paquito enters Champ Stance, gaining an enhanced skill ignoring his current cooldowns.He gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.8s after casting the enhanced skill.Paquito's Basic Attacks only deal (85% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Heavy Left Punch
skills.description: Paquito throws a punch in the target direction, dealing 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 / 360 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.If this skill hits an enemy hero or Creep, Paquito will also gains 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 550 / 650 (+135% Total Physical Attack) shield for 2.5s.Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and the shield value is increased to 140%. The normal and enhanced shields can stack.

skills.name: Jab
skills.description: Paquito dashes in the target direction and throws a jab, dealing 150 / 210 / 270 / 330 / 390 / 450 (+165% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.Paquito will stop and throw the jab immediately upon colliding within an enemy hero or Creep during the dash.Champ Stance: The damage is increased to 250 / 350 / 450 / 550 / 650 / 750 (+230% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Knockout Strike
skills.description: Paquito launches an elbow strike in the target direction, dealing 250 / 300 / 350 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocking them back.He then throws a haymaker, dealing 300 / 375 / 450 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 1s, as he darts backward.Champ Stance: Instead of a haymaker, Paquito launches an uppercut after the elbow strike, dealing 400 / 500 / 600 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 0.5s.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Smooth
builds.description: Jungle : High damage to eliminate squishies with one skill combo.

Pharsa.name: Pharsa
Pharsa.description: As princess of the Crow Clan of Askati Forest, she was born with mutated blood. The mutation could gain her amazing abilities if she is awakened. When Alice invaded Askati Forest, the awakened Pharsa drove Alice away and lost her eyesight. After that, her lover turned himself into a crow to replace her eyes.Crow Princess of Askati Forest

skills.name: Spiritual Unity
skills.description: Every 8s, Verri enters Hunting State and assists Pharsa on her next attack againts an enemy hero, dealing 8% extra Magic Damage equal to the target's Max HP (+1% for every 200 Magic Power owned) and slowing them by 60% for 1s.

skills.name: Curse of Crow
skills.description: Pharsa unleashes a blast of magic at the target location, dealing 300 / 325 / 350 / 375 / 400 / 425 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and marking them for 4s.Pharsa subsequent attack against marked target will consumed the mark and  stun them for 1s.

skills.name: Energy Impact
skills.description: Pharsa releases a wave of magic energy in the target direction, dealing 425 / 470 / 515 / 560 / 605 / 650 (+145% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit.

skills.name: Feathered Air Strike
skills.description: Pharsa takes flight for 8s and bombards the target location, dealing 570 / 720 / 870 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemies within the area.This skill can be cast up to 4 times within the duration.

skills.name: Wings by Wings
skills.description: Pharsa turns into mist and wrap herself around Verri, gaining the ability to fly over terrain. While in this state, she gains 135% Movement Speed that decays over time.This state lasts up to 5s or until Pharsa uses a Basic Attack or skill, or is controlled.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Moon
builds.description: Mid Lane : Great burst build that provide high Ultimate damage.

Phoveus.name: Phoveus
Phoveus.description: Phoveus was framed. Having been severely punished, he was then sent to fight with the vanguard. Once battle was over. Phoveus came across a most mysterious cage; one in which was sealed the spirit of Astaros, God of Terror. Bewitched by Astaros, Phoveus sacrificed his own two eyes in exchange for a great power, and now the two head ever deeper into the Dread Caves to awaken the body of Astaros that slumbers within.A warrior bewitched by the God of Terror Astaros, who fell deep into the Abyss.

skills.name: Demonic Intuition
skills.description: Phoveus' weapon, Astaros, holds mysterious powers and is exceptionally sensitive to fast-moving prey.When an enemy hero uses Blink or Charge skills within 8 yards of Astaros, it reduces all of Phoveus' skill cooldowns or charge times by 1s.

skills.name: Malefic Terror
skills.description: Phoveus smashes the ground and unleashes Astaros Dread, dealing 300 / 360 / 420 / 480 / 540 / 600 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target.Upon hitting an enemy hero, Phoveus receives a 0 / 110 / 220 / 330 / 440 / 550 (+60% Total Magic Power) (+6% Total HP) Shield as well as a 25% Movement Speed boost for 3s.If an enemy hero, creep or Phoveus himself touches Astaros Dread, it will spread and deal extra damage (successive damage dealt to the same enemy decays to 25%).This skill gains 1 charge every 8.5 / 7.7 / 6.9 / 6.1 / 5.3 / 4.5 seconds, up to 3 charges, and deals 160% damage to minions.

skills.name: Astaros Eye
skills.description: Phoveus summons forth Astaros Eye in a targeted area that deals 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.After 1s, Astaros Eye starts shrinking and pulling all enemies on it into its center, dealing 250 / 300 / 350 / 100 / 450 / 500 (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Demonic Force
skills.description: Astaros keeps a watchful gaze over an area of 8 yards around Phoveus. If it sees an enemy hero using blink or charge skills, it will be activated and cast a Mark upon them for 3s.During this time, Phoveus can rapidly blink to their location to deliver a fierce blow, dealing 600 / 760 / 920 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the target and its vicinity and gaining a 160 / 260 / 360 (+50% Total Magic Power) (+5% Total HP) Shield.Once Phoveus activates this effect, this skill can be cast repeatedly at the cost of Mana for up to 12s before entering cooldown, as long as the required conditions are met.

builds.author: Streamer : Game Ming
builds.description: Exp lane : Damage-focused to eliminate enemies hiding in the back.

Popol and Kupa.name: Popol and Kupa
Popol and Kupa.description: Popol is a naughty boy who has ambitions and lofty ideals but is not understood. In order to prove himself, he went alone to hunt down the Icefield Dire Wolves, but accidentally fell into a trap. There was also an Dire Wolf called Kupa inside the trap. After a long time together, they developed a friendship and fought against a group of vultures together. Later, Popol and Kupa became the closest partners in the Ice Field.Boy and an Icefield Wolf, partners who understand each other well

skills.name: We Are Friends
skills.description: Popol recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s.When Kupa is killed, Popol can Pray for 3s to bring it back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 45s.Every 3 consecutive attacks from Kupa will enhance Popol's next Basic Attack to deal (+220% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa has 2500 (+1200% Total Physical Attack) Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects (excluding Jungling, and Roaming equipment effects).Kupa deals an additional 150% damage against Creeps.

skills.name: Bite 'em, Kupa!
skills.description: Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing 80 / 110 / 140 / 170 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage while simultaneously commanding Kupa to lunge at the target, dealing 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa will continue attacks the target for 3s. Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in a quick succession.

skills.name: Kupa, Help!
skills.description: Popol summons Kupa back to his side, gaining a 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s.Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s.Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%.

skills.name: Popol's Surprise
skills.description: Popol sets a trap at a target location that will detonate after a short delay once triggered dealing 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy that step on it, immobilizing them for 1s, and creating a frost zone for 4s. Enemies in the frost zone will have their Movement Speed reduced by 20%.Popol gains a trap charge every 22 / 20 / 18 / 16 seconds (up to 3). Up to 3 traps can exist at the same time on the battlefield, each lasting 60s.

skills.name: We Are Angry!
skills.description: Popol and Kupa enter the Enraged state for 12s gaining 15% extra Movement Speed and increasing their Attack Speed to 1.3 / 1.5 / 1.7 times.Kupa turns into the Alpha Wolf Form, gains 1500 / 2500 / 3500 Max HP, fully restoring its HP, while enhancing its other skills.

skills.name: I Need You, Kupa!
skills.description: Popol prays for Kupa's return on the battlefield. Kupa will return if this skill is not interrupted in 3s.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Momo
builds.description: Gold Lane : High attack makes wolf more tanky.

Rafaela.name: Rafaela
Rafaela.description: Rafaela and her elder brother Argus are both angels, but Argus was treated differently because of his status as a male angel. All praise was given to Rafaela, and all criticism was left to Argus. After a series of events that were left to ferment, rifts appeared in the relationship between the two siblings. Argus finally fell into the Abyss, something that Rafaela regretted, but was helpless to do anything about. She is an angel whom people admire, but her elder brother continues to perish in pain.An angel loved and respected by the people of this world

skills.name: Deity Penalization
skills.description: When Rafaela is killed, she turns into beam of Holy Light and launches herself at her killer after a 2s delay. This attack deals True Damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP upon hit and can be blocked by other enemy heroes, dealing damage to them instead.This effect won't be triggered if the killer is a non- hero or they're too far away.

skills.name: Light Of Retribution
skills.description: Rafaela strikes the three nearest enemies with Light of Retribution, dealing them 225 / 280 / 335 / 390 / 445 / 500 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage briefly revealing their positions and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s.Enemies hit by Light of Retribution again within 5s will take 20% extra damage (this effect stack up to 3 times).

skills.name: Holy Healing
skills.description: Rafaela calls upon Holy Light, restoring 100 / 110 / 120 / 130 / 140 / 150 (+35% Total Magic Power) HP to nearby allied heroes plus an additional 150 / 170 / 190 / 210/ 230 / 250 (+45% Total Magic Power) HP to herself and the most injured allied hero in range.Also Increasing  Movement Speed of nearby allied heroes by 30% and grant Slow Immunity by 50% for 1s.Every 20 point(s) of Magic Power will add 1% to the Movement Speed bonus, up to 80%.

skills.name: Holy Baptism
skills.description: Rafaela unleashes true power of Holy Light in the target direction, dealing 460 / 560 / 660 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a line and stunning them for 1.2s.

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Rasy
builds.description: Roaming : Good at poking enemies and supporting teammates.

Roger.name: Roger
Roger.description: Roger was once a human being. During a battle with the werewolf White Fang, he was killed by White Fang's sharp teeth and resurrected as a werewolf. Roger, who had been reborn, vowed to take revenge and eradicate the threat of the werewolves from this world.A werewolf wandering in the dark forests longing for revenge

skills.name: Full Moon Curse
skills.description: Roger can freely switch between human and wolf forms.In human form, Roger's Basic Attacks & Skills deal additional damage +5% target current HP.In wolf form, Roger's Basic Attack & Skills deal +5% of the target's lost HP.Deals extra damage up to 60 extra damage against Creeps.

skills.name: Open Fire
skills.description: Roger fires two quick shots in the target direction, dealing 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 (+125% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage in total to the enemy hit.The first shot is a hunter net that slows the enemy by 80% for 1.5s, while the second is a bullet that reduces the enemy's Physical Defense by 10 / 14 / 22 / 26 / 30 for 5s.

skills.name: Lycan Pounce
skills.description: Roger lunges at the enemy, becoming untargetable while dealing 250 / 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 (+125% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to up to 3 enemies in the area.Kill or assist will reduce the cooldown of this skill by 80%.

skills.name: Hunter's Steps
skills.description: Roger gains 20% extra Movement Speed & 20% Attack Speed for 2.5s.

skills.name: Bloodthirsty Howl
skills.description: Roger lets out a howl, increasing his Attack Speed to 1.15 / 1.2 / 1.25 / 1.3 / 1.35 / 1.4 times for 5s.For the duration, he'll gain 50% Movement Speed if an enemy hero below 40% HP within his vision.

skills.name: Wolf Transformation
skills.description: Roger lunges in the target direction and turns into wolf form, dealing 150 / 200 / 250 / 300 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing enemies by 90% for 0.8s.PASSIVE: In Wolf form, Roger gains 25 / 40 / 55 / 70 Physical and Magic Defense and 25 Movement Speed.

skills.name: Restore Human Form
skills.description: Roger rolls in the target direction and reverts to human form, gaining 200 / 250 / 300 / 350 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) shield for 1.5s.

builds.author: Streamer : XK Penjahat
builds.description: Jungle : Extreme movement speed and a merciless finisher.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.description: The village where Ruby lived was attacked by werewolves. At the time of crisis, Roger appeared to help them repel the werewolves. Roger taught Ruby how to fight and gave her a sickle so that she could protect herself and the village.A girl who grew up with Roger's help

skills.name: Let's Dance!
skills.description: Ruby starts with 10% Spell Vamp and her skill have 125% Spell Vamp Ratio (but her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal).After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another place, gaining 9 (+1.8 × Hero Level) Physical Defense and Magic Defense (scales with level) for 4s (stacks up to 3 times).

skills.name: Be Good!
skills.description: Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 90 (+{70% / 82% / 94% / 106% / 118% / 130%} Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.She then unleashes a shockwave in the same direction, dealing 90 (+{70% / 82% / 94% / 106% / 118% / 130%} Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Don't Run, Wolf King!
skills.description: Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swings dealing 60 / 85 / 110 / 135 / 160 / 185 (+55% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies, stunning enemies for 0.5s and slightly pulling them towards her.

skills.name: I'm Offended!
skills.description: Ruby sweeps her scythe in the target direction, dealing 200 / 340 / 480 (+200% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies, pulling them to her and stunning them for 0.5s.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Valenz
builds.description: Roaming : Excellent front line controller.

builds.author: Streamer : MamaJess
builds.description: Exp Lane : High recovery to tank through teamfights.

Saber.name: Saber
Saber.description: Once called Duanmeng and obsessed with kendo, Saber came to Laboratory 1718 to transform himself in order to pursue true invincibility, but his memory was erased and he became a killing machine. The torture of his memories drove him to finally destroy the laboratory and he set off on a life on the run searching for the past.A swordsman in pursuit of invincibility, used by Laboratory 1718

skills.name: Enemy's Bane
skills.description: Saber's attacks reduce Physical Defense by 3–8 for 5s on hit. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Orbiting Swords
skills.description: Saber releases 5 swords that orbit around him and deal 80 / 85 / 90 / 95 / 100 / 105 (+30% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies on hit. The swords will retract back to him after a while.When the swords are present, Saber sends a sword toward his target on each attack, dealing 210 / 220 / 230 / 240 / 250 / 260 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and 50% of the damage to other enemies it passes through (damage against Minions is reduced to 50%).Each attack also reduces the cooldown of Charge by 1s.

skills.name: Charge
skills.description: Saber dashes in the target direction, dealing 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way while enhancing his next Basic Attack.The enhanced Basic Attack deals 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1s.

skills.name: Triple Sweep
skills.description: Saber charges at the target enemy hero, knocking them airborne for 1.2s and striking them 3 times over the duration.The first two strikes deal 120 / 150 / 180 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the third strike deals 240 / 300 / 360 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Subway
builds.description: Jungle : Burst damage that can take out non-tank with a full combo.

Selena.name: Selena
Selena.description: The Dark Elf Selena had been dependent on her sister Karina since childhood. Selena maintained her innocent nature under the protection of her sister, until she discovered the dirty things her sister Karina had done for her. She thought that she had become a burden for her sister. In order to gain more power, she dedicated herself to the Abyss, but did not want to be completely controlled by the Abyss and ultimately became a horrifying demon.Dark Elf girl who fell into the Abyss

skills.name: Symbiosis
skills.description: Selena can switch freely between her two forms.Elven Form: Selena applies "Abyssal Mark" with her skills. The mark can stack up to 2 times. When "Abyssal Trap" hits an enemy, it immediately adds an "Abyssal Mark".Abyssal Form: All damage will consume 1 stack of "Abyssal Mark" to deal 240-450 (+40% Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage.

skills.name: Abyssal Trap
skills.description: Selena summons an Abyssal Devil to lurk in a designated location. The Abyssal Devil will attach itself to any enemy that approaches the location and slow them by 70%.After 1s, the Abyssal Devil deals 350 / 390 / 430 / 470 / 510 / 550 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the enemy and other nearby enemies and slows them by 50% for 1s.The Abyssal Devil lasts up to 60s. Up to 3 Abyssal Devils can exist at the same time. Each extra Abyssal Devil increases the final damage by 50%.

skills.name: Soul Eater
skills.description: Selena strengthen her claws with the power of the Abyss, causing the next Basic Attack to deal extra 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 / 350 (+130% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, while granting a Shield that absorbs 300 / 350 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+150% Total Magic Power) damage.

skills.name: Abyssal Arrow
skills.description: Selena fires magic arrows in a designated direction, dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+20% Total Magic Power) to 500 / 560 / 620 / 680 / 740 / 800 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to the first enemy hero hit and stunning it for 0.5s to 3s.Stun duration and damage increase with the distance that the arrows travel.The arrow absorbs  "Abyssal Traps" as it travels and hence will apply effects of "Abyssal Traps" to the enemy target upon hit. If an enemy is stunned for 1s or longer, Selena's Movement Speed will be increased by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Garotte
skills.description: Selena charges in a designated direction, dealing 150 / 190 / 230 / 270 / 310 / 350 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.If this damage triggers "Abyssal Mark" effect, its CD resets immediately.

skills.name: Primal Darkness
skills.description: Selena enters Abyssal Form and increases her Movement Speed by 30% / 35% / 40% / 45% for 0.8s.Immediately resets the CD of "Soul Eater" and "Garotte".Abyssal Form: Selena gains new skills. Her Basic Attack Basic Attack will deal (+25% Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage.

skills.name: Blessing of the Moon Goddess
skills.description: Selena enters Elven Form and increases her Movement Speed for 30% / 35% / 40% / 45%. Lasts 0.8s.Immediately reset the CD of "Abyssal Trap" and "Abyssal Arrow".

builds.author: Streamer : XK Penjahat
builds.description: Mid Lane : High CD reduction to spam CC skills, with some burst too.

Silvanna.name: Silvanna
Silvanna.description: The princess of the Moniyan Empire. After her younger brother disappeared, she took up the burden of the country and joined the Empire Chevaliers, becoming the best female knight of the Empire Chevaliers.

skills.name: Knightess' Resolve
skills.description: Silvanna's Basic Attacks deal 25 (+45% Total Physical Attack) (+75% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.Silvanna's attacks apply a mark on enemy heroes for 5s on hit, each mark reducing their Physical & Magic Defense by 3–6 (up to 5 stacks).Silvanna deals 30% extra damage to enemy heroes with the max number of marks.

skills.name: Cometic Lance
skills.description: Silvanna thrusts her lance in the target direction, dealing 150 / 170 / 190 / 210 / 230 / 250 (+70% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in a line and stunning the first enemy hero hit for 1s.Successfully hitting an enemy allows Silvanna to cast this skill again within 4.5s to dash a set distance in the target direction or until she hits an enemy hero or creep, after which she swings her lance, dealing 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Spiral Strangling
