skills.description: Silvanna thrusts her lance in the target direction and spins it 6 times while gaining a 250 / 280 / 310 / 340 / 370 / 400 (+150% Total Magic Power) shield.Each spin deals 165 / 183 / 201 / 219 / 237 / 255 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slightly pulls targets toward the center.Silvanna spins 1 additional time for every 50% of extra Attack Speed she possesses.The skill deals only 50% damage against Minions.Spiral Strangling counts as a Basic Attack but cannot critically strike.

skills.name: Imperial Justice
skills.description: Silvanna leaps to the target location and creates a Circle of Light upon landing, dealing 350 / 500 / 650 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area, slowing them by 40% for 1.5s, and restraining the closest enemy hero to the area for 3.5s. (this skill cannot be interrupt)Silvanna gains 100% Attack Speed and 40% Lifesteal when in the Circle.

skills.name: Silvanna BUFF
skills.description: If Dyrroth is in the enemy's team, increases self's attack speed by 1%.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Butsss
builds.description: EXP Lane : Powerful burst and lifesteal. Great for finishing enemies off with Ultimate + blink.

Sun.name: Sun
Sun.description: The king of the monkeys, unruly and lawless. He was once suppressed by the gods under a mountain. After breaking out from this imprisonment, he regained his freedom and prepared to show his skills on this continent.Unruly monkey king

skills.name: Simian God
skills.description: Enemies hit by Sun or his Doppelgangers will have their Physical Defense reduced by 4% (stacks up to 10 times).Sun recovers HP equal to 50% of the Doppelganger's Physical Attack each time a Doppelganger deals damage.

skills.name: Endless Variety
skills.description: Sun hurls his Golden Staff in a target direction, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path.Upon hitting an enemy heroes or Creeps, or reaching the maximum range, the Golden Staff morphs into a Doppelganger that last 5s and inherit 40% / 43% / 46% / 49% / 52% / 55% of Sun's attributes (and a portion of his Attack Effect).Endless Variety and Swift Exchange are learned and upgraded together and share the same cooldown.

skills.name: Swift Exchange
skills.description: Sun hurls his Golden Staff in the target direction, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path.He conjure a Doppelganger at his location that last 5s and inherit 40% of his attributes (and a portion of his Attack Effects), conceals himself and moves with the Golden Staff. Sun reappears and retrieves the Golden Staff when it hits an enemy hero or reaches the maximum range.

skills.name: Instantaneous Move
skills.description: Sun commands his Doppelgangers to strike at the enemy with him, dealing 170 / 200 / 230 / 260 / 290 / 320 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and enemies behind them.

skills.name: Clone Techniques
skills.description: Sun summons a Doppelganger that last 12s and inherits 70% / 85% / 100% of his attributes and a portion of his Attack Effect. The Doppelganger take increased damage.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS. TAZZ
builds.description: Jungle : Balanced damage and survivability. Clones are strong too.

Terizla.name: Terizla
Terizla.description: The once-revered master craftsman was now known as the notorious Executioner of the Abyss, but Terizla didn't care. From the moment he was framed as a heretic by the Church, he had been wielding his hammer solely for revenge, for the day he could at last soothe the restless souls of his kin.Once an eccentric master smith, but now an avenger siding with the Abyss.

skills.name: Body Of Smith
skills.description: Terizla gains 1% extra Damage Reduction (up to 30%) for every 2.5% HP lost.He cannot gain extra Attack Speed and will convert every 1% extra Attack Speed he's supposed to receive into 1 extra Physical Attack.

skills.name: Revenge Strike
skills.description: Terizla cracks the ground with his hammer and the fissure will spread out, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.After the fissure hits the first target, it will drill into the target and slow them by 15%.At the same time, Terizla's Movement Speed will be increased by 25% / 28% / 31% / 34% / 37% / 40% for 3.5s.The fissure on target will then explode, dealing 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 / 420 / 450 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) plus 20% of the enemy's lost HP Physical Damage.

skills.name: Execution Strike
skills.description:
Terizla waves his hammer in a fan-shaped area ahead. This skill can be cast up to 3 times.The first two attacks deal 135 / 170 / 205 / 240 / 275 / 310 (+160% - 185% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each,while the third deals 225 / 270 / 315 / 360 / 405 / 450 (+220% - 320% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.Enemies hit will also be slowed by 20% for 1.25s (the Slowing Effect can stack).

Deals only 60% / 68% / 76% / 84% / 92% / 100% damage to minions.

skills.name: Penalty Zone
skills.description: Terizla jumps to the designated area, dealing 300 / 450 / 600 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s.He then summons  Scaffold and slows enemies by 45%.Scaffold will send out a hook at the enemy heroes in range and pull them for several times while dealing 150 / 200 / 250 (+30% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage each time.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Butsss
builds.description: Exp Lane : Balanced damage and durability

builds.author: Pro Player : AE PAI
builds.description: Exp Lane : Initiator with good sustainability in teamfights.

Thamuz.name: Thamuz
Thamuz.description: A warrior who believed in the Abyss and was appointed as the leader of the Abyss Legion. Because the Fire Demons were affected by the Abyss for thousands of years and are considered the race closest to the Abyss, Thamuz has always had a high sense of superiority and self-esteem.King of the Fire Demons

skills.name: Grand Lord Lava
skills.description: When Thamuz is holding his Scythes, his each Basic Attack has a chance to conjure a burst of Lava Energy beneath the target that erupts after a 0.7s delay, dealing 50 (+110% Total Physical Attack) True Damage.When without Scythes, Thamuz gains 25% extra Movement Speed and will enhance his basic attack after retrieving the Scythes. The enhanced Basic Attack slows the target by 30% and is guaranteed to trigger Lava Energy.

skills.name: Molten Scythes
skills.description: Thamuz tosses the Scythes in the target direction,. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 120 / 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. The Scythes will then slow nearby enemies by 30% and deals 45 / 52 / 59 / 66 / 73 / 80 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage every 0.5s.After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or certain distance, the Scythes will return to Thamuz and drag enemies in their path to him. Thamuz can approach the Scythes or cast this skill again or to retrieve them.

skills.name: Chasm Trample
skills.description: Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 230 / 255 / 280 / 305 / 330 / 355 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slow the enemy units by 25% for 2s upon landing.If the scythes are still traveling, they will return to Thamuz and Molten Scythes will reset its CD instantly.

skills.name: Cauterant Inferno
skills.description: Thamuz spouts the lava stored within his body, dealing 300 / 390 / 480 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and creating a Cauterant Zone around him.The Cauterant Zone lasts 9s and deals 30 / 45 / 60 (+10% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage every 0.5s to enemies in the area.Meanwhile, Thamuz gains 500 / 1000 / 1500 extra Max HP, heals himself by the same amount, and increases his Attack Speed by 1.3 / 1.45 / 1.6 times.He also recovers 1.5% / 2% / 2.5% Max HP each time he deals damage with Basic Attacks, or his Scythes.

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Sepat
builds.description: EXP Lane : Balanced CD reduction, damage and survivability.

Tigreal.name: Tigreal
Tigreal.description: Tigreal is the rising star of the Moniyan Empire. But in a battle, the Second Army that he was leading went deep into the enemy territory alone under the orders of high-level officials and suffered heavy losses, for which Tigreal was eventually forced to take responsibility. Because of this, he left the Empire and came to the Northern Vale. During this period of time, Tigreal finally resolved the problems in his mind. Eventually, he returned to the Empire and became the leader of the Light's Order.Leader of the Light's Order, guardian of the Moniyan Empire

skills.name: Fearless
skills.description: Tigreal gains a stack of Fearless each time he uses a skills or is hit by Basic Attack.After getting 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all Fearless stacks to block the next incoming Basic Attack (including attacks from Turrents).Attack from Minions do not grant Fearless stacks nor trigger its effect.

skills.name: Attack Wave
skills.description: Tigreal smashes the ground with his hammer and sends a shockwave that erupts 3 times in the target direction, dealing 270 / 320 / 370 / 420 / 470 / 520 (+70% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the fan-shaped area and slowing them by 20% / 40% / 60% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Sacred Hammer
skills.description: Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing (100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and pushing them to the end of the charge.Use again: Tigreal can use this skill again within 4s, dealing 280 / 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit in front of him and knocking them airborne for 1s.

skills.name: Implosion
skills.description: Tigreal unleash  the power of his hammer, stunning and pulling nearby enemies to himself for 2s while dealing 270 / 350 / 430 (+130% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. The first half of the channeling can be interrupted by control effects.The second part of the channeling can only be interrupted by Suppression.

builds.author: Influencer : HEROISGOD
builds.description: Roaming : Pure tank with Conceal to initiate teamfights.

skills.name: Radiance
skills.description: Uranus absorbs the energy generated by incoming attacks to strengthen himself, regenerating a certain amount of HP every 0.8s. Each stack lasts 10s.When at max stacked (20). Uranus regenerates 48-224 HP (scales with level).

skills.name: Ionic Edge
skills.description: Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around him, dealing 155 / 175 / 195 / 215 / 235 / 255 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy targets and slowing them by 30% for 2s.Each time this skill deals damage to a target, the target will be marked with a stack for 6s (max of 1 stack per target per cast).Each stack increases the damage of this skill by {40% / 80% / 120% / 160% / 200% / 240% / 280% / 320%}.Each energy blade can only deal damage to the same target once.

skills.name: Transcendent Ward
skills.description: Uranus charges towards the targeted location, dealing 80 / 104 / 128 / 152 / 176 / 200 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way, and slowing them by 25%.Uranus also generates a 300 / 390 / 480 / 570 / 660 / 750 (+200% Total Magic Power) shield for 4s.The shield explodes at the end of its duration or when destroyed, dealing 300 / 390 / 480 / 570 / 660 / 750 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby.

skills.name: Consecration
skills.description:
Uranus unleashes energy stored within his body, removing slow effects on himself, recovering 200 / 300 / 400 HP and gaining 60% Movement Speed for 8s (decays over time.)
Uranus directly gains 5 / 10 / 15 stacks of Radiance, increasing shields received and HP Regen by 20% for 8s.

builds.author: Pro Player : DEWA pendragon
builds.description: Exp Lane : Nonstop poke and harass build with great durability.

builds.author: Pro Player : BTR Xorizo
builds.description: Exp Lane : Front line tank with extremely high durability.

Vale.name: Vale
Vale.description: A magician of Wind Fort, and the only genius in the entire family who can change the form of wind magic at will. Once a close friend of Valir of Fire Throat. After the changes in the land of fire and Valir left his hometown. Vale has always adhered to the agreement he made with him, waiting for his return.Heir to Wind Fort, wind mage

skills.name: Windtalk
skills.description: Vale gains one stack of Windtalk each time he gets a kill or an assist, increasing 8 Movement Speed. It can stack up to 10 times.

skills.name: Wind Blade
skills.description: Vale unleashes two wind blades toward the left and right of a designated area. Wind blades deal 250 / 290 / 330 / 370 / 410 / 450 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage

skills.name: Windblow: Fix
skills.description: Vale summons a whirlwindin the target direction, dealing 300 / 320 / 340 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and  knocking them airborne for 1s (Each enemy can be knocked airborne once).When the windstorm reaches its destination, it will remain for 1.6s while continuously dealing a total of 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 380 / 400 (+80%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in range.

skills.name: Windstorm
skills.description: Vale summons a windstorm in a designated area, slowing enemies by 40%. After 1.5s, the windstorm will explode, dealing 800 / 1000 / 1200 (+160% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area.When leveling up, Vale can choose to specialize into Damage Increase or Crowd Control of this skill.

skills.name: Windstorm: Death
skills.description: Vale summons a windstorm in a designated area, dealing a total of 200 / 300 / 400  (40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area & slowing them by 20% while continuously pulling enemies into its center.After 1.6s the windstorm will explode dealing 1000 (+240% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in range.Any remaining whirlwinds will also be pull into the center.

builds.author: Streamer : The Wongsters
builds.description: Mid Lane : Pure damage-focused for extreme DPS.

Valentina.name: Valentina
Valentina.description: In a battle against the Abyss's invasion. Valentina and her lover, Irlan, were betrayed by some members of House Paxley, which eventually caused Irlan to lose his soul. To revive her lover, Valentina made a deal with an Evil God and gained immortality and the power of shadow. Since then, she'd been hiding among the shadows, silently waiting for the appearance of the Heart of Anima━a broken piece from the Twilight Orb that was said to be the key to retrieving her lover's soul.Former head of House Paxley who'd stop at nothing to revive her lover.

skills.name: Primal Force
skills.description:
Valentina gains 8–50 extra EXP each time she deals damage to an enemy hero. Cooldown: 2s.
If the enemy hero's level isn't higher than Valentina's, 30% of the damage dealt is converted into her HP. The EXP scales with Valentina's level.

skills.name: Shadow Strike
skills.description: Valentina casts Shadow Strike in the target direction, dealing 300 / 360 / 420 / 480 / 540 / 600 (+165% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.Enemy heroes hit by Shadow Strike are marked with a Shadow Sigil for 4s and will be terrified for 1s when hit by Shadow Strike again within the duration (a unit can only be terrified once within 4s).

skills.name: Arcane Shade
skills.description: Valentina dashes in the target direction, firing 3 Shadow Bolts at nearby enemies that deal 125 / 145 / 165 / 185 / 205 / 225 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage each.Valentina can cast this skill again within 6s (costs Mana).The cooldown of Shadow Strike is reduced by 1s each time a Shadow Bolt hits an enemy.

skills.name: I Am You
skills.description: Valentina slows the target enemy hero by 70% for 0.5s and gains the ability to cast their Ultimate.Casting the enemy's Ultimate turns Valentina into the enemy hero's form and allows her to inherit their Basic Attack type for up to 12s. Her skills remain unchanged, unless the enemy's Ultimate has a Morph effect.The stolen Ultimate's level will be equal to Valentina's level and the cooldown will be 120% of the target's cooldown (but not lower than 10s). Valentina gains (100% Total Magic Power) Physical Attack for the duration if the enemy is a Physical Damage hero.This cannot be used on an enemy Valentina.

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Moon
builds.description: Mid Lane : Balanced CD reduction to steal skills, and dish out burst damage.

Valir.name: Valir
Valir.description: In his hometown of Agelta, he showed an amazing talent for arcane energy manipulation when he first arrived at the Magic Academy, so he was valued by his mentor Gord. But Gord got very angry when he discovered that he had incorporated the spells of his hometown into the arcane, thinking that he had defiled the arcane. After a battle between the master and the disciple, Valir left the Magic Academy.Heir to Fire Throat, fire mage

skills.name: Ashing
skills.description: Valir's skill apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit, dealing them Magic Damage equal to 0.6% of their Max HP per second for 4s.At 3 stacks, the fire detonates, dealing Magic Damage equals to 6% of the target's Max HP to the enemy and stunning them for 1s (the same target can only be stunned by Valir's skills once every 7s.)

skills.name: Burst Fireball
skills.description: Valir launches a fireball that explodes upon hitting the first target, dealing 235 / 270 / 305 / 340 / 375 / 410 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The lingering flame on the ground will explode after 1s, dealing 118 / 135 / 153 / 170 / 188 / 205 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. Valir recharge 1 every 9s and can hold up to 2 fireball charges. Hitting an enemy hero or Legend Creep with this skill will immediately restore a fireball charge, while hitting a Minion will restore 50% of the charge time.

skills.name: Searing Torrent
skills.description: Valir unleashes a torrent of flames in the target direction, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them to the end of its path.Vengeance Flame: The torrent form a firewall at the end of its path that lasts 4s and deals 80 / 88 / 96 / 104 / 112 / 120 (+24% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second.Enemies hit by the torrent or the firewall are slowed by 25% for 1s.

skills.name: Vengeance Flame
skills.description: Valir removes all debuff from himself and conjure 4 Vengeance Flames that last 9s.Each of his subsequent skill consumes 1 Vengeance Flame to deal 30% extra base damage. The effects of both Burst Fireball and Searing Torrent can be enhanced.Meanwhile, Valir gains 40% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS.Hijumee
builds.description: Mid Lane : Powerful slow and Lifesteal. Great sustainability in battle.

Vexana.name: Vexana
Vexana.description: Vexana was the majestic ruler of Necrokeep, the gentle mother of the undead, but also the only glimmer of light that penetrated the Mist, bringing hope to this cursed land shunned by both life and death.The young duchess guarding Necrokeep.

skills.name: Nether Touch
skills.description: Vexana and the Eternal Guard inflict Nether Curse on enemies hit. The Curse lasts 5s and will cause the affected enemy to explode upon death, dealing 108-500 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies (base damage scale with level).

skills.name: Deathly Grasp
skills.description: Vexana unleashes a Deathly Grasp in the target direction, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in its path. The claw stop upon hitting an enemy hero, terrifying them and exposing their position for 1s.Phantom Power will then erupt at their location, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies and terrifying them for 1s.

skills.name: Cursed Blast
skills.description: Vexana marks the target area with the power of the undead, striking it after 0.8s delay dealing 580 / 634 / 689 / 743 / 797 / 850 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit.

skills.name: Eternal Guard
skills.description: Vexana summons an Eternal Guard at the target location, dealing 500 / 600 / 700 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 0.8s.The Eternal Guard then joins Vexana in battle for 15s. Each of the Eternal Guard's attack deals 225 / 250 / 275 (+40% Total Magic Power) plus 5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage to enemies in a large area.

builds.author: Streamer : Nananakstream
builds.description: Mid Lane : Get 45% CD reduction to spam Eternal Guard.

Wanwan.name: Wanwan
Wanwan.description: She was born into Tang Household in the land of Ba and Shu in the south of the Cadia Riverlands. The Tang household had studied hidden weapons for generations, and Tang Wanwan's father taught her the way of these hidden weapons. After a successful cultivation, Tang Wanwan bid farewell to her father and set off on her travels.Agile girl with hidden weapons

skills.name: Tiger Pace
skills.description: Enemy hero hit by Wanwan's attack will have their weaknessess and positions exposed for 5s. When hitting an enemy's weaknesses. Wanwan deals 67 (+3*Hero Level) extra True Damage and increases their damage taken from her subsequent attacks by 10% for 5s.Wanwan can dash a short distance after each arrow fired from her Basic Attack. The dash speed scales with her Attack Speed.Wanwan's Basic Attack deals (110% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage

skills.name: Swallow's Path
skills.description: Wanwan throws a Fire Swallow in the target direction, triggering Tiger Pace while dealing 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path.The Fire Swallow then turns into 3 rotating Swallow Daggers. After a short delay, these Shallow Daggers will fly back to Wanwan one after another, dealing 60 / 72 / 84 / 96 / 108 / 120 (+65% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies on their way back and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s.Enemies hit by the Swallow Dagger twice are immobilized for 0.5s.

skills.name: Needles in Flowers
skills.description: Wanwan removes all control effects on herself and triggers Tiger Pace. Meanwhile she shoots Deadly Needles in all directions, dealing 150 / 170 / 190 / 210 / 230 / 250 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit.

skills.name: Crossbow of Tang
skills.description: Wanwan leaps into the air and fires arrows at the target enemy hero for 2.5s in rapid succession, dealing 60 / 75 / 90 (+35%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per arrow, if the target is killed during this attack, Wanwan will switch to another enemy hero in her attack range, gain 30% Attack Speed, and extend the skill duration by 1s (this effect can trigger up to 3 times).Wanwan is untargetable and invincible for the duration and can trigger Tiger Pace upon killing an enemy and at the end of the duration.Crossbow of Tang can only be cast on enemy heroes with all their weaknesses hit and Wanwan gains 100% Movement Speed during the duration. This damage is regarded as Basic Attack damage, and the firing rate scales with Wanwan's Attack Speed.

skills.name: The Oriental Fighters
skills.description: [Wanwan] will gain [1] movement speed boost [for each allied] Oriental [Fighter] in the battlefield.

builds.author: Streamer :
builds.description: Gold Lane : Max attack speed and decent late-game survivability.

X-Borg.name: X-Borg
X-Borg.description:
After losing his loved ones in the accident caused by Erudtio, X.Borg decided to take revenge. In order to achieve his goal, he collected discarded technology and remade his body twice, eventually transforming himself into a cyborg that's capable of throwing flames and making blasts.A
talented teenager who burns everything with his Firaga Armor.

skills.name: Firaga Armor
skills.description: X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 120% of his Max HP and absorbs all incoming damage when it's active. When the Armor is destroyed, X.Borg will disengage from it and roll in the direction of the Joystick (he is immune to damage in the process).The Armor's energy is gradually regenerate while X.Borg is in the Armorless State. At full energy, X.Borg re-equips the Armor and restore it to 30% of his Max HP. X.Borg's fire damage causes enemies to heat up. Enemies at maximum temperature will drop Firaga supplies when they take fire damage from X.Borg. Picking up a Firaga supply restores 10% of Armor HP, or 10 energy while in Armorless State.

skills.name: Fire Missiles
skills.description: X.Borg sprays fire in the target direction, dealing 25 / 40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 (+60% Total Physical Attack) (+40% Total Magic Power) 7 times over 2s to enemies in range (only 75% / 80% / 85% / 90% / 95% / 100% damage against Minions).Enemies at maximum temperature are dealt True Damage instead.Armorless State: The attack area becomes narrower but longer, while the damage is reduced to 60% of that in Armored state.

skills.name: Fire Stake
skills.description: X.Borg shoots 5 Fire Stakes at the edge of the fan-shaped indicator and retrieves them after 1.7s, each dealing 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and pulling the enemies in the path toward him.Firaga Supplies in the path will also be retrieved if touched by Fire Stakes.Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts Fire Stake Launcher to increase its range and shorten the distance between Fire Stakes.

skills.name: Last Insanity
skills.description: X.Borg charges forward in the target direction while rotating and spraying fire, dealing 200 / 225 / 250 (+130% Extra Physical Attack) (+90% Total Magic Power) Physical Damage 7 times and slowing enemies by 25%.He stops upon running into an enemy hero and will slow them by an additional 40%.After 3s from the start of the skill, X.Borg's Firaga Armor will detonate, dealing True Damage to nearby enemies equal to 300 / 500 / 700 plus 15% of their Max HP. If the armor is destroyed before it can self-detonate, it will only deal 50% of the damage. When his Armor detonates, X.Borg will dash a short distance in the Joystick's direction and enter Armorless State while removing all debuffs from himself.This skill cannot be used in the Armorless State.Use Again: X.Borg stops spraying fire and immediately detonates his Firaga Armor.

builds.author: Pro Player : ONIC.Butsss
builds.description: EXP Lane : Mixed build. Hard to kill, and good at constantly poking at enemies.

Xavier.name: Xavier
Xavier.description: Xavier was a member of the Knights of Light who was awarded the title "Arbiter of Light". After suppressing Terizla's Free Smiths' Guild, Xavier underwent a decade of inner struggle and despondency. And when he was ordered to capture the two "heretics", Yin and Melissa, he was once again forced to choose between duty and conscience...Former member of the Knights of Light who's determined to forge a path of his own.

skills.name: Transcendence
skills.description: Xavier enhances his subsequent skills each time his skill hits an enemy hero.Stage I: Increase Movement Speed by 50% when subsequent skills hit, decaying over 1.2s. Stage II: Width of subsequent skill will be greatly increased.Stage III: Skills cooldown reduced by 4s (12s for the Ultimate).At Stage III, Xavier enters the Transcended state.Transcended: All Xavier's skill are enhanced to Stage III state for 5s (this duration is extended by 1s each time Xavier's skill hits an enemy).

skills.name: Infinite Extension
skills.description: Xavier fires a Mystic Bullet that deals 425 / 465 / 505 / 545 / 585 / 625 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies it passes through.The Bullet's flying distance increases each time it hits an enemy or the Mystic Barrier (up to 5 times).

skills.name: Mystic Field
skills.description: Xavier conjures a Mystic Barrier that lasts 5s. Enemies that come into contact with the Barrier will take 125 / 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and be slowed by 50%, while allies will gain extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s.When hit by Xavier's other skills, the Barrier will expand into a Mystic Field for 3s, dealing 300 / 360 / 420 / 480 / 540 / 600 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage  to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

skills.name: Dawning Light
skills.description: Xavier unleashes a beam of Mystic magic that deals 650 / 850 / 1050 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies along its path.Once cast, he also directly enters the Transcendence state and resets the state's duration.

skills.name: Forsaken Light
skills.description: Since there are other Forsaken Light members on [Xavier's] team, [his] Max HP, Max Mana, Movement Speed and Critical Damage are increased [by 1/1/1%/1%, respectively].

builds.author: Streamer : FanCFreakz Entertainment
builds.description: Mid Lane : Balanced CD reduction and burst damage. Classic glass canon.

Yin.name: Yin
Yin.description: Yin was an orphan found and raised by locals of Floral Falls. In an unfortunate incident, he ran into the fleeing Evil God, Lieh, and had since become the latter's vessel. Although he'd managed to regain control of his body, there was always the risk the Evil God would break loose and wreak navoc upon everything he came into contact with. To protect his loved ones and hometown, Yin embarked on the journey to Moniyan Empire alone in seeking a cure ...A gifted Kungfu boy possessed by an Evil God.

skills.name: Leave It to Me
skills.description: If there are no allied heroes within 4 units pf Yin, his damage is increased to 120% and he gains 8% Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Charged Punch
skills.description: Yin gains 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over 3s).Yin can launch an enhanced Basic Attack that deals 25 / 40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage within the duration.Upon hitting an enemy with the enhanced Basic Attack, Yin will throw another charged punch forward, dealing 360 / 400 / 440 / 480 / 520 / 560 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the path.Successfully throwing a charged punch reduces the skill's cooldown by 35%.

skills.name: Frenzy Strike
skills.description: Lieh smashes an area ahead up to 9 times, each smash dealing 130 / 140 / 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 (+110% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies and slowing them by 75% for 0.2s.Lieh is immune to control effects for the duration, while the smashing speed will gradually increase.The first half of the attacks will automatically lock onto nearby enemies, while the latter half cannot change directions.Lieh can move or cast other skills during the latter half to cancel the skill early.

skills.name: Instant Blast
skills.description: Yin dashes forward, leaving Golden Rings behind while dealing 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+35% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit.After 1s, Golden Rings will catch up with Yin, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: Instant Blast
skills.description: Lieh strikes a flying kick forward, leaving a Golden Rings behind while dealing 75 / 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 (+35% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. Enemies hit will also be knocked back slightly.He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit.After 1s, Golden Rings will catch up with Lieh, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+70% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s.

skills.name: My Turn
skills.description:
After a short delay, Yin locks onto an enemy hero (cannot lock onto pets or clones) and pulls them into his domain for up to 8s and turns into Lieh.When in the domain, the two cannot be affected by other heroes' skills.Lieh has stronger skills and 50 extra Physical & Magic Defense that lasts for 8s.
The domain will end early if either of the two is killed. If Lieh successfully kills the enemy, he'll recover 20% Max HP, leave the domain with the cooldowns of Frenzy Strike and Instant Blast reset, and continue to fight as Lieh for 8s.If Yin fails to pull his target into his domain, the skill will enter a 3s cooldown.

skills.name: Forsaken Light
skills.description: Since there are other Forsaken Light members on [Yin's] team, [his] Max HP, Max Mana, Movement Speed and Critical Damage are increased [by 1/1/1%/1%, respectively].

builds.author: Streamer : XK Penjahat
builds.description: Jungle : Strong DPS, focusing on taking out the enemy carry.

Yi Sun Shin.name: Yi Sun Shin
Yi Sun Shin.description: Yi Sun Shin is the leader of the City of the Dragon fleet and he is dedicated to his duties. But the ruler of the City of the Dragon believed the false accusations and demoted Yi Sun-Shin to a commoner. The fleet, without a leader, was hit hard by pirates. At this moment of crisis, Yi Sun-Shin stepped forward and led the reformed fleet to defend this area of the sea and successfully defeated the strong pirates with the remaining naval force.Leader of the City of the Dragon Fleet

skills.name: Heavenly Vow
skills.description:
Yi Sun-shin attacks with his longbow or glaive to attack according to his distance from the target.
Weapon Mastery: After each weapon swap, the next two Basic Attack will be enhanced.The first attack deals 70%-100% Crit Damage and the second attack deals 55% - 70% Crit Damage.Each enhanced attack grants 20% Movement Speed for 1s and reduce the cooldown of Traceless by 1s. Every 180s or when Yi Sun-shin respawns, a Turtle Ships will spawn at the allied Base.Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship, gaining 60% Movement Speed (decays to 21% after 6s) and enhancing Traceless.

skills.name: Traceless
skills.description: Yi Sun-shin dashes forward and slashes with his glaive, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and becoming immune to Control Effects for 1s.

skills.name: Dauntless Fleet
skills.description: Yi Sun-shin orders the Turtle Ship to charge towards the designated location, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1.2s.

skills.name: Blood Floods
skills.description: TAP:Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 / 320 / 340 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.HOLD:Yi Sun-shin shoots forward a powerful arrow, dealing 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 / 320 / 340 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target.The arrow damage scales with the hold time, capped up 200%. This damage decays with the number of enemies hit, and can't go below 40%.His Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while holding this skill.Yi Sun-shin gains Weapon Mastery immediately when this skill is used.

skills.name: Mountain Shocker
skills.description: PASSIVE: Increases the damage of Heavenly Vow's first enhanced Basic Attack by (10%/20%/30%) and second enhanced Basic Attack by (5%/10%/15%).ACTIVE: Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 3 waves cannon shots on the location of all the enemies hero, revealing their positions and dealing 150 / 180 / 210 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the area with each wave.(When a target is hit by multiple waves by the same wave, a maximum of 150% will be dealt.)

builds.author: Pro Player : AE Celiboy
builds.description: Jungle : Standard burst damage-focused build

builds.author: Pro Player : RRQ Ferxiic
builds.description: Jungle : Farm early game for great durability and good damage late game.

Yu Zhong.name: Yu Zhong
Yu Zhong.description: A reincarnation of the Black Dragon, but Yu Zhong had no memory of the Black Dragon at first. After the Great Dragon accepted him as an apprentice. Yu Zhong went to the Land of Dawn in search of adventure, where he met Luo Yi and was awakened by her. After that, Yu Zhong rushed into the Forbidden Area to get back the Reverse Scale belonged to the Black Dragon and became the complete Black Dragon.Black Dragon reincarnate, plans to establish a new order

skills.name: Cursing Touch
skills.description: Yu Zhong applies Sha Residue to the target every time he deals damage to them, Sha Residue erupts upon reaching 5 stacks on a target and begins consuming 1 stack every 0.4s to deal Physical Damage equal to 30 (+20% Extra Physical Attack) plus 2% of the target's lost HP to the target. Each stack consumed restores 6% of Yu Zhong's lost HP. When Sha Residue erupts, Yu Zhong also gains 30% Movement Speed for 2s.

skills.name: Dragon Tail
skills.description: Yu Zhong infuses his power into his cloak and turns it into a weapon, which starts to attack nearby enemies after a short delay.The inner area of the cloak deals 220 / 280 / 340 / 400 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage, whereas the sharpened edge deals 275% damage and applies 2 stacks of Sha Residue.

skills.name: Soul Grip
skills.description: Yu Zhong unleashes the Dragon Soul, dealing 150 / 200 / 250 / 300 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to all enemies in front and slowing them by 60% for 1s.Upon hitting an enemy, Yu Zhong's next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 108 / 144 / 180 / 216 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.Upon hitting multiple enemies, the enhanced Basic Attack will apply multiple stack of Sha Residue and deal up to 200% damage.

skills.name: Furious Dive
skills.description: Yu Zhong leaps towards the designated area with his full strength, dealing 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He is able to dash one more time in the movement direction.After a short delay, enemies within the area of effect will be knocked airborne for 1s and take 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+90% Extra Physical Attack) additional Physical Damage.

skills.name: Black Dragon Form
skills.description: After channeling for 0.6s, Yu Zhong transforms into the Black Dragon form, For up to 7s, he cannot use any skills but can move freely and will knock back enemy heroes in his path while dealing 180 / 245 / 310 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.He also gains 600 / 800 / 1000 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) Max HP, becomes immune to crowd control effects, and ignore obstacles in this form.Upon exiting the Black Dragon form, Yu Zhong enters Dragonoid Form, gaining increased range on all his skills for 10s.

builds.author: Pro Player : HB.Sepat
builds.description: EXP Lane : Balanced CD reduction, damage and survivability.

Yve.name: Yve
Yve.description: A mage wielding the power of the galaxy who can use skills freely in her domain.

skills.name: Galactic Power
skills.description: Yve gains a stack of Galactic Power each time she hits an enemy hero with Void Blast or Void Crystal (up to 10 stacks).Each stack of Galactic Power allows Yve to launch an extra attack on the next Real World Manipulation cast and increases the amount of shield gained by 5%.

skills.name: Void Blast
skills.description:
Yve detonates Galactic Energy at the target location, dealing 200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 / 400 (+80%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the area and 145 / 175 / 205 / 235 / 265 / 295 (+60% Total Magic Power) extra Magic Damage to those in the center.
Successfully hitting an enemy grants Yve 55% Extra Movement Speed (halved if a non-hero enemy is hit) that decays over 1s.If an enemy hero is hit in the center of the area, the cooldown of this skill is reduced by 0.5s.

skills.name: Void Crystal
skills.description: Yve summons a Void Crystal at the target location, dealing 220 / 260 / 300 / 340 / 380 / 420 to nearby enemies.Use Again: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 90 / 105 / 120 / 135 / 150 / 165 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 25%. Enemies hit multiple times are slowed by an extra 5% for each hit after the first (up to 50%).

skills.name: Real World Manipulation
skills.description: Yve creates a Starfield that lasts 15s, and gains a 400 / 550 / 800 (+120% Total Magic Power) Shield, within the duration, you can Tap or Swipe the screen to attack up to 15 times.Tap:Deals 340 / 440 / 540 (+110% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies in the target area.Slide:Deals 65 / 95 / 125 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.45s to enemies in the target area for 2.7s and slows them by 40%.Enemies leaving or entering the Starfield are immobilized for 0.8s (only once against the same target).Yve cannot be displaced while The Starfield is active, and the Starfield will remain even if Yve is controlled (except for Suppression).

builds.author: Pro Player : TDK.Moon
builds.description: Mid Lane : CC-focused to keep enemies slowed and in-range.

builds.author: Streamer : MamaJess
builds.description: Mid Lane : Balanced support and damage.

Zhask.name: Zhask
Zhask.description: Zhask expanded the Swarm as he pleased in the universe, disrupting its balance in the process. Yve pursued him, but Zhask was able to escape every time. When he shuttled to the Land of Dawn and attempted to destroy it, he was hit hard by the resistance from Aurora and Tobias. So, he hibernated in Kastiya to recuperate. But at this time. Yve also arrived, so a duel was imminent.King of the Swarm who disrupts the balance of the universe

skills.name: Decimation
skills.description: Upon death, Zhask summons a frenzied Nightmaric Spawn on the spot, which gradually loses HP over time until death.

skills.name: Nightmaric Spawn
skills.description: Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn that gains 50% / 60% / 70% / 80% of his Attributes plus an additional 20 Magic Power.Nightmaric Spawn Will automatically attack nearby enemies, each attack dealing 120 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.After every 3 attacks, it fires a Death Ray at the target, dealing 90 (+15% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing them by up to 60% for 0.6s.If Zhask is too far away from Nightmaric Spawn, it will disappear.Death Ray is considered a Basic Attack but cannot critically strike.Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Nightmaric Spawn is increased to 200%, and it can be repositioned.

skills.name: Mind Eater
skills.description: Zhask fires a penetrating psychic beam in the designated direction, dealing 300 / 380 / 160 / 540 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way.Nightmaric Spawn will also cast Mind Eater at the same location.If an enemy is hit by both beams, they will be stunned for 0.5s.Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Zhask and Nightmaric Spawn is fused together, dealing 540 / 685 / 830 / 975 (+180% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.

skills.name: Hive Clones
skills.description: Zhask releases a swarm of Hive Clones in the targeted direction.The clones will explode and deal 110 / 140 / 170 / 200 (+35% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1s.If Hive Clones find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by.Fusion Enhanced: Zhask releases several swarms of Hive Clones.Subsequent damage dealt to the same target decays to 20%.

skills.name: Dominator's Descent
skills.description: Zhask combines himself with the Nightmaric Spawn, greatly increasing its attributes while enhancing his skills. Use Again: Zhask leaves the Nightmaric Spawn and loses the skill enhancement effect.

builds.author: Pro Player : EVOS.Hijumee
builds.description: Mid Lane : Positioned DPS, use Ultimate and Inspire to burst enemies.

Zilong.name: Zilong
Zilong.description: The young Zilong was separated from his family in an accident and was later taken in by the Great Dragon, where he practiced with Ling in the secret realm of the Dragon Altar, eventually becoming the heir of the Great Dragon, taking on the important task of protecting, the Cadia Riverlands.Descendant of the Great Dragon, guards the Cadia Riverlands

skills.name: Dragon Flurry
skills.description: After every 3 Basic Attacks, Zilong triggers Dragon Flurry on the next Basic Attack, hitting the target 3 times. Each hit deal 30 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Basic Attack damage and heals himself for 30 (+20% Total Physical Attack)  HP.

skills.name: Spear Flip
skills.description: Zilong flings the target enemy over his head, dealing 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Spear Strike
skills.description: Zilong lunges at the enemy, dealing 250 / 290 / 330 / 370 / 410 / 450 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 / 18 / 21 / 24 / 27 / 30 for 2s. He then launches a Basic Attack on the same target.The cooldown of Spear Strike is reset if Zilong kills an enemy.

skills.name: Supreme Warrior
skills.description: Zilong removes all Slow Effects on himself and gains 40% Movement Speed, 45% / 60% / 75% Attack Speed, and slow immunity for 7.5s.For the duration, he can trigger Dragon Furry after every 2 Basic Attacks (instead of the previous 3).

skills.name: The Oriental Fighters
skills.description: [Zilong] will gain [1] movement speed boost [for each allied] Oriental [Fighter] in the battlefield.

builds.author: Pro Player : SMG.Subway
builds.description: EXP Lane/Gold Lane : Good at soloing and pushing the lane.

builds.author: Streamer : 疑犯_ Yifan
builds.description: Exp Lane : New Crit build. Farm early game, one shot enemies late game.
